1a1(mdo sde): @#/ /mdo zha pa bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo sde): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
1b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
1b4(mdo sde): l dan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu bzhes pa dang shin tu tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe
2a1(mdo sde): r gyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la rin po che'i gdugs kyi khang bzang tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang ba
2a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa na slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'bum du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po phal
2a3(mdo sde): cher dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol
2a4(mdo sde): ba| shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor
2a5(mdo sde): ba| bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu
2b1(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen
2b2(mdo sde): po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa gA yA 'od srung dang / tshe dang
2b3(mdo sde): ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan
2b4(mdo sde): pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ngag dbang dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang
2b5(mdo sde): ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa cang shes kau Di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin
2b6(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum du
3a1(mdo sde): tshang ba dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas
3a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po dang / stobs dang /
3a3(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
3a4(mdo sde): rab tu bskor ba/ gang dag gi ming thos pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang
3a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a6(mdo sde): chen po chos kyi blo gros dang / seng+ge'i blo gros dang / stag gi blo gros dang / don gyi blo gros dang / rin po che'i blo gros dang / rab
3b1(mdo sde): mchog blo gros dang / zla 'od dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dpag med pa dang / rnam par gnon pa
3b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
3b3(mdo sde): spos kyi glang po dang / spos dga' dang / spos dga'i dpal dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / tog dang / tog chen po dang / tog dri ma med pa dang / rin chen
3b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas dbyug gu dang / rin chen dbyug gu 'dor dang / rin chen dri med dbyug gu dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / rtag tu rab dga' dang / lag na rin po che
3b5(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / ri bo dang / ri rab dang / ri bo chen po dang / yon tan rin chen snang dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / sa 'dzin dang / sems can
3b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nad sel dang / rab tu yid dga' dang / yid skyo dang / skyo med dang / 'od byed dang / tsan+dan dang / g.yo bzlog dang / dpag med mngon bsgrags dbyangs dang /
3b7(mdo sde): byang chub kun nas bslang dang / mthong ba don yod dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
4a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed dang yang thabs cig go /lha
4a2(mdo sde): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tu med pa dang
4a3(mdo sde): yang thabs cig go / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / tshong dpon
4a4(mdo sde): dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gro byas shing mchod do/ /de'i tshe bcom
4a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bshos gsol ba'i 'og tu tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang ba brtsegs pa de nyid kyi nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
4a6(mdo sde): tsan+dan gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa de las pad+ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum yod pa/ tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ kha ma bye ba bye
4a7(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum byung bar gyur te/ de dag steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khebs
4b1(mdo sde): par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin po che'i bla re bzhin du kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /pad+ma'i snying po re re la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs
4b2(mdo sde): shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang la/ pad+ma de dag thams cad kyang shin tu kha bye bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pad+ma de dag gi
4b3(mdo sde): 'dab ma de dag thams cad kyang mog mog po dang / nog nog po dang / dri nga ba dang / smad par 'os pa dang / mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin par gyur to/ /'on kyang
4b4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i snying po de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs
4b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par gyur te/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di shin tu mdzes par
4b6(mdo sde): gyur to| |de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi'ang shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
4b7(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mthong nas the tshom du gyur te/ gang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'di dag gi 'dab ma rnams 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing chu ba rnams kyang
5a1(mdo sde): kha dog ngan la smad pa'i 'os su gyur te/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying po de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re
5a2(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs shing 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed pas shin tu mdzes par kun tu snang ba 'di'i rgyu ni/ gang yin/ rkyen ni/ gang yin snyam mo/ /de
5a3(mdo sde): nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / 'khor bzhi po the tshom du gyur pa rnams 'dong bar bya ba'i mtshan ma byas so/ /de'i tshe tsan+dan gyi snying po
5a4(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
5a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis chos can gyi gtam las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
5a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su zhu bar spobs par gyis shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros bcom ldan 'das
5a7(mdo sde): kyis gnang bas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'khor bzhi po dag gi the tshom gyi zug rdu rig
5b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad pad+ma kha dog ngan cing dri mi bda' ba 'di lta bu bye ba khrag khrig
5b2(mdo sde): phrag 'bum 'di dag gis khebs pa dang / de dag gi dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs te 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed par kun tu
5b3(mdo sde): gda' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mthong nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal ba'i rgyu ni/ gang lags/ rkyen ni/ gang
5b4(mdo sde): lags| de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i blo gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mi g.yo bar/ /pad+ma dag gi dbus na
5b5(mdo sde): bzhugs par ni/ /khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul ston mdzad pa/ /bdag gis sngon chad nam yang 'di ma mthong / /'od zer stong rnams rab tu 'gyed mdzad cing / /sangs
5b6(mdo sde): rgyas zhing 'di thams cad khengs par mdzad/ /ngo mtshar chos kyi rnams la rol mdzad pa'i/ /'dren pa rnams kyis bar chad ma mchis mdzod/ /'dab ma dag dang chu ba smad 'os
5b7(mdo sde): la| |kha dog ngan pa'i pad+ma rnams dbus der/ /de dag rin chen rang bzhin 'drar bzhugs pa/ /ci yi slad du rdzu 'phrul 'di dag sprul/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas gang+gA'i bye
6a1(mdo sde): snyed mthong / /de yi rdzu 'phrul khyad 'phags bdag mthong ste/ /de ring dga' ba'i rnam sprul ci 'dra ba/ /sngon chad nam yang 'di 'dra 'di ma mthong / /
6a2(mdo sde): rkang gnyis gtso bo lhas ni bstan du gsol/ /rgyu gang rkyen gang lags pa bshad du gsol/ /'jig rten don mdzad thugs brtse gsung du gsol/ /lus can kun gyi
6a3(mdo sde): the tshom dgum du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub
6a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo shin tu rgyas pa yod de/ de rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin
6a5(mdo sde): gshegs pas snang ba'i mtshan ma 'di lta bu 'di byas so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
6a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs des bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so/ /zhes gsol te bcom ldan
6a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i pad+ma kha dog ngan pa/ dri
6b1(mdo sde): nga ba| smad par 'os pa/ mngon par dga' bar 'gyur pa ma yin pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa dag pad+ma'i
6b2(mdo sde): snying po 'di dag la skyil mo krung bcas shing 'khod de/ 'od zer 'bum dag rab tu 'gyed cing 'khod pa de dag kyang rig nas lha dang / mi rnams phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i
6b3(mdo sde): las kyang byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rang gi shes rab dang / ye shes dang / de
6b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gis sems can srog chags su gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag
6b5(mdo sde): 'bum gyi spubs su gyur pa thams cad dang / rigs kyi bu dag /sems can nyon mongs pa'i sbubs su gyur pa de dag gi nang na nga 'dra bar ye shes dang ldan pa/ mig dang ldan
6b6(mdo sde): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'khod cing skyil mo krung bcas nas mi g.yo bar 'khod pa mthong ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa de dag gi
6b7(mdo sde): nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi g.yo zhing srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dag mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni/ nga dang 'dra'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /
7a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig ni/ de ltar mdzes pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig des sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
7a2(mdo sde): pa'i snying po can du mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu lha'i mig can la la zhig gis lha'i mig gis 'di ltar kha dog ngan cing 'di ltar dri nga ba'i pad+ma
7a3(mdo sde): kha ma bye zhing ma gyes pa dag la bltas te/ de'i dbus na pad+ma'i snying po la de bzhin gshegs pa skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug par rig nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
7a4(mdo sde): b lta bar 'dod de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha dog ngan cing dri nga ba smad par 'os pa de dag 'byed cing sel ba de bzhin
7a5(mdo sde): du rigs kyi bu dag / de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mig gis sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por mthong nas sems can de dag gi 'dod
7a6(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs dbye ba'i phyir chos ston te/ de sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ yang
7a7(mdo sde): dag pa nyid du gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /'di ni/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / sems can 'di
7b1(mdo sde): dag ni/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin na/ rigs kyi bu dag /smad par 'os pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs rnams kyis g.yogs pas/ de dag gi nyon
7b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i spubs gzhig pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
7b3(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston te/ bya ba 'di la'ang mos par byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de dag la mngon par brtson
7b4(mdo sde): par gnas pa de dag gang gi tshe nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
7b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba thams cad kyang byed do/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs
7b6(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar pad+ma smad par 'os gyur pa/ /de yi 'dab ma spubs gyur ma gyes la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma gos de/ /mi
7b7(mdo sde): 'ga' la las lha yi mig gis mthong / /de ni de yi 'dab ma 'byed pa na/ /dbus na rgyal ba'i lus ni mthong gyur nas/ /rgyal ba nye ba'i nyon mongs phyis mi 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig
8a1(mdo sde): rten kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin ngas kyang srog chags thams cad kyi/ /dkyil der gnas pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyi lus/ /ji ltar smad 'os pad+ma'i sbubs
8a2(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i/ /nyon mongs stong phrag bye bas khebs par mthong / /nga yang de dag gis ni gsal ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams la rtag tu chos ston to/ /sems can 'di dag sangs
8a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/ /rgyal ba'i phyir ni nyon mongs rnam par sbyong / /nga yi sangs rgyas mig ni de 'dra ste/ /de yi rgyal ba'i lus su gnas pa yi/ /sems can 'di dag thams cad
8a4(mdo sde): mthong gyur te/ /de dag rnam par sbyang phyir chos smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sbrang tshang zlum po shing gi yal ga la 'phyang ba/ bung ba 'bum
8a5(mdo sde): gyis kun tu bsrungs shing sbrang rtsis yongs su gang ba zhig yod la/ de nas sbrang rtsi 'dod pa'i mi zhig gis srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba de dag thabs mkhas pas bskrad
8a6(mdo sde): na| sbrang rtsi des sbrang rtsi'i bya ba byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang sbrang tshang dang 'dra ste/ de la sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon
8a7(mdo sde): mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig go/ rigs kyi bu dag/ ji ltar sbrang tshang gi nang na sbrang rtsi bung ba bye
8b1(mdo sde): ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par skyes bu mkhas pa zhig gis shes par rig pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la'ang sangs rgyas nyid nyon mongs pa dang / nye
8b2(mdo sde): ba'i nyon mongs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kun tu bsrungs pa yod par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong bas rig ste/ rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
8b3(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pas lung ba bsal ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / 'chab pa dang / khro ba
8b4(mdo sde): dang / gnod sems dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams bsal nas ji ltar sems can de dag la'ang nyon mongs pa
8b5(mdo sde): dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag gis nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ba dang / gnod par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes
8b6(mdo sde): mthong ba de rnam par sbyangs nas 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed de/ rigs kyi bu dag /nga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig yongs su dag pa des ngas sems can
8b7(mdo sde): thams cad de ltar mthong ngo / /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar 'di na sbrang tshang yod pa la/ /bung bas kun tu bsrungs
9a1(mdo sde): shing sbas gyur pa/ /mi gang sbrang rtsi 'dod pas de mthong nas/ /de ni bung ba rab tu skrod par byed/ /de bzhin 'dir yang sbrang tshang lta bu ni/ /srid pa gsum
9a2(mdo sde): gyi sems can thams cad do/ /de dag nyon mongs bye ba mang ba ste/ /nyon mongs dbus na de bzhin gshegs 'dug mthong / /nga yang sangs rgyas rnam par sbyang don du/ /bung
9a3(mdo sde): ba skrod pa lta bur nyon mongs sel/ /gang gis nyon mongs bye bas gnod 'gyur ba/ /chos rnams 'dir ni thabs kyis rab ston te/ /de dag ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
9a4(mdo sde): gyur la| |'jig rten kun tu rtag tu bya byed cing / /spobs ldan ji ltar sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yi/ /snod 'dra'i chos ston 'gyur bar bya phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan
9a5(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bras sA lu'am/ nas sam/ ci tsi'am/ 'bru rnams ni/ snying po phub ma nas yongs su bsrungs pa yin te/ de rang gi phub ma nas ma phyung gi
9a6(mdo sde): bar du bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba'i bya ba mi byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu dag /skyes ba dang / bud med gang dag bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa zas skom gyi
9a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'dod pa de dag gis brdungs shing brdungs te phub ma'i sbubs dang phyi shun sel to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin gshegs
9b1(mdo sde): pa'i spyan gyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ sangs rgyas nyid/ rang byung nyid nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pas dkris shing gnas par mthong ngo / /
9b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'ang nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa bsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sems can 'di dag
9b3(mdo sde): j i ltar nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi shun pa thams cad las grol te 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs
9b4(mdo sde): su 'gro bar 'gyur snyam nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar 'bru'am sA
9b5(mdo sde): lu'i 'bras kyang rung / /ci tse 'am ni 'on te nas kyang rung / /ji srid bar du de dag phub bcas pa/ /de srid bar du bya ba mi byed de/ /de dag gis ni brdungs nas phub bsal na/ /
9b6(mdo sde): bya ba rnam pa mang po dag kyang byed/ /snying po phub ma ldan pa de dag ni/ /sems can rnams la bya ba mi byed do/ /de bzhin sems can kun gyi sangs rgyas sa/ /nyon mongs rnams
9b7(mdo sde): kyis khebs par ngas mthong nas/ /ngas ni de dag rnam par sbyang ba dang / /sangs rgyas myur thob bya phyir chos ston to/ /sems can kun la nga 'dra'i chos nyid ni/ /nyon mongs
10a1(mdo sde): brgya yis dkris nas gang yod pa/ /de ni rnam sbyang thams cad ji lta bur/ /rgyal bar myur 'gyur bya phyir chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang
10a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ rul ba dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas bshang gci dri mi zhim pas kun tu gang ba zhig tu mi gzhan gseb lam nas song ba zhig gi gser gyi gar bu zlum
10a3(mdo sde): po zhig lhung bar gyur la/ /bshang gci dri nga bas kun tu gang ba/ rul ba dang / nyal nyil gyi gnas der mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis bsnan pas bltar mi snang bar
10a4(mdo sde): gyur cing / der des lo bcu'am/ nyi shu'am/ sum cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lo lnga bcu'am/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong du mi gtsang bas chud mi za ba'i chos can de sems can
10a5(mdo sde): gang la'ang phan par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de nas lhas lha'i mig gis gser gyi gar bu zlum po de la bltas nas mi zhig la kye mi khyod song la 'di ni/ rin po
10a6(mdo sde): che'i mchog gser rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi rnam pas non pa de byi dor gyis la/ gser gyi bya ba gyis shig ces bsgo na/ rigs kyi bu dag/ rul pa dang / nyal nyil gyi
10a7(mdo sde): rnam pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /gser gyi gar bu zhes bya ba de ni/ chud mi za ba'i chos can gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /lhas
10b1(mdo sde): pa'i mig ces bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
10b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid chud mi za ba yod pa'i nyon mongs pa rul pa dang / 'dam rdzab
10b3(mdo sde): lta bu rnams bsal ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar mi yi gser gyi gar bu ni//
10b4(mdo sde): nyal nyil rnam pa'i nang du lhung gyur la/ /der de lo ni mi nyung ba zhig tu/ /de ltar gnas kyang mi 'jig chos can no/ /lha yis lha yi mig gis de mthong nas/ /rnam par sbyang phyir
10b5(mdo sde): gzhan la smras pa ni/ /'di na rin chen mchog gi gser yod pa/ /rnam par sbyongs la des ni bya ba gyis/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang / /nyon mongs rnams kyis
10b6(mdo sde): yun ring rtag non mthong / /de dag gis ni glo bur nyon mongs zhes/ /rang bzhin sbyang phyir thabs kyis chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbul
10b7(mdo sde): po zhig gi khyim gyi nang gi mdzod kyi 'og gis la gter chen po dbyig dang / gser gyis rab tu gang ba mdzod kyi tshod tsam zhig mi bdun srid kyi sas g.yogs pa'i 'og na yod la/
11a1(mdo sde): gter chen po de mi dbul po de la 'di skad du kye mi nga ni/ gter chen po ste/ sas g.yogs shing 'dug go /zhes mi smra ste/ 'di lta ste/ gter chen po
11a2(mdo sde): ni| sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sems can ma yin pa'o/ /mi dbul po khyim gyi bdag po de ni/ dbul ba'i sems kyis rjes su sems shing de nyid kyi steng na rnam par rgyu'ang
11a3(mdo sde): sa'i 'og na gter chen po yod pa de ma thos mi shes ma mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi mngon bar zhen pa'i yid la byed pa khyim lta bur
11a4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i 'og na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi gter chen po yod kyang sems
11a5(mdo sde): can de dag gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa la chags pas sdug bsngal bas 'khor ba na 'khod de/ chos kyi gter chen po de ma thos pas thob par ma gyur
11a6(mdo sde): cing yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir brtson par yang mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste byang chub sems dpa'i nang du 'di lta
11a7(mdo sde): bu'i chos kyi gter chen po yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag kyang chos kyi gter chen po de la mos nas go ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
11b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ste/ chos kyi gter chen po lta bur gyur nas sems can rnams la sngon ma byung ba'i gtan tshigs kyi rnam pa dang
11b2(mdo sde): dpe dang byed pa'i gtan tshigs dang / bya ba rnams ston pa gter chen po'i mdzod kyi sbyin bdag chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan zhing stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs
11b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos mang po'i mdzod du gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin gshegs
11b4(mdo sde): pa'i mig shin tu yongs su dag bas sems can thams cad de lta bur mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
11b5(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i mdzod yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
11b6(mdo sde): ji ltar dbul po'i khyim gyi 'og logs na/ /dbyig dang gser gyis gang ba'i gter yod pa/ /de la g.yo ba'am rlom sems yod min te/ /nga ni khyod kyi yin zhes de mi smra/ /
11b7(mdo sde): de yi tshe na sems can khyim bdag de/ /dbul bar gyur la rnam par mi shes shing / /sus kyang de la bsnyad pa med pas na/ /dbul po de ni de yi steng na 'dug /de ltar ngas
12a1(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas mig gis su/ /sems can de dag thams cad dbul 'dra la/ /de dag rnams la gter chen yod pa dang / /g.yo ba med cing bde gshegs
12a2(mdo sde): lus su mthong / /ngas ni de mthong byang chub sems dpa' la/ /khyod kyis nga yi ye shes mdzod zungs la/ /dbul ba med cing 'jig rten mgon gyur dang / /bla med chos gter
12a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar gyis zhes bstan/ /gang dag ngas bstan pa la mos gyur la/ /sems can de dag kun la gter yod do/ /gang dag mos nas bdag nyid rtsol byed pa/ /de
12a4(mdo sde): dag myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing a mra'i 'bras bu'am/ dzam+bu'i 'bras bu'am/ ta la'i 'bras bu'am
12a5(mdo sde): spa'i 'bras bu'ang rung ste/ phyi shun gyi sbubs kyi nang na myu gu'i sa bon chud mi za ba'i chos can yod pa gang gis sa la btab na/ shing gi rgyal por chen por 'gyur ro/
12a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'jig rten na gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon
12a7(mdo sde): mongs pa'i phyi shun gyi sbubs kyis kun tu khris par mthong ngo / /de la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / sred pa dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i
12b1(mdo sde): sbubs kyi nang na snying por gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de ni/ sems can zhes bya ba'i ming du chags so/ /de la gang bsil bar gyur pa de ni/ mya ngan na las 'das
12b2(mdo sde): pa ste/ ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnyed pa'o/ /sems can gyi
12b3(mdo sde): khams kyi ye shes chen po'i tshogs dam pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du smra bar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
12b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'du shes su byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la de bzhin gshegs
12b5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir don de nye bar ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar spa yi 'bras bu
12b6(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ /nang na spa yi myu gu yod pa ste/ /ta la dang ni dzam+bu kun la'ang yod/ /nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu bskyed na skye/ /de bzhin chos kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa yang / /sems
12b7(mdo sde): can thams cad spa yi sa bon 'dra/ /de kun nang na bde gshegs lus yod par/ /zag med sangs rgyas mig ni dam pas thob/ /sbubs bshig ma gyur da ni sems can
13a1(mdo sde): brjod| |mi shes gang na gnas kyang rlom sems med/ /ting 'dzin thob ste gnas nas rab zhi ste/ /de la g.yo ba ci yang yod ma yin/ /dper na sdong chen
13a2(mdo sde): sa bon las byung ltar/ /sems can 'di dag ji ltar 'tshang rgya zhing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skyabs 'gyur zhes/ /yongs su sbyang ba'i don du chos gtam smra/ /
13a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu dbul po zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa lag mthil tsam zhig
13a4(mdo sde): y od la| de nas skyes bu dbul po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te 'brog dgon pa las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod par gyur nas ci nas kyang de gzhan
13a5(mdo sde): g yis mi tshor zhing rkun pos mi 'khyer bar bya ba'i phyir des de ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu du mas dkris te de nas skyes bu de 'brog dgon pa de nyid du nyes pa gang
13a6(mdo sde): gis kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur la/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa ras rul pa'i dum bus dkris pa'ang rdog lam de na
13a7(mdo sde): 'phyan zhing 'dug pa dang / mgron po rnams kyis ma shes nas 'goms shing 'goms shing dong la/ ras rul pa dri mi zhim pa'i dum bu'i thum bu kun tu 'dril ba 'di
13b1(mdo sde): gang nas rlung gis bdas zhes smad pa'i dngos por yang ston pa dang / 'brog na gnas pa'i lhas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas nas mi gzhan dag cig la bstan te/ kye
13b2(mdo sde): skyes bu dag / ras kyi dum bu 'di'i thum bu 'di'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che las byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yod kyi/
13b3(mdo sde): phye zhig ces bsgo'o/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris te smad pa'i 'os su gyur cing yun
13b4(mdo sde): ring por 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na rtag tu 'khyams par mthong ste rigs kyi bu dag / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kyang rung ste/ sems can nyon mongs pa
13b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi dkri bas dkris par gyur pa rnams kyi nang na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus nga ci 'dra ba yod pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni/
13b6(mdo sde): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing yongs su dag par gyur la/ ji ltar da ltar nga bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag
13b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur snyam nas nyon mongs pa'i dkri bas dkris pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
14a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar dri nga smrad pa'i 'os rnams kyis/ /yongs su dkris pa bde bar gshegs kyi gzugs/ /
14a2(mdo sde): rin chen byas pa ras dum dkris pa de/ /lam gyi bar na 'bor de 'khyams gyur pa/ /lha yi mig gis de ni mthong nas su/ /lha des gzhan zhig la ni rab smras pa/ /'di na
14a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen yod/ /ras du ma thum bu 'di ni myur du phye/ /de bzhin nga yi lha mig 'di 'dra ba/ /des ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang / /nyon
14a4(mdo sde): mongs dkri pas dkris nas rab sdug bsngal/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni rtag gces mthong / /ngas ni nyon mongs dkris pa'i nang dag na/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni mnyam
14a5(mdo sde): bar bzhag gyur la/ /de ni g.yo ba med cing mi 'gyur yang / /de yongs thar byed gang yang med par mthong / /ngas mthong de nas skul ma btab pa ni/ /byang chub mchog tu
14a6(mdo sde): gang dag zhugs pa nyon/ /de ltar sems can chos nyid 'di 'drar rtag /'di na yongs su dkris pa'i rgyal ba bzhugs/ /bde bar gshegs kyis ye shes yongs bkrol
14a7(mdo sde): nas| |gang tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab zhi ba/ /de tshe 'di ni sangs rgyas ming thob ste/ /lha dang mi rnams sems ni rab tu dga'/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gzhan yang 'di lta
14b1(mdo sde): ste/ dper na/ bud med mgon med par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa/ dri mi zhim pa/ smad par 'os pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ blta na mi sdug pa/ 'dre mo 'dra ba zhig mgon med pa'i
14b2(mdo sde): khang par zhugs nas gnas so/ /de der gnas pa dang sbrum par gyur te/ gang gis gdon mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ba'i sems can de 'dra ba
14b3(mdo sde): zhig de'i mngal du zhugs kyang bud med de'i mngal na 'dug pa'i sems can de la bdag gi mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can 'di ci 'dra ba zhig snyam du'ang de yid la mi byed/ bdag gi mngal du zhugs sam/
14b4(mdo sde): ma zhugs snyam du'ang de de na yid la mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na de dbul ba'i sems dang / zhum pa dang / dman pa dang / kho ru chung ba snyam pa'i
14b5(mdo sde): sems rjes su sems shing mdog ngan pa dang / dri mi zhim pa nyid kyis mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas te dus 'da' bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du sems can
14b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mgon med par gyur cing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtses par gyur la/ srid par skye ba'i gnas mgon med pa'i khang pa na gnas so/ /de na sems
14b7(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzhugs te khong na yod kyang sems can de dag gis khong du ma chud do/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs
15a1(mdo sde): pa ni| sems can dag bdag nyid la khyad du mi gsad par bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu dag/ khyed bdag nyid sro shi bar ma byed par khyed brtson 'grus
15a2(mdo sde): brtan par gyis shig dang / khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pa yod pa dus shig na 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khyed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro
15a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can zhes bya bar ni/ ma yin no/ /der yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'i/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes
15a4(mdo sde): chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar bud med mgon med gyur ba zhig/ kha dog ngan cing gzugs
15a5(mdo sde): ni mi sdug la/ /byis pa yin te mgon med khang par gnas/ /re zhig dus na de ni der sbrum gyur/ /de yi mngal du gang zhig nges par ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i
15a6(mdo sde): rgyal po che ba nyid/ /rin chen rnams kyi 'phags pa'i gling bzhi yi/ /bdag po byed par 'gyur ba de 'dra zhugs/ /bud med byis pa de ni 'di lta bur/ /mngal du zhugs
15a7(mdo sde): sam ma zhugs mi shes la/ /mgon med khang pa na ni gnas byed de/ /dbul bsnyam du sems shing dus 'da' byed/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang //
15b1(mdo sde): mgon med gyur la sdug bsngal chos kyis nyen/ /khams gsum pa yi bde ba chung la gnas/ /nang na chos nyid mngal gnas 'dra yod mthong / /de 'dra mthong nas byang chub sems
15b2(mdo sde): dpa' la/ /'jig rten phan par byed pa mngal gnas na/ /sems can kun gyis chos nyid ma shes kyi/ /bdag dman 'du shes ma skyed cig ces bstan/ /khyed cag brtson 'grus
15b3(mdo sde): brtsam pa brtan gyis dang / /rang lus ring por mi thogs rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dus shig byang chub snying po thob gyur nas/ /srog chags stong phrag bye ba grol byed 'gyur/ /rigs kyi
15b4(mdo sde): bu dag / gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na/ spra tshil las rta'i gzugs sam/ glang po che'i gzugs sam/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs dag byas te 'jim
15b5(mdo sde): pa'i nang du bcug nas g.yogs la bzhu ste/ zags par byas la gser bzhu ste zhu bar gyur pas bkang nas rim gyis grang bar gyur pa na mnyam par gnas par gyur pa'i
15b6(mdo sde): gzugs de dag thams cad phyi rol gyi 'jim pa nag cing kha dog mi sdug kyang nang gi rnams ni/ gser las byas pa dag go /de nas mgar ba'am/ mgar ba'i slob ma
15b7(mdo sde): zhig gis de las gzugs gang dang gang dag grang bar gyur pa mthong ba de dang de dag gi phyir rim gyis 'jim pa tho bas bkogs na/ de nas skad cig de la nang na gser las
16a1(mdo sde): byas pa'i gzugs yod pa dag yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
16a2(mdo sde): des sems can thams cad 'jim pa'i gzugs lta bu yin la/ phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sbubs kyi nang gi sbu gu sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis gang
16a3(mdo sde): ste zag pa med pa'i ye shes rin po che'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par 'dug pa mthong ngo / /rigs kyi bu dag /de la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can
16a4(mdo sde): thams cad de ltar mthong nas byang chub sems dpa'i nang du song ste 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
16a5(mdo sde): s ems dpa' chen po gang dag zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa de dag gis de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos
16a6(mdo sde): kyi rdo rje'i thobs phyi rol gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gogs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /mgar ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /rigs kyi bu
16a7(mdo sde): dag / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mig gi sems can thams cad de ltar mthong nas nyon mongs pa
16b1(mdo sde): de dag las thar par byas te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rab tu bgod pa'i phyir chos ston to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /
16b2(mdo sde): ji ltar gzugs ni phyi rol 'jim pas g.yogs/ /nang ni sbu gu yod cing gsog yin pa/ /rin chen bzhus pas rab tu bkang na ni/ /brgya stong phrag ni mang por 'gyur ba yin/ /
16b3(mdo sde): mgar bas shin tu grang bar gyur shes nas/ /'di ltar rin chen las ni byas pa 'di/ /rnam dag gzugs 'gyur las gang bya snyam ste/ /gzugs la g.yogs pa'i 'jim pa
16b4(mdo sde): 'gogs par byed/ /de bzhin ngas ni sems can thams cad kyang / /gser gzugs 'jim pas g.yogs pa 'dra ba ste/ /phyi rol shun pa nyon mongs sbubs yin la/ /nang na
16b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes yod par mthong / /de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ni/ /zhi zhing shin tu bsil bar gyur pa dag /gang gis de dag nyon mongs ma lus 'byin/ /
16b6(mdo sde): chos kyi lag chas de la 'gogs par byed/ /rin chen gzugs ni blta na sdug pa ltar/ /rgyal sras gang zhig 'dir ni dag gyur pa/ /stobs bcu dag gis lus rnams
16b7(mdo sde): yongs gang ste/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di na mchod par 'gyur/ /ngas ni srog chags thams cad de ltar mthong / /byang chub sems dpa'ang ngas ni de ltar mthong / /
17a1(mdo sde): de ltar dag pa bde bar gshegs 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs dag ni sangs rgyas tshul ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
17a2(mdo sde): rdo rje'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
17a3(mdo sde): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'jog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher
17a4(mdo sde): 'chad pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin
17a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson par gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs nas 'di
17a6(mdo sde): lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang
17a7(mdo sde): mang ba rnams su gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang mang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
17b1(mdo sde): bcas pa bzhugs shing gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang khang ba brtsegs ba dus su bde ba/ rgyar dpag tshad tsam la 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa/ rin po che
17b2(mdo sde): thams cad las byas pa/ lha'i dri zhi ma po dang ldan pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/ longs spyod kha na ma tho ba med pa thams cad dang ldan pa 'bum phrag gang+gA'i
17b3(mdo sde): klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed nyin re zhing phul te bskal pa 'bum du tshang ba'i bar du 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byed pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig byang
17b4(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dpe gcig tsam lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam du gnas par byed na/ rdo rje'i
17b5(mdo sde): blo gros| de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga mas brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang
17b6(mdo sde): bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol bas sangs rgyas
17b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re la'ang bskal pa 'bum tshang gi bar du shing man+dA ra ba'i me tog khal bzhi 'bum 'thor la/ rdo rje'i blo gros/
18a1(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi
18a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di thos nas thal mo lan gcig sbyar te rjes su yi rang ngo / /zhes tshig gcig smras na/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba
18a3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du bya ba de la me tog dang / me tog phreng phul ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba mngon
18a4(mdo sde): par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /
18a5(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dge bka' stsal to/ /sems can la la gang zhig byang chub la/ /mos pa bskyed nas 'di nyan 'dzin
18a6(mdo sde): pa'am| |yi ger 'bri'am glegs bam gzhag byed cing / /gus dang bcas pas tshigs bcad gcig bshad dam/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di thos nas/ /
18a7(mdo sde): gang zhig byang chub mchog 'di tshol byed na/ /bsod nams phung po ji tsam skyed 'gyur pa/ /de yi phan yon 'dir ni mnyan par gyis/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog 'di la
18b1(mdo sde): gnas nas su/ /dpa' bo bskal pa dag ni stong bar du/ /phyogs bcu rnams su mi yi gtso bo dag /nyan thos bcas pa rnams la bsti stang byed/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i stong mang bye ba
18b2(mdo sde): bas| |de bas lhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /gzhal med khang mchog rin chen las byas pa/ /'jig rten slob dpon re re la yang phul/ /de dag 'phang du dpag tshad bcu
18b3(mdo sde): yod la| |chu dang rgyar ni dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ /spos dang bdug pa dag dang rab ldan la/ /de na rin chen las byas khri bshams shing / /dar dang bcos bu'i ras ni brgya bting
18b4(mdo sde): ba'i| |khri dag dang ni khri stan gzhan rnams kyang / /ji ltar gang+gA'i klung bzhin dpag med pa/ /rgyal ba gcig la dbul ba byas gyur la/ /rgyal ba gang dag 'jig rten khams
18b5(mdo sde): bzhugs pa/ /ji ltar gang+gA'i bye ma bas mang ba/ /rgyal pa de dag rnams la de ltar phul/ /kun la gus par mchod pa byed pa bas/ /mkhas pa gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos
18b6(mdo sde): nas| |dpe gcig tsam zhig yang dag 'dzin byed dam/ /bzung nas mi 'ga' zhig la 'chad byed na/ /de ni de bas bsod nams phung po mang / /dpa' bos bzung ba'i
18b7(mdo sde): bsod nams 'di la ni/ /cha dang dper yang de ni nyer mi 'gro/ /srog chags dag ni kun gyi skyabs 'gyur zhing / /de ni myur du byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya/ /de bzhin
19a1(mdo sde): gshegs kyi snying po 'dra yod pa/ /sems can dag ni kun gyi chos nyid 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang sems pa/ /de ni rang byung sangs rgyas
19a2(mdo sde): myur du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thams cad
19a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par 'gyur bas gces spras byed par rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu rgyas
19a4(mdo sde): pa| tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ brjod du med pa de'i pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa
19a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i 'khor los sgyur
19a6(mdo sde): ba| bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rdo rje'i blo gros/ ci'i phyir de
19a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhes bya zhe na/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'od zer gtong de byang chub sems
19b1(mdo sde): d par gyur pa na ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu de ma'i mngal na 'dug bzhin du lus las 'od byung ste shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing
19b2(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar dang /
19b3(mdo sde): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur te/
19b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi 'od dga' bar 'gyur ba/ sdug pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ mgu bar 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag de snyed
19b5(mdo sde): snang bas rtag tu khyab par gyur to/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag tu sems can
19b6(mdo sde): gang dag la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / blo gros dang ldan pa dang / rtogs pa dang ldan
19b7(mdo sde): pa dang / spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag na sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin
20a1(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rang gi 'gro
20a2(mdo sde): ba dag nas shi 'phos te lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /de dag reg pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
20a3(mdo sde): gyur to| |yang phyir mi ldog pa gang dag la 'od des reg pa de dag reg ma thag tu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /yon tan lnga brgya ba'i
20a4(mdo sde): le'u zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gang dag la reg par gyur pa
20a5(mdo sde): de dag thams cad baiDUR+ya las grub par yongs su gnas par gyur te/ gser gyi skud pas mig mang ris su bris par gyur la/ mig mang ris thams cad nas kyang
20a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dri dang / kha dog dang ldan pa rnams thon par gyur to/ /rin po che'i shing de dag rlung gis
20a7(mdo sde): bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems
20b1(mdo sde): dpa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgra snyan pa yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu
20b2(mdo sde): 'di dag byung ngo / /rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i sgra des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum de dag thams cad na sems can rnams dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob nas
20b3(mdo sde): gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na'ang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi ris rnams
20b4(mdo sde): med par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa de'ang sems can de dag thams cad la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du snang bar gyur to/ /mngal na
20b5(mdo sde): gnas pa nyid la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du thal mo sbyar ba'i las byas so/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bcas pa dang / mngon par
20b6(mdo sde): byung ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs
20b7(mdo sde): rgyas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i lus las 'od rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /tshul de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das de'i
21a1(mdo sde): lus kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ring bsrel mchod rten na gnas pa'i che'ang lus
21a2(mdo sde): kyi 'od de rtag tu byung bar gyur te/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba zhes bya bar lha dang mi rnams kyis mtshan gsol to/ /rdo rje'i
21a3(mdo sde): b lo gros| yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba de mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21a4(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba g.yog stong dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od
21a5(mdo sde): z er mtha' yas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong de la de bzhin gshegs
21a6(mdo sde): pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las brtsams te yongs su dris so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rtag tu 'od zer gtong ba des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rjes su gzung ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i phyir stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du bskal ba
21b1(mdo sde): chen po lnga brgyar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu bshad de/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
21b2(mdo sde): tshig rnam par shes par bya bas chos bsgrub pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / dpe 'bum phrag du mas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la yang dag par rab tu bshad pa'i phyogs
21b3(mdo sde): bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang tshegs chung dus go bar gyur to/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
21b4(mdo sde): g ang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad mthar gyis dge ba'i rtsa
21b5(mdo sde): ba yongs su smin nas yon tan bkod pa de 'dra ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
21b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bzhi ni/ ma gtogs so/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod
21b7(mdo sde): sems na/ de de ltar mi blta ste/ rdo rje'i blo gros/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan
22a1(mdo sde): pa la gang dag da dung yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
22a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / mthu chen thob pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid de/ bzhi po'o/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/
22a3(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pas
22a4(mdo sde): don che ba yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa mtha' yas na/ /bcom ldan 'od zer
22a5(mdo sde): gtong zhes bya ba byung / /de yi lus las 'di 'dra'i 'od byung bas/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong dag snang bar gyur/ /rgyal ba dang por mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas rig /byang chub
22a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od zer mtha' yas kyis/ /de tshe bde gshegs rgyal dbang de la zhus/ /mdo 'di rtag tu yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis rgyal de'i bstan las mdo sde
22a7(mdo sde): 'di| |'dren pa las ni mngon sum thos gyur pa/ /de kun myur du byang chub dam pa thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi ni ma gtogs te/ /mthu chen thob dang spyan ras
22b1(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gsum ba ste/ /rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid bzhi pa yin/ /de tshe de dag gis ni mdo 'di thos/ /byang chub sems dpa'
22b2(mdo sde): 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /de tshe gang gis rgyal la zhus byung ste/ /de yi dbang byas bde gshegs sras po ni/ /de tshe rdo rje'i blo gros khyod nyid yin/ /nga yang sngon gyi spyad pa spyod pa'i
22b3(mdo sde): tshe| |bde bar gshegs pa seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan las/ /mdo sde 'di yi ming ni thos par gyur/ /gus par byas te thos nas thal mo sbyar/ /nga ni legs par byas pa'i las de yis//
22b4(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa myur du thob par gyur/ /de bas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis/ /rtag tu mdo mchog 'di ni gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje'i blo gros/ /rigs kyi bu'am/
22b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ lung nod dam/ kha ton du byed dam/ ston kyang
22b6(mdo sde): rung / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / rab tu 'chad pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba de dag la tshegs chung dus chos de dag kyang mngon
22b7(mdo sde): sum du 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa de byang par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das /
23a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang las kyis grib pas bsgrib par mi 'gyur zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson par bgyid pa de dag sangs rgyas
23a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig las mang du thos pas chos bstan pa'i slad du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
23a3(mdo sde): bo| rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas brgya'i chos bstan pa kun tu gzung ba'i phyir ngas par 'byung ba de dag kyang yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ rigs
23a4(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / stong dang / nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang /
23a5(mdo sde): lnga stong dang / drug stong dang / bdun stong dang / brgyad stong dang / dgu stong dang / khri dang / sangs rgyas 'bum nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi bar dag gi chos
23a6(mdo sde): ston pa kun tu gsung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung bar 'gyur bdag kyang yod do/ /kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
23a7(mdo sde): klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / glegs pa ma du byas te 'chang ba des 'di snyam du bdag gis deng nyid bla na med pa yang dag
23b1(mdo sde): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam du sems bskyed bar bya ste/ de ni/ ji ltar da ltar de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya
23b2(mdo sde): ba'i 'os dang / mchod pa'i 'os yin no/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di thos
23b3(mdo sde): nas| |bdag gis byang chub dam pa thos par bsam/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/ /de ni de ltar 'jig rten phyag bya'i 'os/ /de ni 'jig rten mgon po rnam par
23b4(mdo sde): 'dren| |khrid byed rnam par khrid byed bsngags pa'i 'os/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod pa/ /de ni de ltar chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ /gang gi lag na mdo sde 'di yod
23b5(mdo sde): pa| |mi yi khyu mchog chos kyi sgron ma 'dzin/ /de ni nyi zla lta bur blta ba'i 'os/ /'jig rten mgon po lta bur phyag bya'i gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
23b6(mdo sde): stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i blo gros dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi
23b7(mdo sde): po dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin
24a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya bra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes
24a2(mdo sde): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya nAk+Sha ra ka raN+Da ka bai ro tsa na gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/
24a3(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
24a4(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
24a5(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad kyang rgya chen po shes pa/ thabs la mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ le lo med pa/
24a6(mdo sde): yi ge sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa khong du chud par byed pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'dul ba'i myu gu dang ldan pa/ ngo tsha shes
24a7(mdo sde): pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ sems can la mnyes gshin pa/ ting nge 'dzin mang po dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ bla ma la
24b1(mdo sde): su zhu che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gling dang mtshungs pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba shes pa/ g.yo khong du chud par byed pa/ nges pa'i tshig dang
24b2(mdo sde): spobs pa zad mi shes pa zung khong du chud par byed pa/ rnam par rgyal ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad la khong du chud par byed pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las byung zhing brten
24b3(mdo sde): pa| shin tu dpa' ba/ gnas pa med pa/ chos bla ma'i rang bzhin la nges pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i khyad par sems pa/ snying po la dpa' ba/ skye ba la smod pa'i skyes bu/ chos
24b4(mdo sde): khong du chud par byed pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi shes pa/ yul 'khor srung ba/ yul 'khor skyong ba/ sgra grags pa/ rgyal ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i mdzod dang ldan pa/
24b5(mdo sde): yi ge med pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ shin tu gnyid kyis ma log pa/ ye shes kyi phung po la gzhol ba/ rang gi las la mngon par dga' ba/ rang gi rig pa sten pa/ kun tu bzang
24b6(mdo sde): ba| mnyam pa nyid la dga' ba/ rnam par dag ba/ rang gi rgyud dang / pha rol gyi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ rnam par rgyal ba thob pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
24b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sgrog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
25a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sprul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong gi 'byung
25a2(mdo sde): gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems dang / byang chub sems
25a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro ba 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i sgra dbyangs
25a4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu brtsegs dang / byang chub sems
25a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i gdong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug
25a6(mdo sde): na nor bu dang thabs cig go / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa thams
25a7(mdo sde): cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad
25b1(mdo sde): kyang rgyal tshab tu gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni/ brgya byin du ma dang lhan cig/ byang chub
25b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba
25b3(mdo sde): du ma dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug na /tshangs
25b4(mdo sde): pa du ma dag dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthong ba don yod ni/ 'khor rnam thos kyi bu du ma dag dang lhan gcig /byang chub sems dpa' sems
25b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po skar ma'i rgyal po ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid gnyis 'groms dang / byang chub
25b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad 'dzin pa du ma dang lhan cig/ shA ra dwa ri'i
25b7(mdo sde): bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung chen po la sogs pa dgra bcom pa thams cad dang lhan cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge mang dang / byang chub sems dpa'
26a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems ni/ lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal
26a2(mdo sde): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman yang dag byung dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na zla ba dang nyi ma rang gi
26a3(mdo sde): g zi brjid snyems pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa de'i tshe dzam+bu'i chu po'i gser
26a4(mdo sde): gyi mdun du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyir zhing mi mdzes/ phyir zhing mi 'bar/ phyir zhing lam me ma yin/
26a5(mdo sde): phyir zhing lhan ne ma yin/ phyir zhing lhang de ma yin no/ /sred med kyi bu la sogs pa lha'i tshogs ji snyed pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / ma dros pa la sogs
26a6(mdo sde): pa klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / dri za'i bdag po shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni/ dri za bye ba phrag du ma dang lhan cig/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po dri ma med
26a7(mdo sde): pa chen po ni/ nam mkha'i lding bye ba phrag bdun dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
26b1(mdo sde): snyed na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod pa de dag rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa las gnang ba mnos te 'khor bzhi dag dang lhan cig dong nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa byas nas rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la 'khod ngo /
26b2(mdo sde): /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
26b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gnyis shig zhu lags so/ /
26b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnang gi/ khyad par sems/ khyod ci bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can
26b5(mdo sde): gcig gi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ba ma yin gyi/ nga ni/ khyed kyi don gyi phyir 'dir byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyad
26b6(mdo sde): par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpas gang spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
26b7(mdo sde): sems dpas gang bsrungs na/ bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas
27a1(mdo sde): gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba'i chos gcig po de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
27a2(mdo sde): khyad par sems la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ tshangs pa/ de skad ces smras ba ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
27a3(mdo sde): sbobs pa 'di lta bu byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la su'ang zhu ba 'di lta bu zhu bar mi
27a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /khyad par sems/ de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
27a5(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' khyad par sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
27a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas chos gcig gang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig pho gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi chos te/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos
27a7(mdo sde): gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar zhe sdang gi chos te/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar
27b1(mdo sde): gti mug gi chos te/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar bdag tu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig
27b2(mdo sde): go / yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar le lo ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go /yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar rmugs pa dang gnyid
27b3(mdo sde): de| 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go /yang spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar sred pa ste/ 'di ni/ spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ rigs kyi bu/ yang byang
27b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpas spang bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/ rigs kyi bu/
27b5(mdo sde): gang byang chub sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig po de gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas gang bdag mi 'dod pa de
27b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag la mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang la la zhig chos gcig po de bsrungs na/ des de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad
27b7(mdo sde): srung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa de srog mi gcod do/ /gang bdag gi nor phangs par 'dzin pa de ma byin
28a1(mdo sde): par mi len to/ /gang bdag gi chung ma phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la sogs te/ gang la la zhig 'di
28a2(mdo sde): snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o snyam du sems pa des chos gcig po 'di bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes bshad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
28a3(mdo sde): gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub don du gnyer ba de thams cad ni/ rang gi bde ba'i rgyu don du gnyer gyi/ su'ang bdag sdug bsngal ba mi 'dod
28a4(mdo sde): do| |'gro ba ni/ bde ba 'dod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag la ma byed cig ces nga smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ gang byang chub
28a5(mdo sde): sems dpas rtag par rgyun du mngon par bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig go / rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
28a6(mdo sde): chos gcig po de gang yin zhes de skad zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig po de gang yang med do//
28a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gang la chos gang yang rtogs pa med pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
28b1(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad 'gag pa med par thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
28b2(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad mtha' gnyis las grol bar thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma byung bar thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
28b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas las bdag gir bya bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las par thugs su chud do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
28b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen ni/ glog dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen med pa las skye ba med par thugs su chud do/ /de ltar de
28b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid thugs su chud do/ /ci'i phyir yongs su rtog pa dag rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes smra zhe na/ rigs kyi
28b6(mdo sde): bu| 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes la sogs pa gang dag ci 'byung ba'i mngal de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi tshe ye shes de rang bzhin la yongs su
28b7(mdo sde): rtog pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ni mngal du chud pa yin te/ de'i tshe rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs
29a1(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang 'dra bar thugs su chud do/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i rang gi chos nyid thugs
29a2(mdo sde): su chud do/ /rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi sgo gcig thugs su chud do/ /
29a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gang la 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / 'chi 'pho med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / blang nga med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang /
29a4(mdo sde): 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ gang rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin med de/ gang la dper bya bar mi nus pa dang / gang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis
29a5(mdo sde): brjod par mi nus pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig po de de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do/ /bkod pa'i rgyal po bstan pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi
29a6(mdo sde): s nying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mig la rdul phra rab ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi sems can rnams
29a7(mdo sde): kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de snyed cig gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so/ /de bas ches mang ba'i sems can
29b1(mdo sde): dang / sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni/ sa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma ni/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong
29b2(mdo sde): mngon du gyur to/ /mang du ci dgos te gtam 'di ni/ su la'ang don med par ma gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan
29b3(mdo sde): zin| khyod nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung bar spro bar gyis shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
29b4(mdo sde): dgu stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di bdag cag gis gzung bar bgyi'o/ /slad
29b5(mdo sde): ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i snod du 'tshal bar bgyis la/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du yang dag par bshad par bgyi'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis
29b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis gang dag 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
29b7(mdo sde): de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ grogs
30a1(mdo sde): po dag / shin tu rgyas pa bsdus pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
30a2(mdo sde): chung ngu dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga la skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ btsun par byas pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de dag
30a3(mdo sde): ni| nga'i byang chub phrag pa la thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu yongs su
30a4(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
30a5(mdo sde): mdun gyis bltas nas mdun na bzhugs par gyur te mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /nga'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la
30a6(mdo sde): gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de dag gi chos kyi mdzod mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /de dag tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur
30a7(mdo sde): ro| |rigs kyi bu/ nga ni/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i tshig 'di smra ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed par 'gyur la/ chos kyi rnam grangs
30b1(mdo sde): 'di lus la btags sam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ da ni/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar ngas ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de
30b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing mig lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo / /byang chub
30b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ngo / /de'i las tshad med pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshig 'di ni/ tha mar smra ste/ de mngon par rdzogs par sangs
30b4(mdo sde): rgyas par ngas mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas khyad par sems la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i
30b5(mdo sde): bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
30b6(mdo sde): do| |'phags pa yi ge med pa'i za ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na
30b7(mdo sde): shI la dang / mu ni warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya A ka sha gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
31a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
31a2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na nyan thos chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
31a3(mdo sde): chen po dang yang thabs cig go / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
31a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu'ang de'i tshe na nub phyogs na brgya
31a5(mdo sde): byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bum phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis stong
31a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha
31a7(mdo sde): dang / mi rnams dang / gang nyan thos rnams dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gang sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba
31b1(mdo sde): chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing nor bu rin po che snang ngo / /lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa/ brjod du med
31b2(mdo sde): pa| nam mkha' bzhin du snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /sems can gang dag der 'dus pa de dag kyang bdag kyang mi mthong ngo / /
31b3(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong ngo / /de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to/ /bdag bdag gi lus kyi
31b4(mdo sde): gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / rig pa'ang mi dmigs par gyur te/ gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo / /nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
31b5(mdo sde): yang mi mthong / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to/ /sgra dag kyang rna lam du grag par
31b6(mdo sde): ma gyur to/ /dri dag kyang sna la bro bar ma gyur to/ /sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la'ang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung
31b7(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang dang gang du brtags pa de dang / de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
32a1(mdo sde): sku'i mtshan dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs su mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyang ma nas kyang brgya byin thogs pa'i rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin
32a2(mdo sde): gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/
32a3(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas 'jigs par mi byed/ dngangs par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed de/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
32a4(mdo sde): gyi sa yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/ dngangs par mi byed/ skrag par mi byed
32a5(mdo sde): do| |gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / lha dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / dri za dag dang / lha ma yin
32a6(mdo sde): dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye chen po dag dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi
32a7(mdo sde): dang / mi ma yin pa 'dus pa de dag ma lus par 'jigs par gyur/ dngangs par gyur/ skyo bar gyur nas tshu rol dang pha rol la rmongs shing sems 'khrugs nas de dag
32b1(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig kyang mi mthong / de na 'di ci zhig /'di ji lta bu zhig /'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes dri ba'ang gang yang mi snang ngo / /yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems
32b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu chen po zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol pa/ chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la/ /gang zag gang dag
32b3(mdo sde): ma 'tshal ba/ /gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas/ /dbang po drug la rmongs par gyur/ /phung po gcig ni mi mthong zhing / /gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de/ /'di la gang zag kha
32b4(mdo sde): cig ni| |sangs rgyas chos la the tshom 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag la/ /chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de dag tshu rol pha rol la/ /bzod pa'i nam mkha'i
32b5(mdo sde): mtshan 'tshal to/ /'di ni mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste/ /brjod du med pa'i gnas lags so/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen che/ /spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'/ /nor bu rin chen
32b6(mdo sde): brgya byin thogs/ /gang dag la ni rgyang nas gda'/ /sems can de dag skal pa che/ /dpa' 'gro'i pha rol shin tu phyin/ /ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad
32b7(mdo sde): shes rab che/ /de ring 'dir ni zab mo'i gtam/ /mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal/ /bcom ldan gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i/ /sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod/
33a1(mdo sde): sems can yongs smin bgyi slad du/ /'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /gang na
33a2(mdo sde): kun gzhi thos gyur cing / /shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas/ /de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo/ /de ni nam mkha'i snying po yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul te/ /snang ba med
33a3(mdo sde): cing smros med pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan/ /lta ba gnyis la gang chags pa/ /phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /rtag dang chad la chags pa ni/ /pha rol tshu rol shin tu
33a4(mdo sde): rmongs| |lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las/ /rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa/ /brjod pa med pa sgom par gyis/ /de ni myur du sa thob 'gyur/ /kye grogs po dag /gzhan yang byang
33a5(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya
33a6(mdo sde): ste| 'di lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jigs pa shes par byas nas de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi
33a7(mdo sde): skye mi 'gag pa/ mi dmigs pa/ cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag ba dang chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs/
33b1(mdo sde): mi dngangs/ mi skrag par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la chags par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing
33b2(mdo sde): phyin chad kyang chad pa dang rtag pa la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas 'khor der lhags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji
33b3(mdo sde): ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes pa de bzhin du 'khor der mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces bka'
33b4(mdo sde): stsal to| |nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs
33b5(mdo sde): pa| ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/ bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi
33b6(mdo sde): mchog lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ ded dbon lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni/ gter lta bu/ sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni/
