33b7(mdo sde): bum pa bzang po lta bu/ mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni/ nyi ma lta bu/ lam stor pa rnams kyi ni/ zla ba lta bu/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi ni/ ri rab lta bu/ nyon mongs pa'i nad
34a1(mdo sde): kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyi ni/ sman bcud kyis len pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de ltung ba rnams kyi ni/ 'khar ba lta bu/ phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams
34a2(mdo sde): kyi ni| me tog lta bu/ sdom pa spyod pa rnams kyi ni/ me long lta bu/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yu do pa rnams kyi ni/ gos lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ stegs
34a3(mdo sde): lta bu| pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ gu lta bu/ mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni/ them skas lta bu/ tshigs ngan pa dang skur pas gdungs pa rnams kyi ni /gdugs lta bu/ pha
34a4(mdo sde): rol gyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni/ seng+ge lta bu/ char pa rnams kyi ni/ chu lta bu/ bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni/ go cha lta bu/ slabs pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni/ mig 'byed pa lta bu/ dge
34a5(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog thams cad kyi ni/ sa lta bu/ nad pa rnams kyi ni/ smad pa lta bu/ bkres pa rnams kyi ni/ 'bru lta bu/ skom pa rnams kyi ni/ chu shel lta bu/ ngad pa rnams
34a6(mdo sde): kyi ni| mal lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ me shel lta bu/ byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni/ shing rta lta bu/ skyed mos tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni/
34a7(mdo sde): rdzing bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi ni/ phrang ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni/ 'bras bu lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de
34b1(mdo sde): sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ nor bu yid bzhin lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni/ shing yongs 'du dang 'dra ba/ gcod pa'i phyir
34b2(mdo sde): lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni/ mtshon lta bu/ 'joms pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ni/ rdo rje lta bu/ bdud rnams kyis ni/
34b3(mdo sde): thub par dka' ba/ thabs dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ tshes grangs/ ye shes kyi ni/ 'byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni/ gnas/ rang rgyal ba rnams kyi ni/ phreng ba dang
34b4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ni/ gos dang mtshungs pa/ lha rnams kyi ni/ mig lta bu/ mi rnams kyi ni/ lam lta bu/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi ni/ skyabs/
34b5(mdo sde): yi dwags rnams kyi ni/ rten/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni/ mgon/ sbyin gnas kyi sems can thams cad kyi ni/ snod du gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
34b6(mdo sde): kyi ni| shing rta lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni/ blon po lta bu/
34b7(mdo sde): chos kyi grong khyer gyi ni/ sgo srung yin te/ rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni/ brgyan pa/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
35a1(mdo sde): dang ni| ldan/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba
35a2(mdo sde): yin gyi| da khyed 'dir lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig / mchod pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal
35a3(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug ba dang / lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / snod sna tshogs kyis bkur stir gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/
35a4(mdo sde): bsti stang gyis shig /mchod par gyis shig /lam byi dor gyis shig/ rgyan par gyis shig/ bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig /khyed thams cad kyang de lta
35a5(mdo sde): bu'i yon tan thos pa dang / snod du gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa mtha' dag stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa'
35a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te snying ni/ rab tu dga'/ bzhin ni/ rab
35a7(mdo sde): tu 'dzum/ mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang / 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha'i dbang po dang
35b1(mdo sde): klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
35b2(mdo sde): dbang po dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la bkod pa'i mchog ji lta bu
35b3(mdo sde): zhig gis bkur sti bya snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po
35b4(mdo sde): che sna bdun las byas shing / ri dang | 'brog dang / ri skam dang / phug dang / grog po dang / g.yang sa dang / rtswa dang | rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / dri nga ba la sogs pa/
35b5(mdo sde): med la lag mthil lta bur mnyam par sprul to/ /des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu dbyangs dang / shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang /
35b6(mdo sde): 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan par sprul to/ /shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / skam shing dang / 'dab ma sa la brten pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las
35b7(mdo sde): byas pa sprul to/ /mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na'ang nad ni/ rab tu zhi/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang | dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
36a1(mdo sde): rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sems can dag gis kyang zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dag thong bar gyur
36a2(mdo sde): to| |de'i tshe gang dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
36a3(mdo sde): pa| blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan zhing yan lag thams cad ni/ yongs su rdzogs/ rdul med pa rab rib dang bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
36a4(mdo sde): 'od kyis ni/ mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni/ bral/ sems ni/ rab tu zhi/ dge ba thams cad la ni/ sems mos/ dkon mchog gsum la ni/ sems rab tu
36a5(mdo sde): d ad par gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na'ang nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so
36a6(mdo sde): dang 'tsham pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par gyur to/ /nor bu rin
36a7(mdo sde): po che de dag las kyang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs byung bar gyur to/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to/ /gos bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang
36b1(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang / spos sna tshogs kyi char dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang / snod sna tshogs kyi char
36b2(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to/ /lha'i gos dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
36b3(mdo sde): dkar po dang | u ra ga sa la dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / tsan+dan sa mchog pa'i phye mas lam der bkram par mngon par sprul to/ /lam de'i
36b4(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon gnyis kar rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang ba dang 'dra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bzang yang mngon par sprul nas khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi chung ma dam
36b5(mdo sde): pa dang / slas dang 'dra ba dang / yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrog cing rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng
36b6(mdo sde): gi nam mkha' la lha'i nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis legs
36b7(mdo sde): par brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/ rgyan de dag las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan man lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyi sgra 'byung ngo / /rtswa dang / shing dang / 'dab ma
37a1(mdo sde): dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung ste sa la brten pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil
37a2(mdo sde): snyen las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung bar grag ste/ sgra de gang gi rnar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de
37a3(mdo sde): nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i bkod pa chen po de mthong ste/ shin tu ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i
37a4(mdo sde): chos thob nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji lta bur bsham snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
37a5(mdo sde): sngar rin po che las byas pa'i me tog pad+ma sdong bu ni/ dngul/ lo ma ni/ gser/ snying po ni/ rin po che rngo'i snying po/ /ze ba ni/ nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byas pa/
37a6(mdo sde): rgyar ni| rgyang phrags gcig tsam yod pa/ me tog pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i pad+ma byung nas pad+ma'i steng de la byang
37a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo / /de'i spyi bo la'ang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo / /de bzhin
37b1(mdo sde): d u byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i g.yog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa brgya byin thogs
37b2(mdo sde): pa'i nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang gi pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo / /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
37b3(mdo sde): bo byams pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ /gang dag sngon du 'ongs pa
37b4(mdo sde): ni| |gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te/ /phyi nas stan la 'dug byed na/ /skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas/ /bkod chen dag kyang bstan gyur na/ /ston la phyag kyang ma btsal bar/ /
37b5(mdo sde): stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang / /sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong / /rtog pa kun la mi gnas pas/ /sems can
37b6(mdo sde): du ni mi mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir/ /de ltar sems can mi mthong na/ /bkod pa che 'di ci phyir bstan/ /the
37b7(mdo sde): tshom gyur pa bshad pa mdzod/ /sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can/ /byis pas don dam mi shes te/ /sems can yongs smin bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ni
38a1(mdo sde): dpa' bo'i thabs yin no/ /don dam gyis ni sdug bsngal ba/ /de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir/ /mkhas pas kun rdzob bden pa yis/ /'di 'dra ba yi bkod
38a2(mdo sde): pa bstan/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam
38a3(mdo sde): pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo sems can thams cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig gis spyod yul dang / sbyor
38a4(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes so/ /yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur na'ang de dag gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig
38a5(mdo sde): gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes so/ /de bzhin du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa dang /
38a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te/ gal te sems can thams cad bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub
38a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / rnam par grol ba dang / don dam pa la brtag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
38b1(mdo sde): sbyor ba ma shes so/ /yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so so rig pa
38b2(mdo sde): thob pa| dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / mos pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyi rlabs mi shes so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub
38b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ so sor rig pa thob/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bskal pa dpag
38b4(mdo sde): tu med pa 'das te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i 'dus pa chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes nas ji ltar 'di na sems can kha cig bkod pa chen
38b5(mdo sde): po 'di'i phyir 'ong zhing ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po blta ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar
38b6(mdo sde): gyur nas nub phyogs nas 'ong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mongs ma yin pa/ mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
38b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/ sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar byas nas de'i 'og tu sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pas sgrub pa'i
39a1(mdo sde): bkod pa chen po'ang bstan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa chen pa'ang bstan pa bzhin no/ /gal te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i bkod pa ston du zin
39a2(mdo sde): na| lha ngang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ bslad par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i bar du'ang bslad par 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul
39a3(mdo sde): dang / sbyor ba'i mtshan ma ston par mi nus te/ de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu de ni/ thabs shes pa la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams
39a4(mdo sde): cad la gnas so/ /the tshom med do/ /ye shes gzhan la rag ma las pa la mkhas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang
39a5(mdo sde): 'dra'o| |rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po de ni/ sems can thams cad mtho ris dang / thar par skye bar ston pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems
39a6(mdo sde): kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs su thar par byed pa'o/ /lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nang gsol bar byed pa'o/ /sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal
39a7(mdo sde): b ar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog slad nas mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming rjod
39b1(mdo sde): par byed pa'o/ /phyag 'tshal bar byed/ dri 'bul/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdug par byed na/ rigs kyi bu de na/ de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / de dag gi nyon
39b2(mdo sde): mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel ba ci 'dra ba dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dra ba la'ang rtog cing sems sbyang ba ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i
39b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/ chos la bskyed pa'am/ dge 'dun la bskyed pa'am/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin
39b4(mdo sde): nam| sgom pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmi lam ma'ang rung / sad pa'i tshe'ang rung ste/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis
39b5(mdo sde): ston te| thabs des lta ba ngan pa dang / byed pa dang / smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do/ /ci
39b6(mdo sde): nas kyang de'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang / smon lam drang po dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang bsten par 'gyur ba dang / myur du dri mi
39b7(mdo sde): zhim pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i lam thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang /
40a1(mdo sde): legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la
40a2(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to/ /gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / gang yang sems g.yengs pa dang / gang dag gi mig gi bar chad byas
40a3(mdo sde): pa dang / lce bcings pa dang / gang dag gi yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/ gal te de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir
40a4(mdo sde): snying thag pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par byed cing a ga ru dang / rgya spos kyis bdugs nas skyes bu dam pa nam mkha'i
40a5(mdo sde): snying po la phyag btsal nas rigs kyi bu de ni/ de dag gi rmi lam na bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug gam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ dpal gyi gzugs sam/ dbyangs
40a6(mdo sde): can gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs sam/ blon po'i gzugs sam/ dpa' bo'i gzugs sam/ sman pa'i gzugs sam/ pha'i gzugs sam/ ma'i gzugs sam/
40a7(mdo sde): khye'u'i gzugs sam/ bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman dang yo byad du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston cing
40b1(mdo sde): nad pa'i sbyor ba gcig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gang zhal ta dang / longs spyod 'dod pa dang / gang kha ton dang thos par 'dod pa dang / gang dben par 'dod
40b2(mdo sde): pa dang / gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab 'dod pa dang / gang yang grags pa 'dod pa dang / gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / gang dbang phyug 'dod pa dang /
40b3(mdo sde): gang gzugs 'dod pa dang / gang nor 'dod pa dang / gang dam pa 'dod pa dang / gang rigs 'dod pa dang / gang bu 'dod pa dang / gang g.yog 'dod pa dang / gang yon tan 'dod pa dang /
40b4(mdo sde): gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang / gang tshul khrims 'dod pa nas gang shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang / gang tshig 'jam po 'dod pa dang / gang sems can rnams dang mthun par 'dod
40b5(mdo sde): pa dang / gang sdig pa las thar par bya bar 'dod pa dang / gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas shes rab la gzhog pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / longs
40b6(mdo sde): spyod 'dod pa dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang / sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gzhog par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dag tshul khrims la gzhog par
40b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gzhog par 'dod na/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ thabs ston par byed do/ /gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing bdag la
41a1(mdo sde): lta zhing sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la/ bdag gis thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
41a2(mdo sde): la sems gzhag pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sems pa des byang chub sems
41a3(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o/ /dgon pa'am/ dbye'am/ bla gab med par a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang bas bdug par bya'o/ /thal mo sbyar te
41a4(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams kun tu yang lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas sngags kyi tshig 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ su mri sha/ su mri sha/ kA ru Ni ka/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ kA ru
41a5(mdo sde): Ni ka/ mu ra mu ra/ be ga d+ha ri/ ma tsa me/ b+hu dza pA da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsin+ta ma ni pU rA ya/ kA ru Ni ka /sarba sha me s+tha pA ya/ a dz+nyA d+hA ri/ spu gung s+phu gung / ru ti bi be ka gung
41a6(mdo sde): dri Sh+Ti bi be ka gung / pU ra ya kA ru Ni ka/ pU rA ya na tu ma ma/ a sha sarba pa na tha tsa/ a sho ka ga ti swAhA/ sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas te nyal bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ni/
41a7(mdo sde): de la ma'i gzugs sam/ ri dwags kyi gzugs sam/ bya'i gzugs sam/ bdag nyid du ston pa'am/ de'i bsod nams kyi skal pa ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam/
41b1(mdo sde): chag gas de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de/ thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed nus so/ /gang theg
41b2(mdo sde): pa la mi gnas pa dang / gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i sems can dag des thang gcig yud tsam dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang /
41b3(mdo sde): thabs cung zad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog pa nas ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs dang / sa bcu la gzhog pa'i bar du
41b4(mdo sde): nus te| de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni/ thabs dang / ye shes dang / snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu/
41b5(mdo sde): nam mkha'i tshad ni/ la las gzung nus kyi/ rigs kyi bu de'i thabs dang / ye shes dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sems
41b6(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshad gzung bar ni/ mi nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
41b7(mdo sde): dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu sems can gang g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ yang dag pa'i nan tan dang ldan pa/ lta ba rang po dang ldan pa/ gzhan mi smod pa/ bdag mi bstod pa/
42a1(mdo sde): phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di snying brtse bar byed de/ thabs dang /
42a2(mdo sde): ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / rtul bas thabs kyang ston cing sems can de thabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / rtul ba des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las
42a3(mdo sde): yongs su thar pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar byed do/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu bsngo bar byed de/ bla na med pa
42a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / rtul ba chen po de sa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
42a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir spro ba dang / rtul ba chen por 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de ltar byang
42a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni/ yon tan gyi chos dang rtul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa sems can thams cad yongs su
42a7(mdo sde): smin par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i slad du yan lag
42b1(mdo sde): gi dam pa mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing de shin tu lha ma me/ lhang nger dga' la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la de ltar ma lags/ bcom
42b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can la phan pa'i
42b3(mdo sde): phyir zhugs pa/ sdug bsngal chen po las thar par byed pa ste/ sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba/ ngan song du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par byed
42b4(mdo sde): pa| 'jig par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ smad du gyur pa'o/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / lta ba ngan ba'i sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la
42b5(mdo sde): ni| 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o/ /ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o/ /de dag gi snying la the tshom yod pa dang 'bral bar byed pa'o/ /gang dag gi snying gi snod chag par gyur
42b6(mdo sde): pa| ltung bar gyur pa thas pha ma pa'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa/ ngan song du 'gro ba/ mgon med pa/ rten med pa/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs
42b7(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di mkhar ba dang mtshungs pa'o/ /lam ston pa'o/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / dri mi zhim pa thams cad ston par byed pa 'khru bar byed pa'o/ /'gro
43a1(mdo sde): ba ngan ba'i lam las zlog par byed pa'o/ /shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o/ /mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ sems can
43a2(mdo sde): gang dag sems shin tu 'dod par 'jug pa dang / gang dag shin tu khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / gnod ba 'chab pa dang / ser snas sems 'khrugs par gyur pa dang /
43a3(mdo sde): gang dag shin tu gti mug gis mun par song ba dang / rgyu med par smra ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / gang dag nor gsog pas chog mi shes
43a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gang dag mi dge ba'i chos bcu'i bar dang rtag tu shin tu ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed pa nas shing rta dang mtshungs pa'i bar
43a5(mdo sde): du yin te/ sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhog par byed pa'o/ /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
43a6(mdo sde): ma gtogs par rigs kyi bu 'di ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par bya ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ltung
43a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na/ sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sprug par bgyid cing ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i
43b1(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad las phas pham pa de la rigs kyi bu 'di mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde bas tshim par bgyid pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
43b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni/ lnga ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas
43b3(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du
43b4(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/ dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i
43b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog par byed dam/ 'phrog tu 'jug par byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o/ /gang yang chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'byung ba
43b6(mdo sde): bshad pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/ theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog par byed/ sbed par byed pa 'di
43b7(mdo sde): ni| ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang nga'i phyir skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos pa bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung / bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims
44a1(mdo sde): 'chal kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung ste/ de'i gos ngur smrig dag 'phrog cing khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod par byed dam/
44a2(mdo sde): btson rar 'jug par byed/ srog dang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o/ /yang rgyal rigs gang gis ched du bsam ste ma'i srog gcod/ pha dang /
44a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed/ dge 'dun 'dus pa 'byed par byed/ ched du bsam nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
44a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par byed na/ mtshams med pa'i las lnga po 'di dag las las gang yang rung bzhig 'byung bar
44a5(mdo sde): byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/ /yang rgyal rigs gang rgyu med par smra bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol yal bar 'dor bar byed/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam
44a6(mdo sde): bcu blangs shing 'jug par byed/ sems can mang po gzhan dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /'dul bar byed/ 'jug par byed/
44a7(mdo sde): 'jog par byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang yang rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa
44b1(mdo sde): ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur
44b2(mdo sde): zhing | lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po kla klo'i yul de lta bu gzhan dag tu
44b3(mdo sde): skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ la lar ni/ dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam dang / la lar ni/ bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyong lam ston to/ /gang
44b4(mdo sde): dang gang gis bdag gi skye ba 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba/ sngon chad ma byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen
44b5(mdo sde): pa'i bshad pa zab mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ stan par byed de/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
44b6(mdo sde): bde sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par byed/ 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed cing / de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang /
44b7(mdo sde): rtul ba'i spro ba chen po la gnas shing mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /byams pa/ blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba'ang lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gang yang blon po mchod rten gyi
45a1(mdo sde): rdzas 'phrog par byed dam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o/ /gang yang grong 'joms par byed pa dang /
45a2(mdo sde): ljongs 'joms pa dang / grong khyer 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/ /yang blon po gang chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad
45a3(mdo sde): pa'am| rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i nges par 'byung ba bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog par byed/ sped par byed pa 'di
45a4(mdo sde): ni| ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o/ /yang blon po gang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rab tu byung ba la gtse bar byed na/ bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung / mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims
45a5(mdo sde): dang ldan yang rung / mi ldan yang rung ste/ de dag gi gos ngur smrig dag 'phrog par byed/ khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod dam/ btson rar 'jug par byed
45a6(mdo sde): dam| srog gcod par byed pa 'di ni/ blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/ /yang blon po gang mtshams med pa lnga las mtshams med pa gang yang rung ba'i las byed cing
45a7(mdo sde): gsog pa 'di ni/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ blon po gang la ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ blon po de sngon
45b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba la gzhol
45b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po kla klo'i yul de lta bu gzhan dag tu gnas shing skye ba 'byung ba'ang ston te/ la lar ni/ dge
45b3(mdo sde): sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis sems can rnams la chos 'chad/ la lar ni/ bu mo'i bar gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/ gang dang gang dag tu
45b4(mdo sde): skye bar 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu'ang blon po de dag la chos 'chad de sngon ma byung ba/ sngon chad ma byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa/ zab mo zab pa'i mdo
45b5(mdo sde): sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed de/ de'i phyir blon po de sngon byas pa'i mi dge ba'i sdig pa'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par
45b6(mdo sde): byed| las kyi sgrib pa de'ang 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa la rtul ba'i nan tan la gnas shing mtho ris la
45b7(mdo sde): gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni/ lnga'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
46a1(mdo sde): brdzun du smra ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'joms shing khrag 'byin par byed pa ste/ lnga po de dag go /gang nga'i nyan thos ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po
46a2(mdo sde): de dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rtag tu ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du de dag gi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i
46a3(mdo sde): yul gzhan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing la lar ni/ dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis 'chad de/ snga ma bzhin gyi bar du mtho ris
46a4(mdo sde): la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu las dang po pa dag gi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni/ brgyad de/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis
46a5(mdo sde): 'khrul bar gyur pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa las dang po pa dag ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por
46a6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / lha dang / mi dang / theg pa chen po'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral zhing 'khor ba na
46a7(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag sngon ngan par spyad pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
46b1(mdo sde): ' dir skyes nas de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa las dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te theg pa chen po shin tu zab pa 'di nyan cing rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung du
46b2(mdo sde): zin gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa shin tu zab pa'i stong pa dang
46b3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par byed/ lung sbyin par byed/ klog par byed de/ de dag ji ltar thos pa dang / de dag ji ltar kun chub pa bzhin du sems can gzhan sngon gyi blo
46b4(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dag gi mdun du don dang bcas/ tshig 'bru dang bcas par rgya cher dran par byed/ ston par byed pa dang / dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thos nas
46b5(mdo sde): 'jigs par 'gyur/ dngangs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ skrag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smon
46b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po ste/ rigs kyi bu/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa thams cad sprug par
46b7(mdo sde): 'gyur| ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur/ de'i byang chub kyi sems bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de
47a1(mdo sde): bas na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bags kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi
47a2(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal thog mar shes par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rim gyis chos bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub sems
47a3(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'ang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i
47a4(mdo sde): r tsa ba byung bar gyur la ngan song gis 'jigs skrag nas de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas ltung ba de dag bshags pa'i phyir mthong
47a5(mdo sde): bar 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la a ga ru'am/ rgya spos sam/ bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod par
47a6(mdo sde): bya'o| |de'i skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rigs kyi bu des sems can de mthong nas de ltar 'di lta bu'i gzugs su ston to/ /la la'i mdun du ni/ tha mal bar 'dug ste chos
47a7(mdo sde): 'chad de/ la la'i mdun du ni/ bram ze'i gzugs kyis/ la la'i mdun du ni/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i ltung ba'i
47b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba ji ltar byung ba de dag 'chags su 'jug go / bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i spyod pa zab pa thabs mkhas pa'ang de la ston par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs
47b2(mdo sde): dang / sa'i bar du'ang 'jog par byed do/ /de'i phyir ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/
47b3(mdo sde): de pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing rtul ba brtan par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
47b4(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ro/ /gal te des bdag nyid mdun du mngon sum du ma bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' des skya rengs 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te skya rengs la gsol ba gdab
47b5(mdo sde): par bya ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /skya rengs skya rengs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skya rengs khyod dzam+bu'i gling 'dir shar ma thag tu bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod
47b6(mdo sde): cig / nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po la bdag gi tshig gis gsungs te/ ci nas kyang de bdag gi rmi lam du ston cing de'i slad du bdag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags par 'gyur
47b7(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po las thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig chen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod ces byas te/ des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya'o/ /skya
48a1(mdo sde): rengs shar ma thag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa ltung ba byung ba de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de/ ye
48a2(mdo sde): shes kyi thabs chen pos de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba'ang 'chags su 'jug go / thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de
48a3(mdo sde): de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po la'ang shin tu gnas par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang
48a4(mdo sde): myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus/ khyod bla na
48a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyi/ khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed
48a6(mdo sde): cig dang / de'i phyir khyod myur du 'khor ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar du de skad zer na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las
48a7(mdo sde): dang po ba'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la zhig la kye khyod kyi so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang /
48b1(mdo sde): legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/ khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / theg pa chen po lhogs shig /de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen
48b2(mdo sde): gyis khyod kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i las gang cung zad bsgrubs pa de dag de'i phyir dag cing rnam par smin par 'gyur ba med do/ /zhes ji ltar sngar bshad pa
48b3(mdo sde): bzhin gyi bar du de skad zer na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa la la
48b4(mdo sde): zhig la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spongs shig / ma nyan cig /ma klog cig /gzhan la ma ston cig / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam
48b5(mdo sde): spang bar gyis shig / khyod ni/ de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod ni/ de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed mi nus kyi/ khyod theg pa chen po'i
48b6(mdo sde): gtam la dad par gyis shig / theg pa chen po nyon cig /khyod theg pa chen po lhogs shig/ gzhan la ston cig dang / de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang / ngan song gi lam thams
48b7(mdo sde): cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de skad smras nas gal te de
49a1(mdo sde): de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu len par byed na/ gnyis ka'ang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i
49a2(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te/ gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing theg pa chen po 'di'ang
49a3(mdo sde): sgra grags pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir 'don par byed/ kha ton byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ 'chad par byed/ pha rol la'ang thos
49a4(mdo sde): pa tsam ston par byed cing bdag ni/ theg pa chen po pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes de skad zer zhing rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la phrag dog tu byed la/ pha
49a5(mdo sde): rol gang las nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la de'i rkyen gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur/ de dag gi ming brjod par byas te smod par byed/ brnyas
49a6(mdo sde): par byed/ ngan du brjed par byed/ bdag bstod par byed cing de dag phrag dog gi rgyus bdag mi'i chos bla ma dang ldan par 'chad par byed de/ de'i phyir dngos po des ltung
49a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i bde ba las pas pham par gyur nas de'i phyir yang theg pa chen po las lci ba chen po'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir ngan song du
49b1(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dper na/ mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de/ rgya mtsho chen por gru las song ba las rgya mtsho chen por gru nyid zhig par gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub
49b2(mdo sde): s ems dpa' las dang po pa'ang theg pa chen po'i rgya mtsho rgyal bar 'dod pa las phrag dog gi phyir brdzun du smras nas de'i rkyen gyis de dag dad pa'i gru zhig cing shes rab kyi srog dang
49b3(mdo sde): bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa phrag dog gi phyir brdzun du smras pa'i rkyen gyis ltung ba lci ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni/
49b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba dag
49b5(mdo sde): zab pa nyid la stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sas brgyan pa'i skyes bu rig pa chen po dang ldan pa/ tshegs chung ba'i byang chub sems
49b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul gyi theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de klog par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha ton byed/ bklags nas gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed/ de bdag gis chos 'di dag rang gi
49b7(mdo sde): blos rtogs nas nga snying rje ba'i phyir de ltar khyod la ston gyi/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig dang / da ltar gyi nga bzhin du khyed
50a1(mdo sde): kyang ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smra zhing / chos 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par ni/ ma byas kyi/ bklags pa tsam gyis bstan to/ /zhes ni/
50a2(mdo sde): mi zer bar rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/ de'i rkyen gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
50a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag dag gi spyan sngar nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur/ ltung ba lci ba 'byung bar 'gyur/
50a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams theg pa chen pos bslus par 'gyur te/ de ni/ de'i nyan thos kyi theg par yang mi 'gyur na/ theg pa chen po lta ci smos/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'i
50a5(mdo sde): khyad par lta ci smos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig 'brog dong pa chen por song ba las bkres pa dang skom pas
50a6(mdo sde): nyen cing ngal bar gyur nas de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zas kyi phyir 'dug nas des shing 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa/ ro dang ldan pa bor te
50a7(mdo sde): dug gi shing ro med pa la 'dzegs nas dug gi 'bras bu za'o/ /zos nas 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ gang zag de'ang dpe de dang 'dra bar brjod do/ /de bas na/ mir rnyed pa shin tu
50b1(mdo sde): dkon pa rnyed nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod pa las rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa'i phyir bdag la bstod/ gzhan la smod
50b2(mdo sde): par byed pas ltung ba'i lci ba de 'dra ba byung bar gyur nas ltung ba'i rtsa ba de'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin tu smad cing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de 'dra ba ni/
50b3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad kyis mi bsten par bya'o/ /gang de sten par byed pa de ni/ shes pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang bcas pa
50b4(mdo sde): yin te| de'ang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun na 'don gyi phyag
50b5(mdo sde): dar ba'am/ blon po'i phyag dar ba'am/ dpa' bo'i phyag dar ba'am/ sman pa'i phyag dar ba/ blun pa/ mkhas pas snyems pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag
50b6(mdo sde): spyin pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po rnam pa mang po dag byed par snang ste/ de dag gtong bas rgyags shing dregs nas snyems pa dang / rgyags pas rgyal rigs dag kyang 'byed
50b7(mdo sde): bar byed/ dge sbyong dag kyang rgyal rigs dang 'byed par byed cing / de dag rgyal rigs la brten nas dge sbyong dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed de/ nor gyi chad pas 'phrog
51a1(mdo sde): par byed pas gnod pa de'i phyir dge slong de dag gis gang zag gi'ang rung / dge 'dun gyi'ang rung / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'ang rung / mchod rten gyi'ang
51a2(mdo sde): rung ste| 'phrog nas de dag la skyes su 'bul bar byed/ phyag dar ba de dag kyang rgyal rigs la 'bul bar byed de/ de gnyis ka ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ ltung ba'i
51a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar ba de dge sbyong dang bcas te nyes par 'gyur/ chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'dogs/ chos ma yin par ni
51a4(mdo sde): chos su 'dogs te chos spangs/ mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i bslab pa la mi lta/ nag po bstan pa la mi lta/ chen po bstan pa la mi lta/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po dang /
51a5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa dang / thabs kyi bslab pa dang / gang yang mdo sde gzhan dag las bslab pa bshad pa de'ang spangs nas dge slong dag gtse ba'i
51a6(mdo sde): phyir de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya ba 'cha' bar byed de/ bya ba 'cha' ba de dag gis dge slong dag gtse bar 'gyur/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sbyor pa'i yid la
51a7(mdo sde): byed pa gtong bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan pa de dag gnod sems mang bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pa ma zhi ba zhi bar mi byed/ srab mor mi 'gyur
51b1(mdo sde): te| de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ spyod pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir lhod par 'gyur/ phal cher
51b2(mdo sde): lhod par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma yin na dge sbyong du khas 'che/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin na tshangs par spyod par khas 'che zhing bong bu dang
51b3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa dang / chos shin tu gsal bar 'chad par 'gyur te/ de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu bkur sti byas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa
51b4(mdo sde): byas par 'gyur/ de dag gis dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa khyim pa la brjod pa dang / rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pa de'ang dge slong spong ba
51b5(mdo sde): la brtson pa de dag la zhe sdang zhing 'phya bar 'gyur te/ gang de na dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi phan pa dang longs spyod du bya ba de kha ton la brtson pa'i dge slong la
51b6(mdo sde): 'bul bar byed pas de gnyis ka ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong bsam gtan pa ni/ zhing dam pa yin gyi/ kha ton pa dang / zhal ta la gnas pa ni/
51b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i phyir te/ dge slong bsam gtan pa dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag la snod du gyur pa/ sbyin gnas dam pa/ snod dam par
52a1(mdo sde): gyur pa| 'jig rten gyi snang bar byed pa/ lam ston par byed pa/ las kyi zhing dang nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ mya ngan
52a2(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gzhog par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ni/ tshegs ma phyung ba/ 'jigs pa dang phral ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams
52a3(mdo sde): kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ngan song
52a4(mdo sde): du 'gro bar 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' bslus par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ de
52a5(mdo sde): 'dra ba dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni/ de lta bu dag gi yul du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ la lar ni/ dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs
52a6(mdo sde): dang / spyod lam gyis/ la lar ni/ bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam nas dud 'gro'i mtshan ma dang / spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs sna tshogs ston te/
52a7(mdo sde): rgya cher ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin du bklag par bya ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can de dang de dag la ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du chos
52b1(mdo sde): 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba/ sngon chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa'i mdo sde dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / sa 'chad de/ de'i phyir byang chub
52b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' las dang po pa thabs mi shes pa ltung ba byung ba dag ngo tsha bar byed/ ltung ba des 'jigs par byed/ dngangs par byed/ skrag par byed/ ltung ba de dag 'chags
52b3(mdo sde): par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed do/ /gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas mthong bar 'dod cing ngan song du ltung bas
52b4(mdo sde): 'jigs te/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bshags par 'dod na/ gal te de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing de'i ming nas brjod na/ rigs kyi bu de dag
52b5(mdo sde): gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sems can de'i mdun du tha mal pa'i tshul du 'dug pa'am/ bram ze'i gzugs nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' las
52b6(mdo sde): dang po la de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de ji ltar byung ba la chags su 'jug go /de'i thabs mkhas pa zab mo dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa'ang
52b7(mdo sde): ston| sa dang sa dag tu'ang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la gzhog par byed de/ rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gzhog par byed do/ /de nas de
53a1(mdo sde): d ag ngan song gi 'jigs pa chen po las shin tu thar par byed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'jog par
53a2(mdo sde): byed do| |de ltar de glog dang mtshungs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa la mthu che zhing rtul bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
53a3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te de dag la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/ gang de la gsol bar byed pa'i byang chub sems
53a4(mdo sde): d pa' las dang po pa nyes pa dang bcas pa tho rangs kyi thun la langs te kha shar phyogs su bstan te 'dug la lha'i bu skya rengs la gsol ba gdab par bya ba 'di skad du brjod
53a5(mdo sde): do| |skya rengs skya rengs thugs rje chen po can/ skal pa chen po can khyod dzam+bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig /byang chub sems
53a6(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po can la bdag gi tshig gis sbron te/ bdag gi rmi lam du'ang de ston par 'gyur zhing bdag gis thabs des ltung ba bshags
53a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po la thabs dang ye shes thob par mdzod cig ces smras nas des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya ste/ skya rengs dzam+bu'i
53b1(mdo sde): gling 'dir shar ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi lam na tha mal par mdun du 'dug
53b2(mdo sde): ste| ltung ba'i rtsa ba de'ang 'chags su 'jug / ye shes dang thabs chen pos thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de de nyid du byang
53b3(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa
53b4(mdo sde): drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
53b5(mdo sde): thabs dang shes rab kyang de la ston to/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni/ shin tu dpa' ba las byung ba'i yid
53b6(mdo sde): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yan lag gi dam pa mgo la 'dug par snang ngo / /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po ni/ yon tan
53b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/ gzugs 'brir 'jug gam/ de
54a1(mdo sde): la mchod pa byed dam/ rim gro byed/ bsti stang byed/ bkur sti byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs
54a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa du ma dag gis bkur stir byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ bdag gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na/ sems can de dag ni/ mes
54a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis 'chi bar mi byed de/ de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang de
54a4(mdo sde): dag gi srog dbrog par mi nus/ dus ma yin par mi 'chi/ nad bu can du mi 'gyur/ bkres pa dang skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rgyal po'i chad pas chod
54a5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de dag mig gis gzugs mi mthong / rna bas sgra mi thos/ snas dri mi tshor/ lces
54a6(mdo sde): ro mo myong / lus kyis reg bya mi shes shing / da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang 'jug par byed/ da dung du de'i lus la tshe dang / drod dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par
54a7(mdo sde): 'gyur pa de'i tshe de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed de/ sems can gang sngon bram ze la gus par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par
54b1(mdo sde): shes pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu bram ze'i gzugs su ston to/ /gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du ston pa nas gang sred med kyi
54b2(mdo sde): bu la gus pa dang / gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang / brgya byin la gus pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba la gus pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags
54b3(mdo sde): skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu la gus pa dang / gang dag lha dang / ri dang / shing dang / chi mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka sna tshogs la gus pa'i bar du gang
54b4(mdo sde): d bang gi skyabs su song ba'i sems can de dag la de lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad
54b5(mdo sde): ces smras so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la/ /gang dag shes rab kyis mthong ba/ /'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/ /'khor ba na ni de kun shes/ /sems can de dag
54b6(mdo sde): gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gi mdun du
54b7(mdo sde): 'dug ste sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yis/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba/ /ye shes de la myur du reg /sdug
55a1(mdo sde): bsngal kun las 'grol bar 'gyur/ /de tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te sangs
55a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa med pa/ yongs su dag pa gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa/ 'tsho ba/ gzhes pa/ chos kyang ston pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
55a3(mdo sde): du chos dang / dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni/ yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /gang yang
55a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dam pa sna tshogs la sems kyis shin tu dbang bya bar 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal te mchod
55a5(mdo sde): pa ci nus kyis bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dgongs shig dgongs shig/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs
55a6(mdo sde): rje chen po brnyes pa/ bdag la dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor stsol cig /'di lta ste/ u mu ra Na khe/ bak+Sha ma ni le/ sa mu dra/ a ba da re na/ na ya na ya/ ma hA
55a7(mdo sde): kA ru Ni kA/ a nu pa ma dzam+b+ha smr-i ti/ a kra dzam+b+ha smr-i ti/ badzra dzam+b+ha smr-i ti/ ko Sha smr-i ti/ a nu ba ma smr-i ti/ b+hu ta ko Ti smr-i ti swAhA/ de la dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa
55b1(mdo sde): sbyin par byed do/ /gang yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang rung / nyan thos kyis bshad pa'ang rung ste/ bstan bcos sna tshogs klog par 'dod na/ des khrus byas te skya rengs 'byung
55b2(mdo sde): ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o/ /mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ /'di skad kyang brjod par
55b3(mdo sde): bya'o| |dgongs shig dgongs shig / mkhas pa chen po sems can thams cad kyi nang na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i snying po gang zag gi mchog /dran
55b4(mdo sde): pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la stsol cig / 'di lta ste/ i nI la dza/ bi Shan du Sha dza/ bi ya ba na dza/ pi bak+Shi su me/ pA sha la dza si/ s+thA na sha ra be/ shas+t+ra kar+N+Ne/
55b5(mdo sde): hu ma hu ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka swAhA/ gang rgya mtsho chen por 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang khung du 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang bcud dam pa spyod par 'dod par gyur pa dang / gang
55b6(mdo sde): btson rar bcug pa dang / gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang / gang mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang / gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chu dang mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / stag
55b7(mdo sde): dang / seng+ge dang / dug drag po dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can gyis 'jigs par gyur pa dang / gang dam du bcings pa dang / gang chad pas bcad pa dang / gang gsad pa la
56a1(mdo sde): thug pa dang / gang nad kyis btab pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gang dag chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos
56a2(mdo sde): sman dang / yo byad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing mchod pa ci nus kyis byed la sems can thams cad la byams
56a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis gzhog cing 'di skad du'ang smra ste/ dgongs shig dgongs shig /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grags pa chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'gro ba'i don bzhed pa/
56a4(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig /bdag 'di lta bu las rab tu thar par mdzod cig /skal pa stsol cig /mthu chen po/ bdag ni/ sdug bsngal gyis
56a5(mdo sde): nyam thag go / shin tu dbul lo/ /bdag ni/ khyod la brten nas zhi ba dang bde ba tshe 'di dang / tshe rabs gzhan du thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems
56a6(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po gzugs tha mal ba nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /gang dag ci las
56a7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa de dag de las rab tu thar bar byed do/ /gang dag dbul ba gos med pa nas gang dag yo byad kyis brel ba dag gi bar du de dag la de lta de ltar bsam pa yongs
56b1(mdo sde): su rdzogs par byed do/ /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i bu la la zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob par sems pa de gal te byang chub
56b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pa la sogs te/ bram ze'i gnas chen po dang / khyim bdag gi gnas chen po dang /
56b3(mdo sde): bzo'i gnas chen po dang / thos pa'i gnas chen po dang / sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang / gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa'
56b4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po la skyabs su song
56b5(mdo sde): nas gsol pa gdab pa 'di skad du rjod par byed de/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal ba stsol cig /bsam pa dang / sems pa thams cad
56b6(mdo sde): dang / bsam pa yid bzhin du rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig /gang sems shing gang gsol ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cig ces brjod na/ de nas
56b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa/ mi'i las 'das pas sgra de thos nas sems can de dag la bdag ci rigs par ston te/
57a1(mdo sde): de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni/ de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan
57a2(mdo sde): no| |blo rgya mtsho chen po dang ldan no/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i thigs pa ni/ la la zhig gis tshad gzung bar nus srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
57a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshad ni/ gzung mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/
57a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad kyi tshad ni/ la las gzung bar nus srid kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
57a5(mdo sde): po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul bar byed pa ni/ tshad gzung mi nus te/ la lar ni/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
57a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul bar byed do/ /la lar ni/ bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing / sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bar du sprul bar byed
57a7(mdo sde): de| de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi nang du ni/ dud 'gro'i gzugs su sprul par byed do/ /sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nang du ni/ sems can dmyal
57b1(mdo sde): ba pa'i gzugs su sprul par byed pa nas gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do/ /kha cig la ni/ mngon sum du
57b2(mdo sde): sprul pa sprul par byed/ kha cig la ni/ rmi lam du sprul par byed/ kha cig la ni/ sdig pa'i las sprug pa'i phyir/ ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/ mtho ris la dgod pa'i
57b3(mdo sde): phyir| sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'chi 'pho'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma rgyu ba'i tshe gzugs sna tshogs su sprul par byed de/ de dag la thog mar skyabs su song
57b4(mdo sde): zhing mthong ste/ bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du 'gyur bas de'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul ba thams cad kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus
57b5(mdo sde): so| |de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni/ thabs dang ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ /sangs
57b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo / /de nas de'i tshe 'khor
57b7(mdo sde): 'dus pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob/ rmad du byung ba thob/ bla ma la bkur sti dang / bsti stang du bya ba
58a1(mdo sde): thob par gyur nas thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang / bkur sti sna tshogs
58a2(mdo sde): kyis bkur stir byed/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / chos gos dang / rgyan
58a3(mdo sde): dang / gos dang / bstod pa dang / glu dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po des kyang de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la
58a4(mdo sde): phul lo| |phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
58a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi don bgyi bar ji ltar rngo thogs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
58a6(mdo sde): stsal pa| 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha' ni/ ma bcings pa/ ma grol ba/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa/ ma rmongs pa/ rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' la
58a7(mdo sde): rlung gi rkyen gyis rdul 'thul zhing rlung gis dkrugs pas yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/ chus ni/ zhi bar byed cing dri ma med la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /
58b1(mdo sde): de la skar ma dang / gza' dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i bye brag mi mngon na ni/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / dus dang / lo rnams kyi
58b2(mdo sde): bgrang ba'ang mi mngon no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni/ rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i yongs su dag pa
58b3(mdo sde): yin mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyi glo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te/ de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
58b4(mdo sde): chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do/ /sems nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang /
58b5(mdo sde): de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis tshi ma par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon
58b6(mdo sde): tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
58b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag las kyang 'jig rten
59a1(mdo sde): du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
59a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
59a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' mig la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags so/ /ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la lags so/ /ci
59a4(mdo sde): mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags so/ /gang yang nang du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam
59a5(mdo sde): mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags so/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus la'ang brjod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji
59a6(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun tu rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
59a7(mdo sde): 'das| de ma lags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags so/ /rigs
59b1(mdo sde): kyi bu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ma lags so/ /de skad cig bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
59b2(mdo sde): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gcig la gcig mi rten to/ /gcig la gcig
59b3(mdo sde): spyod yul ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni/ rtog pa ma mchis pa/ stong pa nyid de/ sgro ma btags pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/ de bzhin nyid du rtogs par
59b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das / nam mkha'i snying po ni/ 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi g.yo ba/ gsob lags te/ myu gu ma
59b5(mdo sde): mchis pa/ sa bon ma mchis pa/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa/ yi ge ma mchis pa/ rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de
59b6(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan
59b7(mdo sde): 'das| bya ba rA dza/ man tak+ShA ya/ dzi na dza ya/ dza na ni ma mu ni ha ra/ a na ya pha la/ gu Na gar+b+ha/ ni ya ma su ri nA ya/ bu ba sha/ sha ta sha pa/ sha ma sha na/ ta ha ka ma/ sha
60a1(mdo sde): ma gu/ mA tu shi Sha/ sha ma tse ta nA ya/ kle shAn+ta saM sho Sha Ne swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis
60a2(mdo sde): mig las rgyal bar byed pa'i seng+ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe tha ma'i rnam par shes pa la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang /
60a3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgrib pa yod pa sbrug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so/ /khyod ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/
60a4(mdo sde): grangs med par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang
60a5(mdo sde): du gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdos de sna tshogs 'chad pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs
60a6(mdo sde): gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol ba'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang / thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan
60a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshe lha dang / mi'i skye rgu dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to/ /gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la
60b1(mdo sde): ye shes skyes par gyur to/ /srog chags khri ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can dag gi gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba/ /de dag gi ni gzhi yi rtsa ba spongs//
60b2(mdo sde): myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gis ni/ /rtsa ba'i gzhi por thams cad 'gyur bar gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
60b3(mdo sde): 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i
60b4(mdo sde): snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya u pA ya kau sha l+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya
60b5(mdo sde): ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
60b6(mdo sde): l dan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad khri bzhi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
60b7(mdo sde): so| |byang chub sems dpa' mngon bar shes pa mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa khri drug stong dang yang thabs cig ste/ yang de'i tshe na bcom
61a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das nang du yang dag par 'jog las bzhengs par gyur te/ 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos 'chad do/ /yang de'i tshe na
61a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'ongs te 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
61a3(mdo sde): y e shes bla ma bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
61a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das la
61a5(mdo sde): bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la rigs kyi
61a6(mdo sde): bu| khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa lung bstan pa de dang de nyid kyis ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /zhes de skad ces
61a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
61b1(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
61b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni/ zas kham
61b3(mdo sde): gcig gis kyang sems can thams cad la khyab par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni/ byol song
61b4(mdo sde): du gtogs pa la zas kham gcig sbyin par byed pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan pa yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad la bsngo'o/ /
61b5(mdo sde): de ni| rgyu gnyis kyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed do/ /gnyis po gang zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang / bsngo ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang
61b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa ni/ pha rol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yi rang bar byed do/ /yi rang bar byas nas sems can thams cad la bsngo ste/ de
61b7(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems des sbyin bar byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po dag zil gyis gnon to/ /gang len par byed pa de dag kyang zin gyis gnon to/ /rigs kyi
62a1(mdo sde): bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ phyogs bcu na shing las byung ba'i me tog gang ci yod pa phra mo yongs su ma blangs pa rnams
62a2(mdo sde): dang / phyogs bcu na gang spos kyi shing yod pa rlung gis khyer ba yongs su ma blangs pa bdag po med pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas thams cad la dbul zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba
62a3(mdo sde): de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gang ji snyed
62a4(mdo sde): bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de thams cad la bsam ste rjes su yi rang bar byed do/ /rjes su yi rang nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed do/ /gang yang phyogs bcu
62a5(mdo sde): na sems can sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ba de thams cad ni/ 'chags su 'jug ste/ gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal ni/ bdag la shog cig/ de dag ni/
62a6(mdo sde): bde bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i go cha gyon zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang byang chub tu bsngo bar byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa
62a7(mdo sde): ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba de ltar 'dzin te/ de ni/ 'di ltar slob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams
62b1(mdo sde): cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig go / tshul khrims gcig go /ting nge 'dzin gcig go/ shes rab gcig go /dgongs pa gcig go /rnam par grol ba gcig go/ rnam par
62b2(mdo sde): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig go/ zhes de ltar slob cing de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar
62b3(mdo sde): 'dzin to/ /de thabs mkhas pa de sangs rgyas gcig la bkur stir byas nas sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur stir byed de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod par
62b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su len to/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ nam zhig shes rab rmongs pa can du
62b5(mdo sde): red na'ang de ni/ bdag la yi mi gsod kyi gzengs bstod par byed do/ /chung du na rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig kha ton du 'don na'ang rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad
62b6(mdo sde): pa gcig gi don gang yin pa gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don kyang de yin no/ /zhes de de ltar slob cing des tshigs su bcad pa de kha ton du byas nas sems can gang
62b7(mdo sde): j i snyed dag gis bdag gi rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob par shog cig ces de ltar ma zhum pa'i sems kyis smon lam
63a1(mdo sde): 'debs te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi thos pa mtha' med pa/ dpe med pa zil gyis gnon cing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa'ang len par byed
63a2(mdo sde): do| |rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ nam zhig gal te brgya la dbul por gyur na/ de'i tshe na de chung du na gzhan gyi las kyang byas nas
63a3(mdo sde): zas gzar bu gang thogs te sems ma zhum pas dge 'dun nam gang zag la sbyin par byed do/ /byin nas kyang 'di ltar slob ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems che ba'i phyir
63a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa che bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ bdag gi sbyin pa chung du zin kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni/ dpag tu med pa'o snyam nas de thams cad mkhyen pa
63a5(mdo sde): nyid kyi sems kyis zas gzar bu gang po sbyin par byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na
63a6(mdo sde): rin chen bzhin du shog cig ces zas gzar bu gang po de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang / tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang / sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsod
63a7(mdo sde): nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par byed do/ /rigs kya bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan
63b1(mdo sde): cig tu gnas kyang de dag la 'dod par mi byed do/ /gal te'ang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag la bkur sti byas pa mthong na/ de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag nyid khong du chud par byed
63b2(mdo sde): do| |rgyu gnyis po gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung / sangs rgyas las ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bas de
63b3(mdo sde): dag la bkur sti byas na bdag nyid la thog ma kho nar bkur stir byas pa yin gyi/ de dag la ni/ ma yin pa dang / de dag ni/ bdag gi pha'i nor la spyod mod ki/ de la bdag gis
63b4(mdo sde): 'dod par mi bya/ phrag dog tu mi bya snyam du sems pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ sbyin pa byin pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug
63b5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe slong ba mthong na/ de ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed/
63b6(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po 'phel bar byed de/ de ni/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang /
63b7(mdo sde): gang ngang tshul ngan pa can de dag tshul khrims la 'jog par byed cing sbyin pa'ang byin par byed pa de ni/ de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gang byams par sems
64a1(mdo sde): pa dang / sems ma 'khrugs pa dang / phan par sems pa dang / sems rtse gcig par gyur nas sbyin pa byin par byed pa de ni/ de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
64a2(mdo sde): pa'o| |gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang bar bya ba de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / sems 'jog cing 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar byed pa de ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
64a3(mdo sde): phyin pa'o/ /sbyin pa byin nas gang rtse gcig pa dang / dbugs phyin par mi 'dzin pa de ni/ de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gal te sbyin pa de byin nas chos nyid la
64a4(mdo sde): brten te 'di sus byin/ 'di sus zos/ su la rnam par smin par 'gyur zhes des de ltar brtags na/ gang gis sbyin pa dang / gang la sbyin pa dang / gang la rnam par smin pa myong
64a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs pa de ni/ de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa sbyin pa sbyin par
64a6(mdo sde): byed pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
64a7(mdo sde): 'das| de 'dra bar thabs mkhas te/ sbyin pa gang gis sems can gzhan dag 'khor ba yongs su len par bgyid pa'i sbyin pa de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
64b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams len par bgyid pa'i ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang
64b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ sbyin pa nyung du'ang mang por byed/ sbyin pa mang po'ang dpag tu med par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
64b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ ltung ba lci ba'ang thabs mkhas pas srab mor byed do/ /ji ltar
64b4(mdo sde): srab mor byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ nam zhig brgya la la la zhig tu sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis ltung ba byung na/ de 'di
64b5(mdo sde): ltar slob ste/ gal te bdag gis phung po 'di dag gis mya ngan las 'da' bar bya na ni/ de ltar bdag gi sems yongs su gdung ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur na/ bdag gis
