64b6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na gnas pa'i go cha de lta bu bgos pas bdag gi sems la gdung bar ni/ mi bya'i/ byang chub ji
64b7(mdo sde): lta ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya'o/ /ltung ba 'di'ang chos bzhin du bya'o/ /ltung ba gzhan yang ma byung bar bya'o snyam du sems so/ /
65a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'das par gyur kyang thabs mkhas
65a2(mdo sde): pa 'dis sbyong bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ltung bar mi 'gyur bar ngas bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces
65a3(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
65a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa slob pa na bskal pa brgya stong
65a5(mdo sde): du'ang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar 'gyur la sems can thams cad kyis snyan par smra ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba'ang bzod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed
65a6(mdo sde): pa'ang ldan par gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa ltung ba'i
65a7(mdo sde): rtsa ba byung na/ phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ltung ba ma mthong zhing nyan
65b1(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa ma btang na/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos
65b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag bsod snyoms kyi phyir mthar gyis spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po khang pa zhig na bud med dang khri
65b3(mdo sde): gcig la lhan cig mchis par mthong ste/ ltung ba byung ba mthong na ma bcab cig /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la zlos shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
65b4(mdo sde): stsal na| de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la cung zad kyang mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa'am/ thugs su ma chud
65b5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du bdag bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo/ /zhis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos de skad kyi tshig smras nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i mod la sa g.yos
65b6(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po shing ta la gang tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
65b7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ /de ji snyam du sems/ ltung ba byung ba'i chos can gyis par snang la 'dug par nus sam/ yang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa'i ltung
66a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos ji lta bu grags zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yul yul por gyur nas
66a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te ltung ba 'chags pa gang bdag gis skyes bu bal glang chen po lta bu la ltung ba bcal ba bcom ldan 'das/ nongs
66a3(mdo sde): te| nongs pa 'chags so/ /zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dga' bo/ khyod theg pa chen
66a4(mdo sde): po la gnas pa'i skyes bu dam pa la nyes par 'du shes ma skyed cig / dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa gcig bu gnyis su med pa ni/ zag pa zad
66a5(mdo sde): par bya ba la bar chad med par 'dod par bya'o/ /dga' bo/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa la bar chad med par 'dod par
66a6(mdo sde): bya'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gang dkon mchog gsum la gzhol bar mi 'gyur ba'i g.yo 'chang bar mi byed
66a7(mdo sde): do| |dkon mchog gsum gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog go /dga' bo/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems
66b1(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod pa mthong na/ dga' bo/
66b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po lnga dang ldan par shes par gyis shig /dga' bo/ khyod yang ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan
66b3(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po bud med dang lhan cig tu khri gcig la 'dug pa de nyon cig / dga' bo/ sring mo de ni/ 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs nyis brgyar byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi
66b4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi bag la nyal de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po de'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / tshul khrims dang
66b5(mdo sde): stobs bskyed pa mthong bas nyon mongs pa skyes nas gnas ngan len gyi tshig smras te/ de gcig pu lkog tu song nas gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po
66b6(mdo sde): bdag dang lhan cig tu khri gcig tu 'dug na/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam du de ltar sems par gyur to/ /dga' bo/
66b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i sems kyis sring mo de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pa dang / de'i khyim du 'ongs te/
67a1(mdo sde): gang nang gi sa'i khams dang / gang phyi'i sa'i khams su gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo sa 'dra ba'i sems des sring mo de lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste khri gcig
67a2(mdo sde): la 'dug go / 'dug ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad/ /de ni byis pa'i spyod yul te/ /'dod pa'i sred pa spangs nas
67a3(mdo sde): ni| |sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /dga' bo/ de nas sring mo de dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba skyes nas khri de las langs te byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi
67a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i rkang pa la phyag btsal nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gang smras pa/ /'dod pa slan chad bdag mi 'tshal/ /'dod pa'i sred
67a5(mdo sde): pa spangs na ni/ /sangs rgyas mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /bdag gi sems kyis gang bsam pa'i/ /nongs pa de ni khyed la bshags/ /srog chags kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /byang
67a6(mdo sde): chub tu ni mos bskyed do/ /dga' bo/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po thabs mkhas pa des sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
67a7(mdo sde): byang chub la bslabs nas stan las langs te song ngo / /dga' bo/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par la ltos/ ngas sring mo de lung bstan to/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med
67b1(mdo sde): k yi lus brjes te bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu na kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
67b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo/ khyod rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba'i g.yo mi 'chang bar rig
67b3(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po bar snang de las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
67b4(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do/ /gal
67b5(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi dge pa'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur na/ ltung ba de 'dra 'byung zhing de lta bu'i ltung ba byung bas bskal pa brgya stong du sems can dmyal
67b6(mdo sde): bar btso bar gyur kyang bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba 'byung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro ba nyid du bgyi'o/ sems can gcig
67b7(mdo sde): po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba dang / yongs su 'bri bar ni mi bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po la legs so/ /
68a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ni/ snying rje chen po 'dis ltung ba thams cad spong ste/ rigs kyi bu/
68a2(mdo sde): ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol gyi'ang shin tu pha rol na khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nags kyi 'dabs na lo bzhi khri nyis stong
68a3(mdo sde): du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas de lo bzhi khri nyis stong 'das pa na rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa zhes bya bar phyin nas de grong khyer chen po der song ba dang / chu chun ma zhig gis
68a4(mdo sde): khye'u bzang po de mthong nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems dang ldan pas khye'u de'i mdun du brgyugs te phyag btsal to/ /de nas rigs kyi bu
68a5(mdo sde): khye'u skar mas bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo/ khyod ci 'dod/ mos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khye'u/ bdag khyod 'tshal lo/ /khos de la 'di skad ces
68a6(mdo sde): smras so| |sring mo/ kho po ni/ 'dod pa dgos pa ma yin no/ /mos de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te bdag khyod dang mjal bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag 'gum par
68a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas khye'u skar mas 'di snyam du bsam mo/ /gang bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas brtul zhugs gzhig pa ni/
68b1(mdo sde): bdag gi mi cha'o snyam nas nan gyis 'then te bud med des btang nas gom pa bdun 'phags pa dang / de gom pa bdun pa la gnas nas snying rje skyes te/ bdag gis brtul
68b2(mdo sde): zhugs 'di bshig nas sems can dmyal bar song bar gyur kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de myong bar bzod kyi/ bud med 'di shir 'ong gi /bde bar gyur cig
68b3(mdo sde): ces rigs kyi bu khye'u skar ma de kha slar log ste bud med de lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas sring mo/ khyod ci 'dod pa bya'i/ longs shig ces de skad smras so/ /de nas khye'u skar
68b4(mdo sde): ma lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du khyim na gnas nas slar yang mngon par byung ste tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bskyed nas shi 'phos pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /
68b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du de ltar ma lta zhig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nga ni/ khye'u skar mar gyur to//
68b6(mdo sde): grags 'dzin ma ni/ chu chun du gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga 'dod pa ngan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas kyang bskal pa stong phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor
68b7(mdo sde): ba la rgyab kyis bltas shing spangs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu ltos/ gang sems can gzhan dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba de byang chub sems dpa' thabs
69a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa ni/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te dge slong maud+gal gyi bu dang / shA ri'i bu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan du
69a2(mdo sde): zin na ni/ dge slong ko ka li ka de sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin
69a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa log par dad sel gyi gsung rab la dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de dgon pa'i brag phug cig na gnas pa nas rgyang mi ring bzhig
69a4(mdo sde): na drang srong lnga gnas pa las de'i tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po byung / dus ma yin pa'i char pa'ang cher bab pa dang / de nas bud med gnyis shig char pa'i
69a5(mdo sde): skyabs kyi phyir dge slong dri ma med pa'i brag phug tu zhugs te slar byung ba dang / drang srong rnams kyis mthong nas e ma ho/ /dge slong dri ma med pa 'di sdig 'dod pa'o//
69a6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa'o/ /zhes yid byung bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dri ma med pa'i sems kyis drang srong de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas
69a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so/ /de nas drang srong de dag gis dge slong dri ma med pa bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dug pa mthong nas bdag
69b1(mdo sde): cag gi gtsug lag las 'byung ba ltar na/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa nam mkha' la 'phags mi nus so snyam du sems par gyur nas de'i tshe yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal
69b2(mdo sde): te nyes pa bshags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te dge slong dri ma med pa nam mkha' la ma 'phags su zin na/ de'i tshe drang srong lnga'i lus sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung
69b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du khyod de ltar ma lta zhig /byang chub sems
69b4(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu nam mkha' la 'phags su zin na ni/ dge
69b5(mdo sde): slong ko ka li ka sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes gang du 'jug pa de
69b6(mdo sde): ni| nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ smad 'tshong ma thabs drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin tu lobs
69b7(mdo sde): pa nor 'dod pa ni/ skyes bu de las nor ma grub kyi bar du sems can de dag gi drung na ci nas kyang bdag gis lus gtong ba'ang ston pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyang mi sbed
70a1(mdo sde): par de lta de ltar gnas so/ /de nas phyis de la mi lta mi sems par 'dod de/ de phyir de la 'gyod par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub
70a2(mdo sde): s ems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'ang thabs mkhas pa gang gis sems can 'di dag bdag gis yongs su smin par bya bar shes nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
70a3(mdo sde): la dga' bas cung zad kyang mi sbed cing bdag gi lus gtong bar byed pa ston pa'i bar du sems can de dag gi drung du de lta de ltar gnas te/ nam zhig e ma'o sems
70a4(mdo sde): can 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin te/ phyin chad de las lhag par gzhag tu mi nus par shes nas ni/ de la mi lta zhing dga' bas rtse ba thams cad kyang btang ste
70a5(mdo sde): 'gro'o| |de la rag las pa'i sems kyang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byol song du gtogs pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa bung ba zhes bya ba de me tog thams cad
70a6(mdo sde): kyi dri la snom pa'ang gang du'ang rtag par sred pa mi sgom mo/ /dri dang lo ma'ang mi 'phrog go /de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dod pa'i dga'
70a7(mdo sde): ba dang / rtse ba thams cad kyang spyod kyang gang du'ang rtag par sred pa mi skyed/ bdag dang gzhan nyams par yang mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa bon
70b1(mdo sde): yongs su gdungs pa ni/ kha dog nyams pa med kyang ljang bu 'byung bar mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes rab
70b2(mdo sde): yongs su bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa ni/ dga' ba dang / rtse ba thams cad la spyod kyang de ltung bar 'gro ba yongs su mi len/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan las kyang yongs su mi nyams
70b3(mdo sde): so| |rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nya pa shin tu bslabs pa ni/ skud pa gcig la gzan ma btags pa'i mchil pa sbyar nas mtsho chen por bcug ste/ de gang dang gang
70b4(mdo sde): gi tshe na 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe skud pa de mtsho chen po nas 'dren to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
70b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan por sbrel nas 'dam rdzab chen por ltung zhing de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
70b6(mdo sde): sems de bsrungs pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ spags kyi rig 'dzin gyi skyes bu
70b7(mdo sde): r gyal pos bzung ste zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings su zin kyang de gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe de sngags kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcig gis bcings pa thams
71a1(mdo sde): cad gtubs te 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa'ang gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dga' ba myong zhing de dag gis
71a2(mdo sde): r gyas par gyur kyang gang gi tshe 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan
71a3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu bcom ste shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon ral gri rnon po
71a4(mdo sde): gcig mi mngon par thogs nas 'gron pa mang po'i sel byed na/ de la sems can gang mi shes pa de dag ni/ mda' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon de la mi 'di ni/ mda'
71a5(mdo sde): gzhu yang med/ mtshon cha gzhan yang med/ g.yog kyang med de/ 'di ni/ bdag gi skyabs kyang mi nus na/ 'gron pa'i lta ci smos/ mi rgod las rgyal bar lta ga la
71a6(mdo sde): nus te| 'di ni/ de dag tu mi rigs par sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes snying rje sgom mo/ /de nas mda' dang mtshon gyi slob dpon de 'brog dgon pa'i dbus
71a7(mdo sde): su phyin te mi rgod mang po byung ba mda' dang mtshon gyi phyir go cha legs par bgos nas mtshon che de la yongs su btags te mi rgod de dag la 'debs so/ /des mi
71b1(mdo sde): rgod de dag thams cad srog dang phral nas slar yang mtshon cha de lag par 'jog go / de bzhin du rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab
71b2(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshon cha shin tu thogs nas thabs mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod de/ de la gang dag de'i lus kyi dbang po
71b3(mdo sde): mthong na de dag ma dad par byed cing / 'di ni/ 'di ltar bag med par gnas te/ 'di ni/ bdag thar par yang mi nus na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/ bdud las
71b4(mdo sde): rgyal bar lta ga la 'gyur zhes snying rje skyed par byed mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de thabs mkhas pa shin tu yongs su blangs pas nam 'dod pa de'i tshe des shes
71b5(mdo sde): rab kyi mtshon gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dral nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bud med g.yem pa med pa gzhan du 'gro'o/ /yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa'
71b6(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ste/ bsod snyoms de spyod pa las khyim bdag gi khyim du phyin pa dang / de
71b7(mdo sde): n as bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog ces bya ba khang thog na 'dug pas dge slong gi sgra thos nas zas thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa g.yas yod song
72a1(mdo sde): ngo / /de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog gis mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa'i skad dang bltas pa las rjes su rtogs
72a2(mdo sde): p a'i mtshan ma bzung nas 'dod chags kyis yongs su bzung ba'i sems kyi 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs shing 'greng bzhin du lus thams cad kyang brtul nas
72a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus byas nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog mthong ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
72a4(mdo sde): la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa byung ba dang / de'i tshe de la chags pa zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yin zhes dran pa skyes nas ci mig de chags pa'am zhe na/ mig kyang tshor ba
72a5(mdo sde): med pa| byed pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa/ sha'i phung po ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir tshor ba med do/ /'o na rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags
72a6(mdo sde): pa'am zhe na/ des nang yang rung / phyi yang rung / 'dod chags par 'gyur ba'am/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so/ /des ma dmigs nas
72a7(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi sems de bsal te de'i lus pags pa dang shas g.yogs pa'i rkang pa'i mthil yan chad spyi bo'i bar du brtags so/ /des yang dag pa ji lta bar
72b1(mdo sde): brtags nas chos thams cad mi skye bar rtogs te mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / de dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la shing ta la gang
72b2(mdo sde): tsam du 'phags nas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po lan bdun du bskor te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
72b3(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga'
72b4(mdo sde): bo| khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bar byed pa bar snang las 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das
72b5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa des ni/ 'dod chags kyi sems las chos thams cad yongs su brtags so/ /bdud kyi sde btul
72b6(mdo sde): lo| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ /de nas bu mo bsod nams ldan mchog shi ma thag tu bud med kyi lus las gyur te shi 'phos pa dang / mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum
72b7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes so/ /de skyes ma thag tu gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa'ang byung /g.yog
73a1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo bzhi khri bzhi stong yang skyes nas de'i tshe de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis 'dir skyes par gyur ces shes pa skyes te/ de bsam pa dang /
73a2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag gi bu mor gyur pa las/ de na bdag gi 'dod chags kyi sems kyis byang chub sems
73a3(mdo sde): dpa' dga' bar byed pa mthong nas bdag gi sems 'dod pa'i chags pas kun tu gzir te 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / bdag bud med kyi lus las gyur te bdag gis
73a4(mdo sde): skyes pa'i lus thob nas bdag gis rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa 'di dag thob bo snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags kyi sems kyis rnam
73a5(mdo sde): par smin pa'ang 'di yin na/ gang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar byed pa la phyag bya ba'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba lta ci smos kyi/ gang bdag rtse ba'am/
73a6(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa de rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ltar bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / dga' bar byed pa ga la ba der 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas lha'i
73a7(mdo sde): bu de 'khor dang bcas te me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams thogs nas kha dog tshad med pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste me tog dang /
73b1(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / byug pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas bcom
73b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas mi mchog rnams ni bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub rab mchog gnas rnams bsam mi
73b3(mdo sde): khyab| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams bsam mi khyab/ /grags chen rnams kyi spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /bdag ni mnyan du yod par bu mor gyur/ /tshong dpon bu mo ming ni
73b4(mdo sde): bsod nams mchog / bzang mo na tshod dang po dang yang ldan/ /pha dang ma'ang byams shing yid du mchi/ /gang yang sangs rgyas ma smad pa yi sras/ /dga' bar byed ces bgyi
73b5(mdo sde): ba mthu po che/ /mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms phyir mchis pa/ /bdag gi pha yi khang par phyin pa dang / /yid du mchi zhing snyan pa'i sgra thos te/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' bas
73b6(mdo sde): bshos thogs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras po dga' byed pa/ /mthu bo che de gang na bar mchis nas/ /mthong ma thag tu bdag gis sems skyes pa/ /tshul bzhin ma
73b7(mdo sde): lags 'dod chags ldan par gyur/ /gal te bsam pa bzhin du ma grub na/ /bdag ni mi 'tsho 'chi ba'i dus bgyi snyam/ /tshig kyang smra ba nyid du ma nus te/ /bsod snyoms
74a1(mdo sde): de yang dbul bar ma nus nas/ /tshul bzhin ma lags 'dod chags kyis gdungs te/ /de nyid dag tu brtul nas gum par gyur/ /lus kun rdul
74a2(mdo sde): zhing shi bar shes gyur nas/ /bu mo'i pha dang ma ni ngu bar byed/ /ro lags par ni rab tu gnas par sems/ /gang phyir dge sbyong la yang tshig cing du/ /bcom ldan bdag
74a3(mdo sde): ni 'chi 'phor gyur ma thag / de tshe bdag ni bud med lus bor te/ /'od gsal skyes pa'i lus 'di thob par gyur/ /gum nas bdag kyang mtho ris 'jig rten skyes/ /bdag gis
74a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang 'di mchog grub pa/ /rin chen rgyu ste de 'dra su la'ang med/ /lha yi bu mo stong phrag bcu bzhi 'di/ /bdag gis g.yog tu thob bo bcom ldan 'das/ /de tshe
74a5(mdo sde): bdag kyang 'di 'dra'i sems skyes te/ /'di 'dra rnam smin bzang po las dag gi /de ltar bsam nas 'di snyam du gyur te/ /'di ni 'dod chags sems kyi rnam smin to/ /dga'
74a6(mdo sde): byed mgu byed mkhas pa 'od byed la/ /bdag gis chags pa'i sems kyis brtags pa dang / /de yi las kyi rnam smin 'di 'dra ste/ /de tshe bdag ni 'bar ba'i mthu can gyur/ /
74a7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes gar 'jug pa/ /de ni nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas/ /de dag sar ni gzhar yang mi 'gyur te/ /'dod chags sems kyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra
74b1(mdo sde): na| |bdag gi bkur sti bgyi ba ci smos te/ /bdag gis rgyal ba 'di yi spyan sngar ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub mchog thob smon/ /bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du spyad/ /
74b2(mdo sde): bdag gi yi dam gtang bar mi bgyi ste/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dga' bar byed pa la/ /mchod pa yangs shing rgya chen dag kyang bgyi/ /mngon par byang chub phyir
74b3(mdo sde): zhugs ma gtogs par/ /gzhan du 'dren pa rnams la mchod mi 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pa dam pa kun spyod cing / /'dod chags sems kyis bdag la gang lta
74b4(mdo sde): ba| |de dag bud med lus ni spangs gyur nas/ /thams cad mi 'jigs skyes bur 'gyur bar shog /sangs rgyas mthus ni lha yi bu pho de/ /pha ma'i drung du song ste tshig
74b5(mdo sde): smras pa| |dge sbyong la ni zhe sdang khro ma byed/ /yun ring dus su sdug bsngal gyur ta re/ /gang yang bsod nams ldan mchog shi ba de/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang skal pa
74b6(mdo sde): mnyam/ /'dir ni bud med lus kyang brjes gyur nas/ /'od gsal lha yi bu pho mdzes par gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa de yi gan song ste/ /khro sems nyes pa de ni bshags par
74b7(mdo sde): gyis/ /sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ /sems can dag gi mgon skyabs gzhan med do/ /'jigs pa med pa des ni bskul ba dang / /pha dang mas
75a1(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /thams cad tshogs te lhan cig 'grogs gyur nas/ /shAkya thub pa'i drung du song bar gyur/ /skyes bu dam pa'i zhabs la
75a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ /khro sems nyes pa dag kyang bshags byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la yang skyabs song ste/ /bde gshegs rang byung la yang zhu ba zhus/ /ji tsam
75a3(mdo sde): gyis na 'dren la mchod par 'gyur/ /chos dang dge 'dun la yang ji ltar mchod/ /zhus pa de yang so sor lung bstan gsol/ /thos nas de bzhin lags kyis mchi bar
75a4(mdo sde): bgyi| |rgyal bas de dag gi ni sems mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten mgon gyis yang dag tshig gsungs pa/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/ /byang chub phyir ni
75a5(mdo sde): brtan pa'i sems skyed cig / bu mo'i pha dang ma dang gnyen rnams dang / /lnga brgya mi nyung tshang pa de dag kyang / /skyes bu khyu mchog gi ni tshig thos nas/ /de'i tshe byang chub
75a6(mdo sde): phyir ni sems bskyed do/ /de'i tshe dga' bo dag la bka' stsal pa/ /ji skad smras pa bzhin du dga' bo nyon/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam spyod bsam mi khyab/ /
75a7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa yi shes rab de bzhin no/ /dga' byed smon lam phyi phyir 'debs pa ni/ /bud med gang dag chags sems kyis blta ba/ /de ni bud med lus kyang yongs
75b1(mdo sde): spangs te/ /skyes bu yangs pa'i sems can 'gyur bar shog /dga' po 'di yi yon tan ci 'dra ltos/ /gang gis sems can gzhan dag dmyal 'gro ba/ /de nyid dpa' bo dag
75b2(mdo sde): la chags bskyed nam/ /mtho ris su ni skyes bur 'gyur bar shog /lha'i bu de yis nga la bkur sti byas/ /gus dang bcas pas byang chub mchog gnas te/ /bskal pa mang por sangs
75b3(mdo sde): rgyas mchod byas nas/ /shin tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lnga brgya gang dag byang chub la gnas pa/ /de dag rnams kyang mi yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la dad phyir
75b4(mdo sde): bde ba bsam yas na/ /mgon po la ni bkur sti su mi byed/ /gang dag dga' bar byed la chags sems pa/ /bud med lus spangs skyes par gyur pa ni/ /gcig dang gnyis
75b5(mdo sde): dang gsum ni ma yin gyi/ /bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag mang po ste/ /rtsi yi rgyal po grags pa chen po yi/ /byang chub de la zhe sdang su zhig skyed/ /nyon mongs las kyang bde ba sbyin
75b6(mdo sde): byed na| |de la bkur sti byed pa smos ci dgos/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
75b7(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab lhun po'i drung du gang sems dad kyang rung / sems zhe sdang yang rung / /sems chags pa'ang rung / chos la bar chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste mchi
76a1(mdo sde): na| de thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi kha dog go /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang su'ang rung / byang chub sems dpa'i
76a2(mdo sde): drung du sems dad dam/ sems zhe sdang ngam/ sems chags pa'am/ chos la bar chad bgyid pa'i sems kyang rung ste mchi na/ de dag thams cad kha dog gcig tu 'gyur ba
76a3(mdo sde): ni| 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi kha dog go /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ de ring phan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ri rab lhun po 'dra bar
76a4(mdo sde): 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sman gyi rnam pa blta na bzang ba la sems can su'ang rung ste/ nang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis
76a5(mdo sde): bltas na/ nad de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ste/ sems dad pa'am/ sems zhe sdang pa'am/ sems
76a6(mdo sde): chags pas byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/ de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
76a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin nas dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /dga' bo/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs
76b1(mdo sde): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa rab tu ngo mtshar to/ /
76b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du slar yang 'dod pa'i khams su'ang
76b3(mdo sde): gda'o| |stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la'ang ma reg la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
76b4(mdo sde): la'ang 'bab par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa la gnas la de ni/ 'di lta ste/
76b5(mdo sde): chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad la spyod kyang de dag la chags par mi bgyid do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
76b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams las brtsams te dpe chung zad cig gsol bar bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spro bas so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag spobs so/ /bka' stsal
76b7(mdo sde): pa| 'od srung / khyod spongs bar gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'brog dgon pa zhig mchis la/ 'brog dgon pa de na rtsig pa 'khor ba'i
77a1(mdo sde): rtse mo'i bar du phyin pa zhig kyang mchis par gyur/ dgon pa de na chab sgo'ang gcig bu zhig mchis par gyur/ 'brog dgon pa de na srog chags brgya
77a2(mdo sde): stong du ma'ang mchis par gyur/ 'brog dgon pa de nas shin tu rgyang mi ring ba zhig na grong khyer zhig kyang mchis la 'byor ba dang / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang mi'i
77a3(mdo sde): skye bos gang bar gyur/ gang dag grong khyer der mchis pa de dag kyang rga ba dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur la/ grong khyer chen po de'i shul ni/ mtho gang tsam du gyur la/ de
77a4(mdo sde): na g.yas g.yon du g.yangs khru 'bum mchis par gyur cing / 'brog dgon pa de'i dbus na sems can mkhas pa/ zhi ba pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ don 'tshal ba/
77a5(mdo sde): phan par 'tshal ba/ 'byor pa dang bde bar 'tshal ba gcig cig skyes la des 'brog dgon pa der sems can de dag la 'brog dgon pa 'di nas shin tu rgyang
77a6(mdo sde): mi ring bzhig na grong khyer zhig yod de/ der su 'gro ba de ni/ rga ba dang 'chi bar mir gyur gyi/ kye sems can dag /tshur shog / grong khyer chen po dar 'dod ngo / /
77a7(mdo sde): bas ni| khyed yongs su drang ngo / /zhes de skad sgra bsgrags/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / de na gang dman pa la mos shing 'byung ba'i bsam pa mchis pa de dag ni/
77b1(mdo sde): bdag cag bstan pa de dang / yul der mchi'ang 'tshal na/ 'di nas kyang mi 'phags la gang grong khyer de na yon tan mchis pa de dag kyang 'di na mchis bzhin du 'byung
77b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig ces mchi'o/ /gang chen po la mos pa de dag ni/ bdag kyang mchi ste/ khyod ji lta ba bdag cag kyang de 'dra'o/ /zhes de skad mchi'o/ /gang bsod nams chung ba de
77b3(mdo sde): dag ni| sgra de thos pa dang / thos nas yid ches par mi bgyid do/ /de nas skyes bu mkhas pa de 'brog dgon pa de nas byung nas lam de mthong ngo / /des shul mtho gang tsam
77b4(mdo sde): po de mthong nas song ba pha dang lam gyi g.yas phyogs na'ang g.yangs khru 'bum dang / g.yon phyogs na'ang g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis nas de'i lam g.yas g.yon du des rtsig
77b5(mdo sde): pa'i rten bcas te gra bzhis shul de rgal bar bgyid cing g.yas su'ang mi lta/ g.yon du'ang mi lta/ de'i rgyab nas dgra rnams sgra sgrog cing 'jigs par ston kyang de kha phyir yang
77b6(mdo sde): mi lta ste| lam du zhugs pa dang / ji lta ji ltar mchi ba de lta de ltar grong khyer chen po mthong ngo / /de lta de ltar de'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang ma mchis so/ /grong khyer
77b7(mdo sde): chen po der phyin nas sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don yang bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'brog dgon pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar 'khor ba'i 'brog
78a1(mdo sde): dgon par blta bar bgyi'o/ /rtsig pa 'khor ba'i rtse mo'i bar du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar ma rig pa dang / sred pa dang / srid par blta bar
78a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |srog chags brgya stong mang po 'brog dgon po de na mchis zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad du blta bar bgyi'o/ /chab sgo gcig
78a3(mdo sde): cas bgyi ba ni/ de ltar theg pa gcig gi lam du blta bar bgyi'o/ /skyes bu mkhas pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por blta
78a4(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o/ /sems can dman pa la dad pa 'byung ba'i bsam pa mchis pa gnas de nas kyang mi 'phags la/ grong khyer gyi yon tan kyang 'tshal zhes bgyi ba ni/
78a5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su blta bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan dag bdag cag kyang mchi ste/ khyod ci 'dra ba bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /zhes mchi ba ni/ de ltar
78a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag tu blta bar bgyi'o/ /sgra thos kyang yid ches par ma gyur ces bgyi ba ni/ de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dag tu blta bar bgyi'o/ /
78a7(mdo sde): 'brog dgon po nas 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus su blta bar bgyi'o/ /shul mtho gang tsam zhes bgyi
78b1(mdo sde): ba ni| de ltar chos kyi dbyings su blta bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas phyogs na g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar nyan thos kyi sar blta bar bgyi'o/ /g.yon phyogs
78b2(mdo sde): na g.yang sa khru 'bum mchis zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sar blta bar bgyi'o/ /g.yas g.yon gyi phyogs su rtsig pa'i rten bcas zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar
78b3(mdo sde): thabs khas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i brtson 'grus su blta bar bgyi'o/ /gra bzhis mchi bar bgyid ces bgyi ba ni/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi
78b4(mdo sde): sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis rnams sdud pa la bgyi'o/ /rgyab logs nas dgra'i mi dag 'jigs pa ston ces bgyi ba ni/ de ltar bdud dang
78b5(mdo sde): bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams su blta bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du gang sems can ma rungs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbya bar bgyi/ bsting bar bgyid/ smod par
78b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa gzhan dag pa'ang blta bar bgyi'o/ /kha phyir mi lta zhes bya ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam pa lhag pa'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /g.yas g.yon
78b7(mdo sde): du mi lta zhes bgyi ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi 'tshal bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dwags lags so/ /ji lta ji ltar grong khyer mthong
79a1(mdo sde): ba de lta de ltar 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhes bgyi ba ni/ de ltar ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang
79a2(mdo sde): ye shes la rtog pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pa de lta de ltar sems can rnams la mi 'jigs shing the tshom ma chis
79a3(mdo sde): pa la bgyi'o/ /grong khyer du phyin nas sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don gyid ces bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig bla dwags lags so/ /bcom ldan
79a4(mdo sde): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ye shes dang ldan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyags 'tshal lo/ /de nas
79a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung / legs so legs so/ /'od srung / khyod kyis 'dir dpe bshad pas
79a6(mdo sde): lha dang mi'i skye rgu srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa la
79a7(mdo sde): gnas pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gang bdag gnod par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la gnod par
79b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las de lta bu mi byed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
79b2(mdo sde): 'das| 'on ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab las mgo reg 'di mthong bas chog go /dge
79b3(mdo sde): sbyong mgo reg 'di la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon pa'o/ /zhes tshig smras par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad ces smras pa'i don gang lags/ de
79b4(mdo sde): skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chog go /de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
79b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la drod ma 'dzin cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ thabs mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ skyes bu dam
79b6(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ ji ltar ci nus kyang sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
79b7(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs khyod la bshad do/ /ji ltar byang chub sems dpas mar me mdzad tshun chad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs bstan/
80a1(mdo sde): de las cung zad tsam zhig bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
80a2(mdo sde): pa tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' 'khrul pa med/ ca co med/ dran pa nyams pa med de/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa ni/ 'dod na nub bdun
80a3(mdo sde): gyis byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dod na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te slar yang srid par 'ongs
80a4(mdo sde): na shes rab kyi stobs kyis mthu bskyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe 'tshang rgya'o/ /'dod na phyi ma'i mthar thug par gnas kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ de ni/ byang chub
80a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa
80a6(mdo sde): bzhin du ting nge 'dzin zhi ba yin te/ de'i lus kyang mi g.yo/ /de'i sems kyang mi g.yo zhing bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa'
80a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ni/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas sems can yongs su smin par byed cing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i brtson 'grus kyang mi
80b1(mdo sde): gtong / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na dga'
80b2(mdo sde): ldan gyi khang pa na 'dug bzhin du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor bar 'gyur na/ gang dzam+bu'i gling gi yi de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir
80b3(mdo sde): lha'i khang par 'gro mi nus nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lha dag ni/ chos nyan pa'i phyir dzam+bu'i gling du 'bab nus kyi/ dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni/ chos nyan
80b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir lha'i khang par 'gro mi nus so snyam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dzam+bu'i gling du byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i
80b5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas par blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/ ma'i mngal gyi khyim du ma zhugs par de'i mod nyid la byang chub
80b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ de la sems can kha cig the tshom ma skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lha'am/ dri za'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'di ga las 'ongs pa
80b7(mdo sde): zhig ces de dag the tshom du gyur nas chos nyan par mi 'gyur bas rgyu de dang / rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngal du gnas par ston te/ de'ang byang chub sems
81a1(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mngal gyi mal du zhugs so snyam du khyod de ltar ma lta zhig /byang
81a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni/ mngal gyi mal du zhugs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de
81a3(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs nas ma song bzhin du byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' shing 'phos so snyam du 'dzin cing
81a4(mdo sde): de na de mi mthong med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi gnas nas kyang mi g.yo la sprul pas bya ba thams cad dang / mngal du 'jug pa dang /
81a5(mdo sde): skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' bar spyod pa thams cad ston te/ de thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
81a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni/ gtsang mar spyod pas slar yang mngal gyi mal du mi 'jug ste/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
81a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ban glang gi bu dkar bor bsgyur te ma'i mngal du 'jug par ston ce na/ dkar po'i phyogs yin pa'i tha tshig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
81b1(mdo sde): can thams cad dang khyad zhugs pas de'i phyir ci nas kyang lha dang yang mi 'dra/ mi dang yang mi 'dra bar de ltar 'jug pa bstan par bya dgos te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i
81b2(mdo sde): thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na zla ba dgur mi gnas par zla ba bcur gnas she na/ sems can kha cig kye ma'i 'di ni/
81b3(mdo sde): mngal na gnas pa'i dus ma tshang bas dbang po nyams pa zhig byung ngo / /zhes de ltar sems pa'i phyir mngal na dbang po yongs su rdzogs par ston pas zla ba bcur gnas
81b4(mdo sde): kyi dgur ma yin te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' grong dang grong khyer du ma skyes kyi dgon par
81b5(mdo sde): skyes she na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ yun ring po nas dgon pa shin tu dgon pa'i bsngags brjod par byed la dben pa na gnas shing gtsang mar spyod pa dang / khyim gyi
81b6(mdo sde): nang du song bar gyur na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis lha'i dri dang / phye ma dang / me tog dag gis rgyun ma chad par mchod pa byed mi nus pa dang / grong khyer ser
81b7(mdo sde): skya'i sems can dag rab tu dga' bar gyur pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par skyes so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtol
82a1(mdo sde): te mngal gyi mal du zhugs she na/ sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ni/ pha ma'i mer mer po las gyur pa yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes pa ma
82a2(mdo sde): yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtol te zhugs so/ /zhugs nas rma dang bu gar ma gyur la
82a3(mdo sde): yum sgyu ma'ang de'i tshe bde ba myong ba lta bu sngon ma myong ngo / /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma shing blag sha'i yal ga la 'jus te sha 'chus su byas nas
82a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' skyes she na/ sems can gang dag lha mo sgyu ma ni/ bud med gzhan bzhin du sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed do snyam
82a5(mdo sde): d u de ltar sems pa'i sems can de dag la bde bar bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i mas shing blag sha'i yal ga la 'jus nas sha 'chus su byas te byang
82a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bskyed do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye gnas dang lus kyi phyogs gzhan nas mi 'byung bar ma'i mngal brtol te dran bzhin du
82a7(mdo sde): shes bzhin du mngal gyi lam nas byung zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gtsang mar spyod la 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi mchog yin pas/ de skye gnas
82b1(mdo sde): la'ang mi gnas shing skye ba bstan dgos la sems can tha ma gzhan dag dang yang mi 'dra ste/ de bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dku brtol nas mngal gyi mal nas
82b2(mdo sde): byung zhing skyes ma thag tu de'i tshe na glo la rma'ang med do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu brgya byin lha'i dbang pos blangs kyi mir gyur pa gzhan dag gis
82b3(mdo sde): ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa shin tu 'bar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu de ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po blangs par shog cig
82b4(mdo sde): ces smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu ma blangs par gom pa bdun bor gyi/ drug dang brgyad ma yin zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul dang /
82b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / skyes bu dam par sngon sus kyang ma bstan pa bstan dgos la sems can gang dag gi don gom par bdun por te bya ba de gom pa drug gis kyang mi nus
82b6(mdo sde): la| gom pa brgyad bor na'ang lhag par 'gyur bas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu blangs par gom pa bdun 'dor gyi/ drug dang brgyad ma yin no/ /ci'i
82b7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na| byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun bor nas pa ni/ 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar bya'o/ /zhes pa tshig tu smra zhe na/ 'khor de ni
83a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / lha mthu che ba dag lhags shing 'khor de nga rgyal can du gyur pa de dag bdag cag gtso bo yin gyi/ 'di ni/ ma yin no snyam du sems shing de
83a2(mdo sde): dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'dud par mi byed do/ /yang dag par 'dud par mi byed pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems te/
83a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang lha 'di dag yun ring por phan pa med par 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /zhes de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten na nga mchog go /nga mchog go /skye ba dang /
83a4(mdo sde): rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin to/ /zhes smra zhing sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bsgo ba dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' ma lhags
83a5(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang sgra des lhags par gyur nas de'i tshe tshangs pa de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag byang chub sems dpa' la thal mo sbyar nas btud par gyur to/ /rgyu de dang /
83a6(mdo sde): rkyen de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten na nga mchog go /nga mchog go /skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar phyin to/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig smra'o/ /ci'i phyir
83a7(mdo sde): na/ byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher rgod ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ g.yem pa'i rgod pa'am/ cher rgod pa med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'di
83b1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di dag ni/ 'di nyid du nga dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ngas byang chub thob kyang 'di dag le lor gyur pas da dung 'khor
83b2(mdo sde): ba stug por lus te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba'i thar pa'i lam la brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de dag da ltar bdag la phyag
83b3(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ de dag ji ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po bskyed nas dman pa dang / bag med pa'i sems can dang /
83b4(mdo sde): bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gad mo cher rgod do/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med bzhin du khrus byed ce na/
83b5(mdo sde): brgya byin dang tshangs pas mchod pa'i las byas pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nges par 'jig rten shes pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya dgos so/ /skye ba mthong nas
83b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyang nges par khrus bya'o/ /'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ ci'i phyir na/
83b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dgon par skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar de nas slar khyim du 'jug ce na/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / slas la
84a1(mdo sde): sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir dga' ba dang / rtse ba chen po de dag bstan nas khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar byed do/ /gling chen po bzhi spang bar bstan
84a2(mdo sde): pas na| nga'i rjes su slob pa gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang / rtse ba chen po spangs nas rab tu byung ba'i phyir khyim nas mngon par 'byung ste/ rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir byang
84a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' slar khyim du zhugs so/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma bdun lon pa dang ma 'chi ba'i dus byed ce na/ lha mo sgyu ma tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i
84a4(mdo sde): dus byas kyi/ byang chub sems dpas nyes pa ni/ ma yin no/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nyid na gnas shing lha'i mig gis lha mo sgyu ma'i
84a5(mdo sde): tshe la brtags nas nam lha mo sgyu ma'i tshe zla ba bcu dang nyi ma bdun lus par shes pa dang / de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos
84a6(mdo sde): te ma'i mngal du 'jug go / de bas na/ rnam grangs des kyang lha mo sgyu ma ni/ tshe zad nas 'chi ba'i dus byas kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin no/ /ci'i phyir na/
84a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzo slob ce na/ 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir du zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
84b1(mdo sde): na gtsug lag gam/ glu'am/ gar ram/ sngags sam/ rig sngags sam/ thabs sam/ rgod pa'am/ cha ba'am/ rtse ba'am/ blta ba gang yang thog mar ma bslabs pa med do/ /
84b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' chung ma len ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'dod pa dgos par byed pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de ni/ de'i tshe
84b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang bral ba yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nges par skyes par bstan dgos te/ sems can kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la skyes pa ma yin gyi/ nga la ma
84b4(mdo sde): ning gi rang bzhin can no/ /zhes de snyam du sems par mi 'gyur zhing de dag gi the tshom gcad pa dang / 'di lta ste/ sras nor sbyin len bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems
84b5(mdo sde): dpas shAkya'i bu mo grags 'dzin la sogs pa blangs so/ /nor sbyin 'dzin mer mer po las gyur pa'o/ /zhes gang de snyam du 'dzin na de ltar mi blta'i/ nor sbyin 'dzin
84b6(mdo sde): ni| lha las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pas pha ma'i mer mer po las gyur pa ma yin gyi/ rdzus te skyes par shes par bya'o/ /yang sngon gyi smon lam gyis shAkya'i bu mo
84b7(mdo sde): grags 'dzin blangs pa yin te/ mar me mdzad tshun chad skye ba'i tha ma'i bar du khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
85a1(mdo sde): pa de'ang slu bar mi 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir shAkya'i bu mo grags 'dzin blangs so/ /yang sems can 'di dag ni/ 'dod pa'i nyes pa can khyim gyi bya ba
85a2(mdo sde): la zhen pa yin pas de dag spangs te rab tu 'byung bar mi nus nas de dag gi phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po g.yog len to/ /yang 'di ni/ chung
85a3(mdo sde): ma bzang mo'i g.yog 'di lta bu spangs te rab tu byung na/ bdag ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung zhes de snyam du sems par 'gyur zhing / yang byang chub sems dpas byang
85a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ gang bud med gzhon nu dag yongs su smin par byas nas de dag kyang mdza' ba yid gcugs pas srid pa tha ma'i bar du bdag
85a5(mdo sde): cag ni| khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig ces smon lam btab la/ de dag gi chos dkar po de rnams kyang shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
85a6(mdo sde): g.yog len te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' slas kyi nang na gnas nas bud med bzhi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par
85a7(mdo sde): byas so| |lhag ma dag kyang mi ltung ba'i chos dang ldan par byas so/ /rnam grangs de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' g.yog len gyi/ gang bud med 'dod chags
85b1(mdo sde): kyi yongs su gdung bas yongs su gdungs pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ma thag tu bdag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/
85b2(mdo sde): bdag gi chu zheng dang 'dra bar sprul pa dag sprul nas bud med de dag sprul pa de rnams dang rtse dga' yongs su spyod cing / bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig
85b3(mdo sde): tu rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod do snyam du sems mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba dang / bde ba la gnas
85b4(mdo sde): so| |'di la sprul pa rnams kyi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba mar me mdzad tshun chad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa la yongs su spyod pa thams
85b5(mdo sde): cad kyang de bzhin du blta'o/ /bran tsan+ta ka dang / rta kan+ta ka'ang sngon gyi smon lam las gyur par blta'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing dzam+bu'i grib ma na bsam
85b6(mdo sde): gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' de na gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun cu brtul zhing de nges par mngon par khyim nas 'byung bar pha ma la bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i
85b7(mdo sde): phyir na| skyed mos tshal du song zhe na/ rgas pa dang / nad kyis btab pa dang / 'chi ba bstan pa'i phyir te/ gnyen dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi bas
86a1(mdo sde): 'jigs skrag nas khyim nas mngon par 'byung gi/ gnyen la gnod par 'dod pa ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes de ltar shes par gyur to/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub
86a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' mtshan mo nam phyed kyi dus kyi tshe khyim nas mngon par 'byung gi nyin mo mi 'byung zhe na/ de na 'dug na dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phel nas chos dkar po 'dod
86a3(mdo sde): pas nam phyed nas ma dris par de nas 'gro bar bya ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad kyang spang bar bya'i/ chos dkar po'i phyogs ni/ yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes sems
86a4(mdo sde): can rnams la bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir na/ skye bo dag gnyid kyis log par byas she na/ lha rnams kyis nyes par bstan pa'i phyir te/ skye bo dag byang chub sems
86a5(mdo sde): dpa' la zhe sdang gi tha ba skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / de dag yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / ltung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir lha rnams kyis gnyid
86a6(mdo sde): log par byas te/ lha rnams kyis sgo phye nas lha rnams kyis bar snang las khrid pas lha rnams kyis nyes kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ byang chub
86a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma nyes so/ /zhes dad pa rnyed par mthong nas gnyid log par byas so/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' rang gis ral
86b1(mdo sde): gris skra bcad ce na/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi'am ci gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang /
86b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te skra gcod nus pa su'ang med cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma des thos nas kyang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis skra bcad par mthong nas khro
86b3(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur zhing / sus nga'i bu'i skra bcad ces de la bsad pa'am/ chad par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /ci'i phyir na/ rta dang rgyan rnams bran tsan+ta ka'i lag tu byin
86b4(mdo sde): ce na |chog shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gser dngul mi 'dod cing dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar rab tu 'byung bar bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /yang byang chub sems
86b5(mdo sde): d pas skye bo phyi ma dag bslab dgos te bstan pa 'di la gang rab tu byung ba de dag nga'i rjes su slob cing dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas
86b6(mdo sde): nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/ thog ma nyid nas rab tu 'byung ba'i 'tsho ba'i phyir rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ ci'i phyir na/ byang
86b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa nyon cig / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ las kyis bsgribs pa'i nyes pas dka' ba spyod pa spyad pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub
87a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas ni/ nges par sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba bstan dgos te/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
87a2(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces smras pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
87a3(mdo sde): mkhas par blta'o/ /dgongs pa'i tshig tu blta'o/ /byang chub sems dpas ji ltar dgongs te tshig de skad smras she na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
87a4(mdo sde): khye'u skar ma skyong gi ne'u ldangs bram ze'i bu shing sA la chen po lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas pa lnga yod do/ /de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis
87a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems brjed par gyur nas rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi brtul zhugs can ma yin te/ mu stegs kyi brtul zhugs ldan pa/ mu stegs
87a6(mdo sde): gsang sngags la brtson pas bdag cag gi'ang byang chub yod do/ /bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas so/ /zhes bdag nyid ston par 'dzin to/ /de nas khye'u skar ma skyong
87a7(mdo sde): gis rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag snod du gyur par rtogs nas mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon na de mthong ste ci rung zhes mu stegs can
87b1(mdo sde): de dag gi drung du chig de skad smras so/ /khye'u skar ma skyong gis mu stegs can de dag gi drung du mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon pa'o/ /zhes
87b2(mdo sde): tshig de skad smras pas rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag rim gyis yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu/ khye'u skar ma skyong ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag dang sa'i
87b3(mdo sde): phyogs gzhan zhig na 'dug par gyur pa'i dus kyi tshe yod do/ /de nas rdza mkhan rje'u byed pa zhig sa'i phyogs de ga la ba der song nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
87b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod cing khye'u skar ma skyong la tshur shog / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
87b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung du 'dong ngo / /zhes de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas khye'u skar ma skyong 'di snyam du gyur to/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
87b6(mdo sde): su smin na/ gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod la mu stegs can gyi ni/ mi bsngags
87b7(mdo sde): pa brjod pa dang / rigs kyi bu de dag dogs shing 'ong du mi btub par 'gyur ro snyam nas khye'u skar ma skyong gis thog ma'i yid dam de nyid srung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu
88a1(mdo sde): phyin pa'i ye shes dang rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas pas mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon pa'o/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig smras
88a2(mdo sde): so| |ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes dang rgyu mthun pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ byang chub tu
88a3(mdo sde): 'du shes par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa med/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'du shes pa med/ byang chub sems dpar yang mi mthong / byang chub nang du'ang mi
88a4(mdo sde): mthong / byang chub phyi logs su'ang mi mthong / byang chub nang dang phyi logs su'ang mi mthong ste/ byang chub ni/ shin tu stong ngo snyam du sems shing khye'u skar ma skyong des
88a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ma dmigs nas thabs mkhas pas mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon ba'o/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/ /de nas khye'u
88a6(mdo sde): skar ma skyong ne'u ldangs lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu chu 'gram zhig na gnas pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag kun gdul ba'i dbang
88a7(mdo sde): du byang ba'i phyir rdza mkhan rje'u byed pas skar ma skyong mi 'gro ba dang skra nas bzung ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste/ gzhon
88b1(mdo sde): n u lnga po de dag gis kyang rdza mkhan rje'u byed pa de la shugs ma byed bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
88b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ma thag tu sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gyis dad pa rnyed do/ /de dag dad pa rnyed nas khye'u skar ma skyong la
88b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i ston pa bzhugs nas thog mar mi sbran par zhes gshe bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i bu shing sA la chen po lta bu lnga po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa
88b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / spobs pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
88b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis ci nas kyang rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gis mi skye ba'i
88b6(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de 'di lta ste/ nga
88b7(mdo sde): ni| sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis lung bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te khye'u skar ma skyong gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bsngags pa brjod du zin na/ /rigs kyi bu|
89a1(mdo sde): lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung du 'gro ba'i gnas dang / skabs med do/ /
89a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub la the tshom med mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag yongs su smin par bya
89a3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rgyu mthun pas mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig smras te/ de'ang byang
89a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga po de dag kyang smin par bya dgos la/ las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang bstan dgos pas
89a5(mdo sde): las de'i phyir ngas dka' ba spyod pa spyad de/ sems can gzhan dag mi shes pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag mthong nas tshig tu smra bar
89a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang / shes sam mi shes kyang rung ste smras na/ de'i phyir de dag yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / ltung bar
89a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes sems can de dag gi las kyi bya ba'ang bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar las ston mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' la las kyi sgrib pa
89b1(mdo sde): ni| gang yang med do/ /yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang de dag gis tshig rtsub po smras nas bdag cag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i skal ba med do snyam ste 'gyod pa la gnas shing
89b2(mdo sde): phyin chad mi brtson pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pas de skad kyi tshig smras na/ de'ang
89b3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i phyir skal pa yod na bdag cag mi shes pa lta ci smos zhes de dag nyes pa de 'chags shing gzhan dag kyang mi byed pa'i phyir de skad kyi tshig smras so/ /yang
89b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ mu stegs can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ngas lo drug tu dka' ba spyad kyi/ sgrib pa'i phyir ni/ ma yin no/ /dge sbyong dang bram ze dag til dang / rgya shug dang /
89b5(mdo sde): 'bras kyi 'brum bu re re za bas lo drug 'das par byas te de'ang 'phags pa'i lam ma thob na/ zas ngan pas rnam par dag par mi 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir byang
89b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mgo reg la'ang byang chub ga la yod/ byang chub ni/ shin tu dkon no/ /zhes de skad kyi tshig smras te/ las kyi bya ba de la dmigs
89b7(mdo sde): s hing lo drug tu dka' ba spyod pa spyad de byang chub sems dpas lo drug gis dman pa la dad pa'i lha dang phyi rol gyi drang srong 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ye shes
90a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i don byas par gyur to/ /de dag kyang dman pa la spyod pas yongs su smin par byas te/ rigs kyi bu/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs
90a2(mdo sde): mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rid bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du mi 'gro bar zas zos la stobs dang mthu bskyed de 'gro
90a3(mdo sde): zhe na| byang chub sems dpa' ni/ zas med par lus rid pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpas phyi mi'i skye bo dag la
90a4(mdo sde): snying brtse ba'i phyir zas zos te sems can mi mkhas pa dag zas med par ye shes tshol bar mi 'gyur bar byed de/ de dag bkres pas nyen na ye shes sgrub mi nus so/ /
90a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde bar gyur pa rnams ni/ chos mngon par smra'i/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ma yin te/ ci nas kyang nga'i rjes su slob cing sems can de dag bde bar
90a6(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zas zos so/ /grong gi bu mo byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems
90a7(mdo sde): dpas de'i zas zos te byang chub thob mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ting nge 'dzin gcig gis bskal pa stong du 'dug nus so/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems
90b1(mdo sde): dpa' rtswa dag tshol zhe na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtswa'i gding ba la dgyes kyi/ stan la dgyes par mi
90b2(mdo sde): mdzad pas chog shes par bya ba dang / rtswa thun bkra shis ldan byang chub kyi phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la rtswa phul bas rigs
90b3(mdo sde): kyi bu| de ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar 'gyur bar des de la lung
90b4(mdo sde): bstan to/ /ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
90b5(mdo sde): mi rgya bar bdud la sdod ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ bdud sdig can ni/ byang chub sems dpas skabs ma phye ma bskul bar 'ong ba'i gnas dang skabs med de/ de lta bu'i gnas med
90b6(mdo sde): kyang rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na dbang dang ldan
90b7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa'i sems can 'di dag sdig can de'i dbang du 'gro bar mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang bdag ni/ de nyid dang 'thab par
91a1(mdo sde): bya'o| |de btul na/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i 'khor chen po'ang 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud kyi 'khor dang / gnod sbyin
91a2(mdo sde): kyi 'khor dang / srin po'i 'khor dang / klu'i 'khor de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa 'di mthong nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur/ dad pa
91a3(mdo sde): rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang chung du na thos pa'am/ mthong ba de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas byang chub sems
91a4(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du song bas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od des bdud kyi khang pa thams cad kyang mog mog por byas te/ stong
91a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ 'od zer de las shAkya'i bu 'di ni/ shAkya'i rigs las khyim nas mngon par byung
91a6(mdo sde): ste| de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /khyod kyi yul las 'da' bar byed do/ /sems can dpag tu med
91a7(mdo sde): pa gzhan yang 'byin par byed do/ /bdud kyi g.yog med par gyur gyi/ song la de dang 'thab mo khye zhig ces de skad ces zer ba'i sgra byung ba dang / rigs kyi bu/ de
91b1(mdo sde): l tar thos ma thag tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu chen pos btab par gyur nas de'i tshe dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bshams te dpag tshad sum cur bdud kyi sdes gang bar byas
91b2(mdo sde): nas byang chub kyi shing drung du song ba dang / de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa chen po la gnas shing rin po che'i bsod nams las skyes pa'i
91b3(mdo sde): phyag gis bdud kyi sde pham par byas nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag
91b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas par blta'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
91b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub thob nas nyi ma bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig cing shing gi rgyal po la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'i
91b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu spyod lam zhi ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa skyil mo krung bcas shing bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' bar gyur to/ /de dag dga' zhing rab tu mgu
91b7(mdo sde): b a skyes nas gang bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems gang la gnas pa btsal lo snyam du gyur nas de dag gis nyin zhag bdun du brtags kyang sems kyi gnas
92a1(mdo sde): gcig kyang ma rnyed do/ /de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis shin tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ bdag
92a2(mdo sde): cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di 'dra bar rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam dang ma bral bar gnas shing de ltar byang chub kyi shing la blta bar bya'o snyam mo/ /rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir
92a3(mdo sde): d e bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub thob nas nyi ma bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig cing mig ma btsums par shing gi
92a4(mdo sde): rgyal po la lta'o/ /ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub thob nas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dbugs
92a5(mdo sde): phyung zhing gnyer bar byas nas tshangs pas ma gsol bar chos mi 'chad ce na/ 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lha dang mi dag phal cher tshangs pa la
92a6(mdo sde): stan te| bdag cag ni/ tshangs pas sprul ba'o/ /bdag cag ni/ tshangs pas bskyed pa'o/ /'jig rten na tshangs pa ma gtogs par ston pa gzhan med do snyam du 'dzin pas
92a7(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang ngas tshangs pa dgug go /tshangs pa la bstod do/ /tshangs pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / lha dang mi tshangs pa la bsten
92b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /chos len par sems par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ gsol nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'chad kyi/ ma gsol bar ni/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin
92b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mthu nyid kyis tshangs pa chos gsol ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song gi / tshangs pa nyid kyis bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos gsol lo snyam
92b3(mdo sde): du sems shing yid la byed pa'ang med do/ /tshangs pa la bsten pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa la bsten pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa bkug
92b4(mdo sde): ste| gang gi tshe na tshangs pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba de'i tshe na tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis de nyid gtso bo'o/ /
92b5(mdo sde): de nyid mchog go snyam nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud bcu bstan pa de'ang
92b6(mdo sde): thabs mkhas par blta'o/ /dgongs pa'i tshig tu'ang shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dper na/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skra'i rtse mo cha shas tsam dang yang ldan
92b7(mdo sde): zhing byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba'i skabs med/ de lta bu'i gnas med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos dkar po thams cad dang ldan zhing mi dge ba'i cho
93a1(mdo sde): thams cad spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar ba spang ba'ang med/ las kyi sgrib pas nyes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas kyang
93a2(mdo sde): med mod kyi/ sems can las kyi rnam par smin pa rab tu stor ba dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pas sems can de dag la las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa'i
93a3(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa las kyi rgyud ston te/ chos kyi rje nga nyid la'ang las kyi rnam par smin pa 'byung na/ khyed lta la ci'i phyir smin par mi 'gyur zhes de dag la ston mod
93a4(mdo sde): kyi| de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon yi ge dang phyag rgya bslabs pas byis pa la bstan pa'i phyir byis
93a5(mdo sde): pas slob tu gzhug pa'i tshul gyis yi ge'i phyi mo klog mod kyi/ de la mi shes pa'ang med/ las kyi sgrib pa'ang med de/ ci nas kyang byis pa dag bdag las thos nas slob par
93a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar yi ge phyi mo klog go / rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ chos thams cad la las kyi sgrib pa yongs su dag mod kyi/ ci nas kyang sems can gzhan
93a7(mdo sde): dag las yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de ltar 'chad do/ /de ltar chos ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ nad thams cad shin tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir shin tu bslabs pa'i
93b1(mdo sde): sman pa ni/ nad med cing sems can nad pa rnams kyi mdun du sman tsha ba de dag bzhag nas de dag nad las yongs su thar par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
93b2(mdo sde): pa'ang sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ nad thams cad yongs su thar cing sgrib pa med pa thob nas las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di yin no/ /zhes las ston cing / ji ltar na/ sems
93b3(mdo sde): can las kyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par 'gyur zhes ched du nang ston to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshong dpon gyi bu
93b4(mdo sde): byung nas ring po ma lon pa de la pha dang mas byin pa'i ma ma yod de/ de ni/ ma ma de khye'u de'i 'o ma dag par bya ba'i phyir nad med bzhin du tsha ba dang / kha ba'i sman de dag ched du
93b5(mdo sde): 'thung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'di bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'ang las kyi bya ba rab tu ston pa'i sems can rnams gzigs nas nad med par
93b6(mdo sde): gyur bzhin du nga las che ge mo zhig byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa 'di yin no/ /zhes nad ston cing de dag sems can rnams kyis thos nas skye ba thob par 'gyur te/
93b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de'ang thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na tshong pa nor 'dod pa'i phyir rgya mtsho mching rnam chen por zhugs pa lnga brgya
94a1(mdo sde): tsam yod de/ yang de'i tshe na lam grogs de dag gi nang na mi las ngan pa can/ sdig pa'i las can/ mda' dang mtshon la bslabs pa/ rku ba/ pha rol gyi nor
94a2(mdo sde): 'phrog pa tshong pa'i tshul du 'dug pa zhig yod de/ shin tu brtul ba'i phyir gru der zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas mi g.yo can de ni/ bdag gis tshong pa 'di thams cad
94a3(mdo sde): srog dang phral la nor thams cad khyer te dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe na lam grogs kyi gru na 'dug pa dag gi nang na ded dpon snying
94a4(mdo sde): rje chen po can zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /de nas ded dpon snying rje chen po can de gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du gang rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po de na lha 'dug pa dag gis lam
94a5(mdo sde): grogs kyi gru 'di na mi ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di lta bu slu bar byed pa gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa zhig yod de/ de ni/ tshong pa 'di thams cad srog dang phral la nor thams cad khyer
94a6(mdo sde): te dzam+bu'i gling du 'gro'o snyam du sems kyi/ de bas na/ mi 'di ni/ tshong pa 'di dag gsod par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
94a7(mdo sde): ltar tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin te/ gal te mi des byang
94b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag bsad du zin na/ de las kyi sgrib pa'i nyes pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' re re'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' re re'i zhing ji srid kyis bla na med pa
94b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de srid du sems can dmyal ba chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ de la ded dpon khyod kyis ci nas kyang mi 'di'ang de
94b3(mdo sde): ltar sems can dmyal bar ma song ba dang / de dag kyang bsad par mi 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i thabs smos shig ces rmi lam du bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas ded dpon de 'di
94b4(mdo sde): snyam du gyur te/ tshong pa 'di dag kyang mi bsad la/ mi 'di'ang sems can dmyal bar ma song bar bdag gis bya ba'i thabs gang yod ces sems par gyur cing / gzhan la'ang cung
94b5(mdo sde): zad kyang mi smra ba las zhag bdun rlung ma langs nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ mi 'di srog dang bral ba las thabs gzhan med do/ /de 'di snyam du sems
94b6(mdo sde): te| gal te tshong pa thams cad la spran kyang de dag ni/ mi dge ba'i sems kyis mi bsad cing de dag thams cad kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo snyam nas gal te bdag
94b7(mdo sde): gis mi 'di srog dang dbral te/ de'i phyir bdag sems can dmyal bar skyes kyang bskal pa brgya stong du phyi phyir sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar bzod kyi/ mi 'dis tshong
95a1(mdo sde): pa 'di dag bsad nas sdig pa 'phel bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du sems so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ ded dpon snying rje chen po can des byang chub sems
95a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag bsrung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po de dang / thabs mkhas pa des ched du bsam ste mi de mtshon shag tis bsad do/ /nga ni/ de'i tshe ded dpon snying rje chen po can zhes bya
95a3(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ ngas ni/ thabs mkhas pa de dang / snying rje chen po des bskal pa brgya phrag stong du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas so/ /mi de'ang shi 'phos
95a4(mdo sde): nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so/ /gang tshong pa lnga brgya po grur zhugs pa de dag ni/ phyis bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ ji snyam
95a5(mdo sde): du sems/ gang gis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la
95a6(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang yod dam/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod de ltar ma blta zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can gyi las kyi bya ba ston to/ /gang gi tshe na de bzhin
95a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug pa de'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
95b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rdo rje'i sku mi tshugs pa'i sku yin mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na skyes bu srid pa tha mar gyur pa nyi shu dang / skyes
95b2(mdo sde): bu nyi shu po de dag gi dgra bo skyes bu nyi shu yod de/ de nas skyes bu dgra bo nyi shu po de dag bdag gi g.yos dgra byed pa bdag cag ni/ mdza' bo ltar byas te khyim du song la srog dang
95b3(mdo sde): dbral lo snyam du de ltar rtog cing gcig la gcig kyang mi smra'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas srid pa tha mar gyur pa'i skyes bu nyi shu po dang / gang skyes bu de dag gsod par byed pa rnams
95b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus de de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes bu bzhi
95b5(mdo sde): bcu po de dag gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba dang / de'i tshe 'gro ba mang po'ang gdul ba'i dbang du bya ba'i phyir maud+gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud+gal gyi bu/ 'di nas sa chen po
95b6(mdo sde): las seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'byung ste/ 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g.yas pa la zug par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de skad kyi tshig gsungs nas ring por ma
95b7(mdo sde): lon par de nas de'i mod las chen po las seng ldeng gi tshal pa mtho gang tsam byung ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das/
96a1(mdo sde): bdag gis seng ldeng gi tshal pa 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dor ro/ /zhes de skad gsol pa dang / ngas de la maud+gal gyi bu /khyod kyis mi nus so/ /
96a2(mdo sde): zhes de skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas gnas brtan maud+gal gyi bu chen pos ci nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par
96a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa bzung yang seng ldeng gi tshal pa ni/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang ma 'phags so/ /
96a4(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'phags pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa'ang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'phags so/ /de nas de
96a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gdan la bzhugs pa dang / seng ldeng gi tshal pa'ang snga mkho bzhin du 'dug go /de bzhin du rgya mtsho mching rnam gyi dbus su bzhugs pa dang / seng
