220b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od la phyag
220b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga med dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
220b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo gros khyad par can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong go cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ bam po
220b4(mdo sde): brgyad pa ste/ tha ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'bar
220b5(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan snying po dpal
220b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan rnam par
220b7(mdo sde): dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phag pa'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thar par dgyes
221a1(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba dam pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
221a2(mdo sde): pa kun tu spyod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa las su byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
221a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad du grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu mar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdza' bar gtsug pa la phyag
221a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi dpal
221a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs rnam par 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo
221a6(mdo sde): skyon med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gling la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
221a7(mdo sde): rtsi'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zil gyis mi non pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
221b1(mdo sde): pa zla ba snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med thob pa
221b2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo mi 'khrul pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye bo dga' ba la phyag
221b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'chi ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
221b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drag por 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
221b5(mdo sde): pa srid pa'i mtha' ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
221b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa yon tan 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtse grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
221b7(mdo sde): rtse gcig pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs
222a1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sdud pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar nus pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
222a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rgol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtse gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
222a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bzhin spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dgyes pa
222a4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bsgyings
222a5(mdo sde): pa bzhin sgrog pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo 'khrul ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
222a6(mdo sde): pa blo mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
222a7(mdo sde): pa blo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor ba'i shing rta can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
222b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs su gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar chags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
222b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thub par bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
222b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa lha'i pad+mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan
222b4(mdo sde): gyi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don du dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa srung ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo 'gugs pa
222b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyid par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge ltar 'phar ba la
222b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung zhim pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mkhyen pa gsal
222b7(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi rten la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes go
223a1(mdo sde): cha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
223a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa sangs rgyas bsngags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par dgongs pa la phyag
223a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don shin tu brtags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen
223a4(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
223a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mnyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dka' ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
223a6(mdo sde): pa seng+ge dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rin che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
223a7(mdo sde): pa srid pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lam
223b1(mdo sde): grogs ded pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
223b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bzang bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
223b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa grags pa sdud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
223b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa gsal bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
223b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
223b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mkhas pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sas byin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
223b7(mdo sde): kun tu ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sbyor bar dgongs
224a1(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing rta phun sum can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
224a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos chud dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
224a3(mdo sde): pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
224a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ri bo gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
224a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phar ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
224a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs kyi snod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
224a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
224b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson ba brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lhas mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
224b2(mdo sde): pa 'jigs par mdzed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyid pa dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
224b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
224b4(mdo sde): pa gsung dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa cher 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi
224b5(mdo sde): gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub tu 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung drag por dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
224b6(mdo sde): blo gros drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub che ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
224b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
225a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bzang la
225a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu brtan par gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i
225a3(mdo sde): bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i grogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
225a4(mdo sde): bzang bar snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des par bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
225a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu snang ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
225a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bsgyings pa lhar dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa
225a7(mdo sde): ltar bzhud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rlung dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dregs pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa cher
225b1(mdo sde): 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs yid bzhin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla
225b2(mdo sde): ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyid par bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dang
225b3(mdo sde): ba'i dpal ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo sbyangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gyi mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes
225b4(mdo sde): rab shin tu dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thos pa zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sde rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo bden
225b5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa bzod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dam pa la
225b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klur 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa dgyes pa la phyag
225b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ut+pa la'i dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
226a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkra shis dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid
226a2(mdo sde): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zer sna tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
226a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khrel ba med pa'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
226a4(mdo sde): pa dbyangs snang mang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsang mar gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
226a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri zhim par bsung ba la pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dri bsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bzang ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal
226a6(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa rigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang brtsegs pa la phyag
226a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs ba snang ba rab tu 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bla mar dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mang por
226b1(mdo sde): dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa don du dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar kun tu spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo
226b2(mdo sde): spong ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
226b3(mdo sde): dpal gsal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa snyoms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
226b4(mdo sde): pa the tshom las rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
226b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bla bre chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
226b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa skyed pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud par dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi rnam par 'phar ba la phyag 'tshal
226b7(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i phung po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
227a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston gyi nyi ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar
227a2(mdo sde): ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo brtan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing rgyal me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i
227a3(mdo sde): dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'bebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i lha la
227a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi grags pa

227b3(mdo sde): pa mi phan mi 'chi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dam las rgal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa smon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs

234a1(mdo sde): bsgoms par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri bsung dgyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i ba la glang la phyag
234a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo dben pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dam par dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyis
234a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyob pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
234a4(mdo sde): yon tan ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa g.yul 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
234a5(mdo sde): pa gsal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
234a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom rnam par zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po

234b3(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
234b4(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chags

235a1(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan 'di thos na ni/ /bag yod rim gro bskyed cing rig par bya/ /phun sum 'di la ma dad
235a2(mdo sde): spong na ni/ /ngan song sdug bsngal phyir yang myong nga re/ /rim bzhin tshul khrims la ni brten nas su/ /thos la dad cing rab tu dben par ldan/ /zab mo bzod pa yongs su bkang nas ni/ /

235a5(mdo sde): bi na ya k+ShA n+ti nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po dang

235b1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa

235b3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas kun tu ngoms pa/ tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la

240a7(mdo sde): kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i mig nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/

240b2(mdo sde): gam| 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/
240b3(mdo sde): mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / 'dod
240b4(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing ldang ba'ang ma yin/ phung po ni ngag gi lam dang / dbyangs dang / sgra dang / brjod pa las yang dag par
240b5(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o/ /dbyangs dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams
240b6(mdo sde): cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste/ mtshan ma med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o/ /stong pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni thob pa
240b7(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /tshig med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o/ /mi khom pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o/ /rkyen med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni sbyor
241a1(mdo sde): ba dang bral ba'o/ /dmigs pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ lta ba dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dmigs pa dang bral pa'o/ /

241a5(mdo sde): ba'o| |chos thams cad ni/ shin tu 'phos pa'o/ /phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'jungs pa med pa'o/ /spros pa dang bral ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni/

241b1(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ las mi ston pa'o/ /tshor ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o/ /thos pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ dbyangs dbang bral ba'o/ /gzung du med pa'o/ /
241b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni/ rang bzhin gyis sdug pa'o/ /shes pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ tshor ba chags pa med pa'o/ /smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ 'di shes dang bral ba'o/ /
241b3(mdo sde): brag ca lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa'o/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o/ /chos thams cad ni /
241b4(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o/ /gzugs brnyan la brten pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ sprin mi dmigs pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ gzugs brnyan no/ /
241b5(mdo sde): bstan du med pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'o/ /dngos po dang bral ba'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa nam mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid
241b6(mdo sde): gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o/ /ngar sems pa med pa'o/ /rten med pa'o/ /brjod
241b7(mdo sde): du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ yi ge med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'du byed thams cad ni/ skad cig ma zad ba dang bral ba'o/ /zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya ba'i phyir bdag
242a1(mdo sde): dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa spros pa med pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'di la rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gi bzod pa sgom pa na yang dag par
242a2(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob po/ /bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis
242a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra bsnyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi
242a4(mdo sde): zhing du song ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba'i/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char ram/ skom gyi char ram/ gos sam/ ltab lhub bam/ dri'am/ me
242a5(mdo sde): tog gam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang rab tu 'ong ngo / /gang sems can zas dang / kom de yongs su zos pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de 'du byed thams
242a6(mdo sde): cad ni| mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang / tshul khrims thob bo/ /khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs te byung nas ri'i sul
242a7(mdo sde): dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par gyur to/ /drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtswa dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la
242b1(mdo sde): mi zad par mos shig/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor bar byed do/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rdu dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong
242b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/ /tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du go sa nas rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i bar du
242b3(mdo sde): yongs su spyod par byed do/ /de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de
242b4(mdo sde): b zhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyim pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
242b5(mdo sde): kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos
242b6(mdo sde): kyi sgo brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyangs med pa'o/ /bdud bzhi'i yul las 'das pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ nam mkha'i lam mo/ /gnas yang dag

243a2(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'i gnas med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ rtsom pa med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba

243b2(mdo sde): du med pa'o/ /brjod du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ skad cig ma'o/ /'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o/ /zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /chos thams cad ni/ skad cig ma
243b3(mdo sde): zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /mnyam pa'i sems dang / rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /

243b5(mdo sde): zhi ba'i stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de'ang chos kyi sgo de thos nas zang
243b6(mdo sde): zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa de 'du byed thams cad ni/ mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang / tshul khrims thob bo/ /khyim gyi bcings pa thams
243b7(mdo sde): cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang /
244a1(mdo sde): rtswa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi zad par mos shing brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do/ /nye bar len pa'i

244a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa sgom pa de ni/ ming mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs/
244a4(mdo sde): gsob mi dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs mi dmigs/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/

244a6(mdo sde): bya mi dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid mi gsog pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ thub pa/ khams
244a7(mdo sde): gsum gtong pa med pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so/ /ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa de sngon gyi mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi
244b1(mdo sde): ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med pa/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa 'di sgom pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
244b2(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas ji lta bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur
244b3(mdo sde): ro| |byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya bas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byas te byang chub sems
244b4(mdo sde): dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang / de nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam
244b5(mdo sde): par 'jig pa ci la bsam ste rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs bdag med pa/ mi snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam
244b6(mdo sde): par mi rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa'am/ 'on te 'di lta ci/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba'am/ gso ba'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyed pa'am/ shed can nam/ byed pa
244b7(mdo sde): po'am| tshor ba po'am/ tshor ba gzhan nam/ skye ba'am/ yang dag par skye ba'am/ gang mi dga' ba dang / mi 'byung ba med par mi 'gyur ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gang du byung / snying rje
245a1(mdo sde): chen po ni/ gang na/ chos 'chang ba ni/ su zhig/ chos kun shes pa ni/ gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pa ni/ gang na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams
245a2(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par mi 'gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni/ gang du smin/ de bzhin
245a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ gang du 'byung / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched
245a4(mdo sde): drug gis bzung ba ni/ gang du byung / bdag ni/ stan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas dge slong drug cu rtsam stan las langs te dong nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur
245a5(mdo sde): pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs pa dang gnod bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me 'khor de nyid du
245a6(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur ba des byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /don gyi dbang gang mthong na/ 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang
245a7(mdo sde): dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'jungs pa la
245b1(mdo sde): gtong ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang /
245b2(mdo sde): gtam ngan pa'o/ /zhes 'di ltar gsungs so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar bya'o/ /log par lta ba'i lus rnams la
245b3(mdo sde): lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /brkam pa rnams la tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / kha zas la chags pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar
245b4(mdo sde): gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ /mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /'dod pa spyod pa'i
245b5(mdo sde): lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha dang dpal
245b6(mdo sde): mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs la spyod pa'i skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams
245b7(mdo sde): la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par
246a1(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o/ /theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang
246a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par
246a3(mdo sde): brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam smra bar
246a4(mdo sde): mi bya'o| |nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i
246a5(mdo sde): bzod pa zab mo 'di mi smra bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu legs so/ /zhes bya ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das
246a6(mdo sde): kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la ga na ma re me la legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do/ /legs so legs so shes rab che/ /rnam par shes pas
246a7(mdo sde): mchog gcod pa/ /mtshan nyid thams cad chos rnams kyi/ /dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes/ /'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg
246b1(mdo sde): pa la| |chos 'di rjod par mi byed do/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu/ /chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/ /tshul 'di kun tu shes par
246b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| |nam mkha' ji ltar mtho byed la/ /dma' ba med cing gzugs med pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med/ /bskal pa grangs med pa
246b3(mdo sde): dag gi / 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni/ /smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /khyod kyis chos 'di thos pa dang / /ji ltar rgyal ba des bstan pa'i/ /grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di/ /
246b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la/ /'jigs med pa 'di rab tu bstan/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab dag cing / /yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa/ /skal pa ldan pa'i mdun du
246b5(mdo sde): ni| |chos 'di yang ni rab tu bstan/ /nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang / /rang rgyal dag gi mngon dga' la/ /chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na/ /de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi shes
246b6(mdo sde): pas ni spong ba dang / /mos pa med par skyes pas na/ /bsod nams mang po 'byung med cing / /ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro/ ting nge 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni/ /gal te de lus sbyangs
246b7(mdo sde): byas te| |byang chub lam la brtson bya phyir/ /la la thas dang de bral ba/ /'khor dang gang zag rnams kyis kyang / /sems kyi rtog par mi byed do/ /'chal pa'i shes rab snod min
247a1(mdo sde): la| |stong pa zhi ba smra bar byed/ /de yang myur du spangs pas na/ /mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag /gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la/ /myur du yang ni 'gro
247a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ /dmyal ba yi dwags byol song du/ /lha ma yin dang lus srul po/ /gnod sbyin srin po gtum pa yang / /yang dang yang ni 'dir skye'o/ /mir gyur dka' byed thob pa
247a3(mdo sde): dag / gal te ji ltar thob na yang / /smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni/ /'on pa long ba zhar pa dang / /rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba/ /skur pa 'debs shing mchod pa byed/ /zas dang
247a4(mdo sde): skom dang bral pa ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ /pha dang ma la bkur sti med/ /nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod/ /sems can rnams la snying rje med/ /ngan 'gro yang
247a5(mdo sde): ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rab tu song ba yi/ /dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag /yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba/ /ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro /lus dbang byas pa'i sems
247a6(mdo sde): can 'di/ /gang gis bzod pa 'di bsten cing / /thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa/ /des ni dge slong de song ngo / /ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang / /pha rol sems la lta ba yi/ /
247a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten la ni sgron 'dzin pa/ /sems can kun la sman par smra/ /thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa/ /thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la/ /ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la//
247b1(mdo sde): de 'dra ba yi chos kyang shod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na drin po ches 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ ji lta bur nyan thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri ba shams te nyan
247b2(mdo sde): thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
247b3(mdo sde): pa bstan pa na/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs
247b4(mdo sde): pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan la'ang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam
247b5(mdo sde): mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gi dus la bab par shes/ de nas byang chub
247b6(mdo sde): s ems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig
247b7(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa/ /ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin/ /grol dang rig la khyod ni dang bar mdzad/ /rdul dang
248a1(mdo sde): bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston/ /rgyal ba nyi ma grol la mar me mdzad/ /sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad ba/ /lam rnams rab ston la ma ni khyod ston pa/ /
248a2(mdo sde): mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs/ /thugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin/ /thub pa 'jig rten zla ba 'od 'dra
248a3(mdo sde): ba| |tshul mdog bzod pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston/ /snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi chog shes pa ni mchog tu che/ /rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa/ /
248a4(mdo sde): bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston/ /thub pa seng+ge mu stegs 'jigs par mdzad/ /'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la ping+ka'i skad/ /mu stegs can gyi 'khor mang rnam 'jig pa/ /
248a5(mdo sde): mar me'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod/ /sa dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/ /bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro mi mdzad/ /mthon po ma yin da ltar mtho min pa/ /
248a6(mdo sde): yongs min gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ /ye shes mchog gis nga yi nga rgyal gyi/ /rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor/ /des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa//
248a7(mdo sde): las kyi me yis sred pa'i chu yang bskams/ /khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred chu tshig /klu lta bu rin chos kyi char gtong ba/ /des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste/ /yongs su smin la
248b1(mdo sde): gzigs shing bzod 'di gsung / /sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed/ /bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing / /gang gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur/ /de thob pa yi
248b2(mdo sde): yon tan 'di mtha' yas/ /spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi/ /thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang / /da ltar gyi yang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa/ /thugs rjer
248b3(mdo sde): dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
248b4(mdo sde): du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod
248b5(mdo sde): pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so snyam mo/ /lha bran gyis gsol pa/ spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzod pa 'di stan nas ji lta bu'i spos
248b6(mdo sde): kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
248b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des
249a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang srong de'ang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs
249a2(mdo sde): pa dang / skra ring po'i ral pa 'chang ba dang / ag tshom ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg chen po 'bar bar byed do/ /de las kyang 'od kyi phung po
249a3(mdo sde): kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa'i 'od 'byung ngo / /de'i 'od snang bas phyogs
249a4(mdo sde): bcu'i zhing stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / 'od dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
249a5(mdo sde): gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo / /sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dwags kyi lta ba'ang mi mngon mi snang ngo / /de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can
249a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang / tshigs dang / yi ge dang / chung ngu na sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi sgra'ang mi grag go /de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
249a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / lus dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu
249b1(mdo sde): snang ngo / /yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ rang rgyal pa'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni/ kun tu mi snang ngo / /yang theg pa chen po la
249b2(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas ma mthong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'ang ma mthong ngo / /de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der
249b3(mdo sde): 'dug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong zhing / de byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang yang 'dir 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs
249b4(mdo sde): snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /snang ba rgya chen pos ni/ 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes kau Di n+ya la
249b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ gnas brtan kau Di n+ya/ bcom ldan 'das gang na/ kau Di n+ya sa smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba zhes bya ba ni/ mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po
249b6(mdo sde): des 'od srung chen po la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan
249b7(mdo sde): 'das da ltar gang na bzhes bya ba mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan
250a1(mdo sde): gyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas bcom
250a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so/ /mi mthong ngo / /de nas nyan thos chen po des maud+gal ya na la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal ya na/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na
250a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig /maud+gal ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras
250a4(mdo sde): pa de nyid na bdag gis stong gsum gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gnag na bzhugs pa gang du
250a5(mdo sde): bzhud ces bya ba ni/ mi mthong ngo / /mi shes so/ /de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang
250a6(mdo sde): mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na gnas/ spyod pa ni/ ci 'drar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags
250a7(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba dag kyang mi shes so//
250b1(mdo sde): mi mthong ngo / /des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni/ de la 'jug
250b2(mdo sde): go / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' la dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang
250b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tsha dang ldan pa/ 'di la rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis phung po bshad par byas pa de na dge slong drug cu tsam po stan
250b4(mdo sde): las langs te dong pas/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig tu spyod do/ /bdag
250b5(mdo sde): cag ni| rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do/ /bam po gnyis
250b6(mdo sde): p a| de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas
250b7(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa de bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung ngo / /zhes bdag cag rnam par
251a1(mdo sde): blta bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa/ 'khogs pa/ bdug pa rnams
251a2(mdo sde): dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus
251a3(mdo sde): pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo / /drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya snyam
251a4(mdo sde): mo| |de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dod ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin
251a5(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
251a6(mdo sde): 'dir gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag
251a7(mdo sde): par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis drang srong gi tsha byad kyis drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thad du der nye bar dod do/ /'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad
251b1(mdo sde): l dang ba'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa la'ang 'jug par bzhed pa'i
251b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sams kyis shes so/ /bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing lam der drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i
251b3(mdo sde): ril nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor bdag dang / 'jog po dang / yid yod la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag
251b4(mdo sde): drug cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / shes dang / byu ru dang / a sma gar+b+ha dang / mu sA ra gal pa la sogs pa rin po
251b5(mdo sde): che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu nas mu sA ra gal pa'i
251b6(mdo sde): shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to/ /shing ta la'i phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam
251b7(mdo sde): pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / /lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zhing dpag tshad bcu pa
252a1(mdo sde): dbyangs so/ /lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gser nas mu sA ra gal pa'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to/ /gser gyi shing ta la dngul gyi snying
252a2(mdo sde): po 'phyang ba nas mu sA ra gal pa'i bar du smra bar bya'o/ /'og logs su bai DUR+ya bzang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos spa bar bya'o/ /sprin gyi lha'i bu
252a3(mdo sde): drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ rdzing de dag la'ang lha rdzas kyi me
252a4(mdo sde): tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / tsam+pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / mu tsu ku da dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / pa ta li dang / pa ri sha ka dang / gan+d+ha
252a5(mdo sde): d+ha nu ska ri dang / su ma dang / a mra dang / dzam+bu dang / mri na la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to/ /sa bla na gnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad
252a6(mdo sde): kyis lam sbyong bar byed do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam gyi ma gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to/ /
252a7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang / do shal dang / rgyan rab tu 'byang ngo / /'phrul dga'i lha'i bu'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi
252b1(mdo sde): khang bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis byas so/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de la'ang lha rdzas kyi do shal sna tshogs
252b2(mdo sde): dang / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / /me tog sna tshogs kyi kun tu gtor to/ /khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong ba
252b3(mdo sde): sna tshogs byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rol mo dkrol ba dang / klu'i sgra bsgrags pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab
252b4(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /klu'i bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi
252b5(mdo sde): char phab bo/ /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / tsam+pa ka dang / ba ri ya tra dang / 'dzo
252b6(mdo sde): sha dang / 'dzo sha ka chen po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsa ka chen po dang / bal la dang / bal+la chen po dang / tsakra dang / tsakra chen po 'od dri ma med pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ 'dab ma stong pa/ 'dab ma
252b7(mdo sde): brgya stong pa/ kun nas 'od/ kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba/ kha dog mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon par dga' ba rnam pa sna
253a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes par byas so/ /char ba'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du mdag
253a2(mdo sde): kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo/ /klu'i glang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing 'di
253a3(mdo sde): lta ste| mu tig sngon po'i char dang / go shiR+sha'i snying po'i char la sogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo/ /gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sngon
253a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto
253a5(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi
253a6(mdo sde): cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / glu sna tshogs yongs su
253a7(mdo sde): bzung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do/ /gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo'am/
253b1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan
253b2(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / klu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis khad
253b3(mdo sde): kyis rab tu phab bo/ /mi'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no/ /tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub
253b4(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed pa byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing spyan sngar 'khod do/ /brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha
253b5(mdo sde): byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
253b6(mdo sde): rab tu gsal pa'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par lta'o/ /klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so/ /lha
253b7(mdo sde): ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun tu reg pa/ mchog tu dri zhim pa/ mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo / /gnod sbyin gyi
254a1(mdo sde): dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to/ /gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan por gyur pa gser gyi
254a2(mdo sde): dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod de bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/ /grul bum brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong rgan po'i cha byad
254a3(mdo sde): kyis gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du lta'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du
254a4(mdo sde): ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char chen po
254a5(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong
254a6(mdo sde): gi cha byad kyis mu tig dmar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs

254b1(mdo sde): dzam+bu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgyan par byed do/ /sa'i gnod sbyin
254b2(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do/ /bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis nam mkha' la 'phyen to/ /bdud brgya stong du
254b3(mdo sde): ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go/ drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par
254b4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba chen po blangs te bcom ldan 'das
254b5(mdo sde): kyi don gyi phyir rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba'i char rab tu 'byin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po
254b6(mdo sde): kun tu gnon par gyur to/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi chun po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ /dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
254b7(mdo sde): du ma'ang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo / /de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa
255a1(mdo sde): l ha bran brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas
255a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sems can mi srun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog /mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzungs
255a3(mdo sde): ngan 'dren mdzad cing / /sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa/ /rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing / /
255a4(mdo sde): 'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis/ /bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /'gro la phyin ci log
255a5(mdo sde): bzhi rnam par grol/ /'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la bsnyen bkur zhing / /'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston pa/ /zla ba bas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /
255a6(mdo sde): thub pa phung po lnga 'dir ba ston pa/ /'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnam grol zhing / /'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag lnga ston pa/ /'gro ba lnga yi btson ra rnam par bkrol/ /dbang po
255a7(mdo sde): drug 'dul gnas pa skyon med cing / /sred lus drug la shin tu rnam grol shes/ /sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog /spos kyi ngad ldan ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /
255b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba mnyam gzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs/ /shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog /ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad/ /kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spyon/ /
255b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa/ /ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas/ /khyod ni mun pas bsgribs pa la ye shes ston/ /thub pa dgon pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su
255b3(mdo sde): gsol| |dzam+bu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas 'byung ba dag / 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing / /mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa/ /mi yi 'dren mkhan khyod ni 'dir gshegs gsol/ /
255b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang 'dul ba gtong zhing dul ba'i thugs/ /sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog /sems can dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod/ /spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs
255b5(mdo sde): su gsol/ /bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing / /bar 'gar rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs/ /dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa/ /thub pa 'dir gshegs bzod
255b6(mdo sde): pa rab tu ston/ /wA ra NA sir 'khor lo dam pa bskor/ /shes rab dam pa dag gi mdzod gcig gsungs/ /'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba/ /spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir bzod
255b7(mdo sde): pa gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong
256a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam/ nyan thos
256a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba'am/ gang sa la rgyu ba'am/ gang chu
256a3(mdo sde): la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo / /
256a4(mdo sde): mig gis gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de'ang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ mi'i
256a5(mdo sde): brtul zhugs can dang / zla ba'i brtul zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la
256a6(mdo sde): la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa/ log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so/ /ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/
256a7(mdo sde): rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yos pa 'di dang / snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung bar gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan sngar gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug
256b1(mdo sde): pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing

256b3(mdo sde): to| |'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /shar
256b4(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dar de

260a1(mdo sde): ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing sangs rgyas chen por rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'gros dang / rgyan chen po'i 'gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs

260a3(mdo sde): k yi gnas gtsang ma 'di tha dad pa med cing dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te glang po'i rnam
260a4(mdo sde): par blta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na'ang 'di brjod do/ /la la gang 'dir bstan dang ldan pa la/ /byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa/ /bdag
260a5(mdo sde): gis yang dag pa spyad pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs med gang / /da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod
260a6(mdo sde): cing / /chos la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa/ /bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston/ /kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag dang / /sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing / /
260a7(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas par yang ni mi shes pa/ /de dag thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po/ /thabs la mkhas pa sems can rnams
260b1(mdo sde): 'dul zhing / /shes rab pha rol phyin mchog rtag spyod pa/ /bzod nyan thos phyir de dag thams cad 'ong / /gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bkur/ /'dus byas thams cad 'di la
260b2(mdo sde): brten pa med/ /chu zla lta bur rab tu su ston pa/ /rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong / /gang rnams thabs dang yang dag sbyor phyir zhugs/ /thams cad dngos la sems
260b3(mdo sde): dpa' rten med cing / /mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa/ /dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong / /bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas/ /ji ltar sdug bsngal kun
260b4(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo la'ang khyod myur 'jug /srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed/ /phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang / /'gro ba rnams la phan
260b5(mdo sde): phyir 'khor lo bskor/ /da dung theg pa'i dam tshig gang 'dod pa/ /bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong / /lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdag bskor te/ /phyir mi ldog la
260b6(mdo sde): sems can bye bkod pa/ /rnam par grol ba'i blo mtshan rab thogs shing / /bdag bdag zhing rnams su yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang / /byang
260b7(mdo sde): chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa can mthong ste/ /de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi
261a1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor de'ang de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang / don dang / tshig brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas
261a2(mdo sde): mu med par song ngo / /de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad nyan cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag gis blta ba'i
261a3(mdo sde): sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba/ de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/
261a4(mdo sde): de ltar tshim pa/ de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don dang / tshig dang / yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der de phyogs bzhi kun tu
261a5(mdo sde): bltas te sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar 'bar ba la drang srong
261a6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag btsal te ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni/ mthu chen po/ drang srong
261a7(mdo sde): gi 'khor chen po 'di ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i rjes su 'gro'o/ /drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang / dbyibs
261b1(mdo sde): kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na/ drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye
261b2(mdo sde): bar 'gro'o/ /de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs
261b3(mdo sde): pa med cing dpag tu med pa/ chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna tshogs
261b4(mdo sde): kyi drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas drang srong thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bstod de 'khod do/ /la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la la ngan song du spyod pa'i
261b5(mdo sde): rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran pa so sor thob nas drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do/ /drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs
261b6(mdo sde): su'ang thal mo sbyar te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing ji lta
261b7(mdo sde): bur 'khor yang dag par 'ongs pa la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe na shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i
262a1(mdo sde): lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs
262a2(mdo sde): pa lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtseg pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du
262a3(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag gi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/ drang srong thub pa gang na
262a4(mdo sde): bzhugs pa der bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na lho phyogs na nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna
262a5(mdo sde): tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bur bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas byang chub
262a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa
262a7(mdo sde): de 'dra bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston te snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste/ dper na/
262b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
262b2(mdo sde): blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra
262b3(mdo sde): bar mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug
262b4(mdo sde): pa| rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
262b5(mdo sde): drug cu lhags so/ /de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang
262b6(mdo sde): p a brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng+ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng+ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam
262b7(mdo sde): ste| de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/
263a1(mdo sde): su'i byin gyis brlabs/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bas na/ chos kyi sgos
263a2(mdo sde): chags pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de dung mi sgrub kyi/ 'di gnyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di gnyis ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'o/ /'di gnyis ni/
263a3(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'dus shes kyang med do/ /de 'jig pa thams cad spangs nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /
263a4(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o/ /gang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni/ 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag tu sgro 'dogs
263a5(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa/ 'di
263a6(mdo sde): ni| gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang skyes pa'am/ ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang 'byung ba dang / 'gog par rnam par mi rtog
263a7(mdo sde): cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs pa med pa dang / tha dad par bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la
263b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang phung po yongs su shes shing skyo ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan
263b2(mdo sde): nyid spangs pa/ rlom pa sems thams cad bcom pa/ gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /'gul ba dang / rlom zhing sems par
263b3(mdo sde): rig pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom sems med pa/ g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs
263b4(mdo sde): kyi bu| gang tshor ba shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs
263b5(mdo sde): kyi bu/ gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro ba mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid
263b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /yang
263b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs
264a1(mdo sde): kyi bu| gang yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la brten par mi shes pa
264a2(mdo sde): dang / yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni/ gnas med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs
264a3(mdo sde): kyi bu| gang dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol la 'du shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'di'ang mtshan ma
264a4(mdo sde): med pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mi zad pa kun tu rtog pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang tshu rol ni/ zag pa'o/ /pha rol
264a5(mdo sde): ni| phyin ci log ste/ gang tshu rol dang pha rol la rtog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang bkrol ba 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang tshu rol dang pha rol la 'dzin pa med pa dang / bkrol ba med pa
264a6(mdo sde): dang / ci'ang btags pa med pa dang / btang ba med pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
264a7(mdo sde): la zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa zhes rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang khams dang / skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa med pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
264b1(mdo sde): 'du shes su bya ba'ang med pa dang / 'du shes dang 'du shes med min thob pa'ang med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang phung po dang / khams dang /
264b2(mdo sde): skye mched la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas su rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang yang 'du byed skye mched thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'
264b3(mdo sde): dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
264b4(mdo sde): chos la snyems pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang la la 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la mi 'jug /mi 'gro/ rnam par mi 'gro/ mi rgal zhing 'gro ba'ang med/ rnam
264b5(mdo sde): par grol ba med pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang la la ming dang gzugs las phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched 'byung bar rab
264b6(mdo sde): tu shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / ming dang gzugs bral ba la sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi lta ba kun tu 'gro zhing kun tu mi 'gro/ /yongs su mya ngan
264b7(mdo sde): las 'das pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ gnyis
265a1(mdo sde): p a'o| |gang yang 'byung ba med pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma ma yin pa la 'dus byas thams cad du myur du rab tu shes pa 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la
265a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang bdag gir bya ba dang / rnam par shes par yongs su shes pa dang / nga yir bya ba dang / skye mched la chags pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gang la
265a3(mdo sde): la bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par shes pa thob pa/ bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral ba/ skye mched nyams pa med pa/ bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba dang bral ba /
265a4(mdo sde): 'di'ang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /gang la la rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar rtog pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ ma rig pa ni/ rgyu ba med cing
265a5(mdo sde): bdag med pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni/ glog gi rang bzhin can no/ /rnam par grol ba'ang nam mkha'o/ /nam mkha'ang mi rtog pa/ rtog par byed pa med pa/ spros pa med pa 'di'ang
265a6(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /gang rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs kun tu spyod pa 'di ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du stong ste/ nam
265a7(mdo sde): mkha'ang 'jig pa med do/ /gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyu ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
265b1(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa rab tu rgyu ba med pa ni/ nam mkha' ji lta bur mun pa med cing snang ba med pa/ rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa stong
265b2(mdo sde): pa ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyang stong pa'o/ /de bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'ang nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar stong ngo / /nam mkha' ji lta bur 'dod chags med/
265b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang med/ gti mug med/ mi mtho mi dma'/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro bar de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du
265b4(mdo sde): rab tu shes so/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la'ang 'dod chags med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug med/ mi mtho mi dma'/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog /mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro
265b5(mdo sde): zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /mi 'gro rnam par mi 'gro ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
265b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pas 'di bstan pa ston pa na byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig khrag dgu bcu rtsa
265b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bzhi bcu rtsa drug gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa thob par gyur to/ /bcom
266a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyang sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drang srong gi cha byad ji tsam ba mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs
266a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku yang dag par brgyan te bzhugs so/ /de ltar de bzhin du gang gzhan la la dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad mi snang bar gyur te/ sngon gyi
266a3(mdo sde): lus ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ji lta bur
266a4(mdo sde): bstan pa de bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i sgo 'di bstan par bya ba legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dpang du btsugs te de ltar khyod kyis tshad med
266a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do/ /gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
266a6(mdo sde): ci dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs byas so/ /bam po gsum pa/ de nas de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bla gos phrag
