295b3(mdo sde): la yongs su smin par byed pa nyon mongs pa'i lta ba thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub
295b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtsal chen pos yongs su smin pa'i go cha'o/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can gyi go cha rnam pa de lta bus sems
295b5(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can yongs su smin pa'o/ /yang dag par
295b6(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ le'u gsum pa'o// //rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
295b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen
296a1(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa bar 'ga' ci zhig tu skyes pa na sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa rnams la skur ba 'debs pa dang /
296a2(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par byed/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor bar byed/ nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i bag chags thams cad las
296a3(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed cing / sems can re re'i don gyi phyir bskal pa'i sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa nas sems can de 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol ba dang / sangs
296a4(mdo sde): rgyas gcig gi thad du phul ba nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi thad kyi bar du phul lo/ /gang gi tshe sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par 'gyur ba de sangs rgyas
296a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bya ba byas pa dang / rnam par rol pa mngon par shes pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma
296a6(mdo sde): snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro bar nus par 'gyur ro/ /de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur to/ /de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar
296a7(mdo sde): rtogs so/ /de na yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po'ang ci 'dra ba yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /de na'ang rigs kyi bu de'i shin tu sred pa dang
296b1(mdo sde): ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu des yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su zhus pa/ las cis na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar
296b2(mdo sde): 'gyur| sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bas 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas 'dres pa med pa'o/ /
296b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'dres pa med pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs thams cad kyis 'bral ba med par 'gyur ro/ /yang nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi skye ba
296b4(mdo sde): ji tsam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang mi rgya'o/ /byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgya che zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'gyur
296b5(mdo sde): ro| |byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyis sangs
296b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rigs kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/ las gang dang gang spyod pa dang / nan tan gang gis yon tan
296b7(mdo sde): de dag thob par 'gyur ba de'ang rigs kyi bu/ tshe rabs su yon tan dang spyod pa'i nan tan la brtson par 'gyur ba nas der skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs
297a1(mdo sde): su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro/ /gang na rigs kyi bu bla na
297a2(mdo sde): m ed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par spangs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
297a3(mdo sde): pa rnams la theg pa chen po dag pa'i gtam smra bar byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ni/ ma yin no/ /sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang / yongs su spyod pa byas
297a4(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos ston par byed do/ /gang dag
297a5(mdo sde): la chos ston pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar bya ba'i phyir ston gyi/ yongs su ma dag par ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
297a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi/ yongs su ma dag pa ni/ bsngags par mi byed do/ /sems can gyi bsam pa yongs
297a7(mdo sde): su dag pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang 'grogs shing sten pa dang / sdom pa la dgod pa dang / yon sbyong ba bsngags par byed kyi/ yongs su ma dag pa ni/ ma yin no/ /rigs
297b1(mdo sde): k yi bu| gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis sngon rnyog pa lnga'i sangs
297b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
297b3(mdo sde): d ag pa tshad med grangs med par da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la theg pa chen
297b4(mdo sde): p o dag pa'i gtam smra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis sngon nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thog mar sa bon bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par
297b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'dir yang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten par gyur to/ /mngon par shes pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
297b6(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshad bzung ba dang brtags pa der phyin chad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas/ der
297b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
298a1(mdo sde): c hub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de dag thams cad kyis rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag par thams cad kyi thog mar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
298a2(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bo/ /gang gi tshe sems bskyed pas mngon par shes pa thob pa ni/ sa rab nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bla na med pa
298a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag da ltar chos
298a4(mdo sde): kyi sgra sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dang bral zhing chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gang yang chos zab me'i bzod
298a5(mdo sde): pa thob pas dga' ba dang bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /gang yang da ltar khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
298a6(mdo sde): r nyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags pa khyed cag thams cad kyi sngon thams cad kyi thog mar nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed
298a7(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /thams cad kyi thog mar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par byas pa de la'ang mngon par shes pa gang gis
298b1(mdo sde): phyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa thob par gyur to/ /gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs kun tu shes shing rtogs pa
298b2(mdo sde): der gyis skye pa mngon par shes pa'i smon lam byas pas de dag nyid kyi nan tan gyis zhugs pas bsam pa ji snyed pa yongs su rdzogs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa der skyes pa
298b3(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas gzhan 'phel ba'i phyir yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa 'di ni/ mi 'dod do/ /nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa dang / lta ba dog pa thong pa 'di dag
298b4(mdo sde): smod cing 'di la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'i/ sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gtar mkhan mkhas pa la la
298b5(mdo sde): mchog tu dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i sman gyi yo byad kyis mi zher ba dang long ba rnams kyi mig gi nang cung zad tsam rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /zhi bar shes nas de dag gcig la gcig smras pa/
298b6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis gzugs kyi snang ba la lta bar brtsams te bdag cag sgron mar gyur pa'i sman pa'i khyim 'di nas byung la 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas phyir 'ong ba'ang med pa mang po de dag kyang
298b7(mdo sde): gang sman pa'i khyim de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji lta bur nad 'di rab tu zhi ba med pa de dag mig gi nad yun ring bor gnas pa bltas nas yang 'ong ngo / /de dag kyang sman pa'i khyim der
299a1(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag yun mi ring bas kyang nad thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa
299a2(mdo sde): dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gang la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / lta ba ngan pas rtag tu gtso ba'i sems can rnams la
299a3(mdo sde): la la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ji ltar yon tan khong du chud pa de ltar rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de las 'byol bar 'dod do/ /
299a4(mdo sde): gang yang de las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par rnam par spyod pa de nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gdon mi za bar 'gro bar 'dod do/ /de
299a5(mdo sde): dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las shin tu 'das pas yun ring por sdug bsngal 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe de dag sangs
299a6(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
299a7(mdo sde): gyi tshogs yongs su dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snga dro'i dus gcig gis kyang tshul khrims bsrungs so/ /tshul
299b1(mdo sde): khrims bsgoms so/ /sbyin pa byin no/ /bsam gtan la bsam gtan byas so/ /brtson 'grus brtsams so/ /bzod pa bsgoms so/ /shes rab kyi yon tan brtsams so/ /sangs rgyas kyi
299b2(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag par bskal pa brgya stong du'ang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pas spyad pa spyod pa'ang ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa
299b3(mdo sde): lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa bon bskyed do/ /yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'gro zhing 'dir de tsam gyi
299b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas so/ /gang de lta bu'i ye shes snang ba thob pa de thams cad yul smra ba rnam
299b5(mdo sde): par dpyod pa'i ye shes g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi chos rnams las 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing lta ba snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gyi
299b6(mdo sde): spyod pa brjod du med pa mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sems can lus ma rungs pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams la yongs
299b7(mdo sde): su gtong ba'ang med/ sems can lus nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams ci 'dra bar mthong ba la sems kyi nad ci phan du rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de 'dra ba'i sems kyis sman gyi
300a1(mdo sde): yo byad rab tu ston par byed do/ /gang gi nyon mongs pas sems can ngan du spyod pa dang ldan par mthong ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag bdag gis spangs te/ sems
300a2(mdo sde): can de la snying rje chen po bskyed do/ /nyon mongs pa de dag spang pa'i phyir brtson pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /ji ltar nyon mongs pa las yongs su thar par bya zhes
300a3(mdo sde): 'dod chags spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa la rab tu sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /zhe sdang spyod pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug spyod pa rnams rten cing 'brel bar
300a4(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / skal pa dang bcas par spyod pa rnams dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'dod chags snrel zhing spyod pa rnams byams pa dang / mi dge ba rab tu sbyor ba
300a5(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang snrel zhir spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa dang / byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug snrel zhing spyod pa rnams mi mdzes pa dang / rten cing 'brel par rab tu sbyor ba
300a6(mdo sde): dang / lta ba ngan pa thob pa rnams stong pa nyid rab tu thob pa dang / rkyen stobs can rnams la rjes su srung ba dang ldan pa rab tu sbyor ba dang / rab tu gzung du med cing dngos po med pa dang /
300a7(mdo sde): sgrog pa med par shes pa rnams zab mo rnam par zhi ba rab tu sbyor ba dang / spros par shes pa rnams lhag mthong spros pa'i gtam rab tu sbyor bas zhi bar byed do/ /nges par 'dod pa
300b1(mdo sde): rnams rim gyis smra ba dang / tshig zad pa rnams bsdu ba rab tu sbyor zhing zhi gnas dang lhag mthong du rab tu sbyor ba dang / lhag mthong la gus pa can rnams nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
300b2(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la rab tu sbyor ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gus pa can rnams
300b3(mdo sde): cung zad med pa'i skye mched du sbyor ba dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gus pa can rnams mtshan ma med par rab tu sbyor ba dang / smon lam la gus pa rnams smon pa med par smra bar
300b4(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba dang / tshul khrims la gus pa can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su thar par rab tu sbyor ba dang / thos pa la nga rgyal can rnams sred pa thams cad 'byung ba med par
300b5(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba dang / dgon pa la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan can la nga rgyal mngon par brtson pa rnams tshad med par rab tu sbyor ba dang / phung po la
300b6(mdo sde): rtag par 'du shes pa rnams 'byung ba dang zad par rab tu sbyor ba dang / khams la bdag gir bya ba yongs su spangs pa rnams smig rgyu bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / skye mched yongs su spangs pa
300b7(mdo sde): rnams spu ba'i phung por rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'dod pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams chu shing gi snying po med par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs kyi khams yongs su spangs pa rnams las
301a1(mdo sde): byed mi rtag par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su spangs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan la
301a2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang bde ba yongs su spangs pa rnams chos thams cad la bdag med par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' ba zhi bar rab tu sbyor ba
301a3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su spangs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu sbyor bas lta ba de dag rab tu zhi bar bya'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i skye bo yongs su spangs pa rnams
301a4(mdo sde): mi mdzes par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams ro sngon por rab tu sbyor ba dang / sgra la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams brag ca 'byung ba zad par
301a5(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba dang / dri la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams rlung du rtog par rab tu sbyor ba dang / ro la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams mi mdzes pa sna tshogs rab tu sbyor ba dang /
301a6(mdo sde): reg pa la chags pa yongs su spong ba rnams mi gtsang ba'i yan la gsum cu rtsa drug rab tu sbyor ba dang / snying rje med pa rnams byams par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba med pa rnams
301a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa chen po ltar rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams kha ton la rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'dus pa rnams 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / sdug
301b1(mdo sde): bsngal 'dul ba rnams rim gyis sems rtse gcig tu 'dus par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'du byed thams cad kyis mngon par spros pa rnams sgyu ma lta bur rab tu sbyor bas nyon mongs pa de dag zhi
301b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /bam po lnga pa/ gzhan yang sems can lha dang mir skye bar bsam pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do/ /nyan thos kyi theg par
301b3(mdo sde): bsam pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan par yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la rten cing 'brel bar smra ba yid la byed pa
301b4(mdo sde): sbyor bar byed do/ /sems can theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug sbyor bar byed do/ /thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa
301b5(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i sems sbyor bar byed do/ /sems can pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams snying rje chen po la yongs su mi skyo bas sems yongs su
301b6(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i phyir spyod par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed do/ /ji lta
301b7(mdo sde): b ur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan du rnam par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs yongs su dag par sbyor bar byed pa de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes
302a1(mdo sde): pas rnam par rtse'o/ /ji lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bzhin du rnam par spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshogs mngon par 'dod pa de dag de'i
302a2(mdo sde): 'og tu mngon par shes pa rnam par rtse ba de la skye bar 'dod pa ji snyed pa der skye'o/ /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs par rnam par mi spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi
302a3(mdo sde): tshogs yongs su dag pa 'dod pa'ang med pa der skye bar 'dod pa de ji tsam pa der skye'o/ /yang nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi 'dod pa de la bla na med pa yang dag par
302a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o/ /rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can lta ba dog pa rnyed pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong
302a5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams rgyun gcod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sems can bsam pa
302a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med grangs med pa rnams la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la
302a7(mdo sde): chos ston par byed do/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' rnyog la lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed kyang gang byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing
302b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag par rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal byed mi nus so/ /yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi spyad pa stong phrag
302b2(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs rab tu sbyor ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / gal te sems can gcig gi zhe sdang spyod pa stong
302b3(mdo sde): phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de ltar thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa dang / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi skal pa dang
302b4(mdo sde): bcas par spyod pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu shes pa de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis zhi bar byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems
302b5(mdo sde): can gcig gi skal pa dang bcas par spyod pa nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen po byed do/ /gang sems can gcig gi nyon mongs
302b6(mdo sde): p a'i rgyu spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'ang sems can gcig gi dgos pas brtson 'grus brtan pa la mos shing pha rol gnon pa na thabs la
302b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu sbyor ba dang pha rol gnon pas gzir ba rnams byang chub sems dpa' rtsal chen po 'di la ltos shig / ji ltar sems can gcig gi nyon mongs pa
303a1(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi nas gling gcig gi sems can yongs su tshang ba re re'i dgos pas nyon mongs pa spyod
303a2(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed cing gling gnyis pa dang / gling bzhi pa nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du sems can
303a3(mdo sde): thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par byed pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzod pa thob pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar yang byang
303a4(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems can re re'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang po spyod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis 'jug pa de ltar sems can gcig gi mos pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab
303a5(mdo sde): tu shes shing bri ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / 'phel ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes
303a6(mdo sde): pa dang / mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / sems can gyi mtshan nyid
303a7(mdo sde): rab tu shes pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa dang / dben pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa nas de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las
303b1(mdo sde): 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes pa dang / sems can re re'i chags pa'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rab tu shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi spyod pa'i
303b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa'i tshul shes pas sems can nyon mongs pa dam pas bcings pa las yongs su thar par nus so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
303b3(mdo sde): dpa' nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa
303b4(mdo sde): rnams la snying rje chen po rgyun mi gcod cing yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal chen po'o/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel
303b5(mdo sde): bas 'di bstan pa ston pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang+gA sum cu'i bye ma snyed
303b6(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
303b7(mdo sde): gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas mgrin gcig tu 'di ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /chu bo gang rnams blta dka' chu bos khyer/ /nga rgyal mngon pa'i nga rgyal yul
304a1(mdo sde): las shes/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho las ni mthar phyin med/ /lam gyis bdag cag kyang ni rnam par gnas/ /sems can gang rnams nyon mongs gdung bas
304a2(mdo sde): gdungs/ /nyon mongs sangs rgyas zhing du rtag rnams myos/ /ngan song 'gro bar rtag tu sdug bsngal bsags/ /'chad mkhan dam pa'i don gyi theg pa ston/ /bdag cag nyon mongs
304a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams dgos pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam byed 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs zhing du bdag cag spyad pa spyod/ /sems can nyon mongs dam bcings grol bar byed/ /
304a4(mdo sde): gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dregs/ /gti mug lam stor sdig pa rab byed pa/ /sdig pa thams cad las ni bdag cag bzlog /'khor ba'i dgon pa 'jigs las rab tu sgrol/ /
304a5(mdo sde): gang dmyal byol song yi dwags 'jig rten du/ /rtag tu 'dod med sdug bsngal myong ba dag /bdag cag sdug bsngal thams cad las grol byed/ /nyon mongs sangs rgyas zhing du byang
304a6(mdo sde): chub spyod/ /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par khyab pa'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa des kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legs par spobs shing mchog tu
304a7(mdo sde): rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus brtan pa la brtson pa pha rol gnon pa sems can yongs su smin pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan pa legs so legs so/ /gang chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skyes bu dam
304b1(mdo sde): pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bor te rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyod pa la brtson no/ /sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong
304b2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / lus tshig pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed do/ /nyon mongs
304b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ston to/ /lus med pa phung po spong ba'i mtha' ston to/ /tshig tsam gyis skyes bu de dag brtson par 'gyur ba de dag la gang lha dang
304b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na/ de dag gi brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon pa 'di la brtson pa lta ci smos te/ ji ltar tshig gis dam bcas pa da ltar
304b5(mdo sde): dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te skyes bu dam pa/ legs so legs so/ /
304b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar smra ba'i tshig tsam gyis rtsom par 'gyur ba de de bzhin te/ de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na/ de'i shes pas nyon
304b7(mdo sde): mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam pa de lta bu'i de dag gi rtsal chen po bya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ mtshams med pa byed pa nas mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu
305a1(mdo sde): 'grogs pa'i bar du rnam pa de lta bu'i brten pa'i brtson 'grus pha rol gnon pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar byang chub sems
305a2(mdo sde): d pa' dgra rnam par 'grel bas de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa shes rab kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di brjod ma thag tu de nas
305a3(mdo sde): de nyid kyi tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos so/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char yang rab tu phab po/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo'ang rab tu
305a4(mdo sde): dkrol to/ /lha dang / dri za dang / mi'i 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed po
305a5(mdo sde): de dag la mchog tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson no/ /ji snyed ye shes mdzod 'di bstan du gsol/ /ye shes phyir yang ston pa 'di nyid ston/ /mkhyen pa khyod kyis gang gi
305a6(mdo sde): slob ston pa/ /thub pa shes pa'i smra ba 'di la 'jug /mkhyen pa can gyi zhing mang bye ba la/ /thob pa'i ye shes ston pa 'di la 'jug /bdag ni ye shes 'brog sa myur gnas shing / /
305a7(mdo sde): tshul 'di la'ang ye shes lam rab ston/ /ji ltar byang chub spyod phyir shes 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba ye shes rgyal mtshan 'di la 'jug /ji ltar nam mkha' dri med stong pa'i chos/ /bdag
305b1(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i gtam dag bstan du gsol/ /ston mkhan mi yi gtso bo 'di la mchog /mchog tu yid du 'ong zhing mdzes pa ston/ /stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs dgra zil gnon/ /rtag
305b2(mdo sde): pa dang ni chad pa thal bar byas/ /dpa' dang rtul phod gang zag dam pa mchog /sred pa zhi ba gang zag dam pa mchog /sred pa zhi zhing zhi gnas rab tu ston/ /rgyal ba rab tu zhi ba 'di la
305b3(mdo sde): 'jug / rgyal ba stong pa nyid zhi rab bstan gsol/ /rgyal ba stong pa nyid 'di la yang 'jug /kha dog dung dang kha ba 'dra ba yi/ /zhi ba mdzes pa'i stong pa nyid bstan gsol/ /nyan thos kyi
305b4(mdo sde): ni 'di la tshogs rnams spangs/ /ston gyi nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar/ /gtso bo dag gis shin tu gsal shing mdzes/ /'dir ni lam zhi stong pa nyid bstan gsol/ /brgya byin tshangs pa'i
305b5(mdo sde): skad ltar sgra dbyangs snyan/ /sems can dma' la thugs brtse chen po yis/ /thub pa 'di ni stong pa nyid la 'jug /mya ngan dang bral 'gro ba 'di la tshim/ /dma' ba spyod pa rtag tu byin brlabs
305b6(mdo sde): pas| |shes rab mang gzugs stong pa nyid zhi gsungs/ /sdig pa bcom zhing nyes tshogs dri ma med/ /'di ni 'gro la theg pa ngan pa spangs/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid spyod yul rab nyams pas
305b7(mdo sde): kyi ma'o da ltar stong pa nyid zhi gsungs/ /rma bya ngang pa ne tso ske ka dbyangs/ /mnyams pa'i phyogs cha can gyi sgra rnams 'jig/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas lha rdzas
306a1(mdo sde): kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI kas mngon par gtor to/ /'phags pa yang dag par sbyor ba'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis
306a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo le'u bzhi pa'o/ / //de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das
306a3(mdo sde): ji tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa na mi bzhugs pa de tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi slad du lha rdzas kyi gser dang / lha rdzas kyi bai DUR+ya sngon po'i skas mngon par sprul te skas de
306a4(mdo sde): dag gi ngos gnyis la bram ze'i byis pa tshe lo sum cu pa lta bu tshangs dbyangs dang ldan pa gser gyi dbyig pa dang gdugs 'dzin pa/ /tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang ldan pa stong phrag
306a5(mdo sde): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul to/ /de nas bram ze'i byis pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
306a6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /khyod ni rab nyon mongs la sngon thugs bskyed/ /nyon mongs theg la byang chub phan pa'i rgyu/ /nyon mongs zhi phyir rgyal ba bsnyen kyang
306a7(mdo sde): bkur| |nyon mongs thabs mdzad rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol/ /nyon mongs spyod pa thams cad khyod kyis spangs/ /sems can nyon mongs la ni rtag tu gnyen/ /khyod ni nyon mongs
306b1(mdo sde): las las 'gro ba bzlog / nyon mongs rgal ba'i rgyus ni rtag tu myos/ /nyon mongs ma lus khyod kyis rab tu zhi/ /bdag gi blos ni nyon mongs dra ba bcad/ /'gro ba rtag tu nyon mongs chu las
306b2(mdo sde): sgrol| |nyon mongs sun 'byin rgyal pa 'dir gshegs gsol/ /nyon mongs zhing du byang chub dam par reg /ye shes sgron 'chang 'gro shes nyams pa yi/ /sems can thams cad la
306b3(mdo sde): ni thar ston pa/ /nyon mongs nyon mongs zhi phyir 'dir gshegs gsol/ /ye shes 'od zer gyis ni rnam thar ston/ /khyod thugs brtse bas 'gro bas shes nyams khyab/ /ye shes kyis ni
306b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba mig ldan pas/ /rgyal ba ye shes nyi ma 'dir gshegs gsol/ /mkhyen pas lha dang mi mang thar par mdzad/ /khyod kyi ye shes srog dang gang zag med/ /thub pa ye shes dpa'
306b5(mdo sde): pa 'di la 'jug / nyon mongs pa la sbyin mdzod dran pa gsungs/ /nyi ma zla ba mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan/ /rgyal ba sems can thal mo sbyar la gsungs/ /thub pa byang chub mchog phyir bstan
306b6(mdo sde): du gsol/ /'phags pa thub pa 'di la 'jug pa gsungs/ /rgyal ba byang chub rgyu can mdzes gzigs pa/ /phyogs bzhi 'dir ni yang dag lhags mang la/ /stong pa nyid dang bzod spyod shes
306b7(mdo sde): gyur gsungs/ /rgyal ba dpa' gtong 'di la shin tu 'dug /bram ze'i byis pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan 'di smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so/ /zhes bya
307a1(mdo sde): ba byin te/ /de nas drang srong thub pa gdan de las bzhengs pa dang / de nyid kyi tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po 'di yan drug tu g.yos
307a2(mdo sde): so| |lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngon
307a3(mdo sde): par phab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi a ga ru dang / ta ka ra dang / dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi char mngon par phab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi gos dang / nor bu dang /
307a4(mdo sde): mu tig gi se mo do dang / rin po che'i char mngon par phab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rol mo rdung ba mngon par dkrol to/ /dbyangs kyis lhung lhung legs kyi sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol
307a5(mdo sde): to| |bdag cag sngon ma bstan pa'i chos mnyan par bgyi'o/ /bdud kyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i yul gzhom par bgyi'o/ /ye shes kyi
307a6(mdo sde): yul khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /zab mo'i stong pa nyid kyi lam khong du chud par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa brtsegs pa de dag la 'dzegs te
307a7(mdo sde): s eng+ge'i khri bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs nas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa sa dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor kun cang mi smra bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar
307b1(mdo sde): te sems rtse gcig tu drang srong thub pa la lta bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa ma lus par sa dang nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'khor la rnam
307b2(mdo sde): par gzigs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sems can ji snyed 'dir ni kun lhags pa/ /byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su chos tshol na/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod
307b3(mdo sde): pa rab bstan gyi/ /de dag thams cad rtse gcig sems su nyon/ /sems can la la gti mug sred pas bsgribs/ /phung po dag la'ang lta ba rnam mi spong / /gang dag da dung byang chub
307b4(mdo sde): mchog spyod brtson/ /yang yang 'di la yon tan cung zad spyod/ /dbang po drug la stong pa mi lta ste/ /mtshan ma med pa'i 'dzin pa bdag la zung / /byang chub phyir ni cung zad brtson spyod kyi/ /
307b5(mdo sde): shes rab yon tan thams cad spyod pa med/ /ji ltar me 'dod khyim gyi nang du ni/ /btsal bas kyang ni me dag rnyed ma gyur/ /de ltar sems can la la byang chub 'dod/ /stong pa bsgoms
307b6(mdo sde): par shes rab thob pa med/ /de bas gang dag byang chub sdug 'dod pa/ /phung po khams dang skye mched mtshan ma dag /rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur thams cad ltos/ /'di ni byang chub dam pa
307b7(mdo sde): mchog gi lam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul
308a1(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par shin tu 'das te nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba thams
308a2(mdo sde): cad kyi srid pa'i bag la nyal ba dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ma rig par lta ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dres pa med pa dang / sems can
308a3(mdo sde): gyi go cha dang / sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / tshor ba du ba dang / rdul dang / nam mkha' dang / sprin lta bur rab tu shes so/ /mtshan ma dang mtshan nyid thams cad nam mkha' spros pa lta
308a4(mdo sde): bur rab tu shes so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /las yongs su zad cing sems can nye bar 'tsho bar yang 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang
308a5(mdo sde): ma bskyed pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par thul ba med
308a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa seng+ge lta bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i chen po'i char gyi chu bo rab tu gtong ba dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i mngon par
308a7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / bstod pa dang / rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ bzod pa 'di bsgoms pa nas lus dbang du btsugs
308b1(mdo sde): ba'i bar du 'di las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la bzod pa 'di rnam pa gnyis te/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa dang / nam mkha'i
308b2(mdo sde): mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa lnga ste/ rigs kyi bu/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul gyi bzod pa rnam
308b3(mdo sde): pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la gzugs kyi phung po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/
308b4(mdo sde): rnam pa brgyad de/ byang chub sems dpas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa brtags pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen
308b5(mdo sde): po bzhi'o/ /gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ nad do/ /'dod chags zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid do/ /gang rnam par 'jig pa'i rang bzhin de ni/ mi rtag pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin ni/ dngos
308b6(mdo sde): po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su chad pa'o/ /phyi dang nang gi rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyun bcad do/ /nam mkha' ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
308b7(mdo sde): dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed do/ /'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi
309a1(mdo sde): bu| gzhan yang gzugs de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag nang gi'am/ phyi rol gyi'am/ che ba'am/ bra ba'am/
309a2(mdo sde): dma' ba'am/ bde ba'am/ gal te ring ba'am/ gal te nye ba de dag thams cad mi 'gro/ rnam par mi 'gro /mi skye/ mi 'byung / bdag med/ bdag gi med par brtag par bya'o/ /zad pa'i
309a3(mdo sde): tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtog pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i tshul dang / 'byung ba med cing mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtag par bya'o/ /ji ltar rdul
309a4(mdo sde): shin tu phra ba kun 'byung ba dang / lus kun 'byung ba'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams sra bar brtag par bya'o/ /shin tu phra ba'i rdul gcig po de la ji ltar lhag mthong phra mos brtag /
309a5(mdo sde): rdul phra mo gcig po de la ji ltar mtshan nyid med pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod lam du gyur par rab tu shes pa dag med pa dang / rnam pa dang bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po med
309a6(mdo sde): pa dang / tshig gi lam dang bral ba dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar rab tu shes/ bdag med pa dang bral ba dang / bdud kyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes/
309a7(mdo sde): yi ge med pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po med pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes/ mtshan ma med pa las rdul shin tu phra bar rab tu shes/ ji
309b1(mdo sde): ltar 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi ba la rnam par brgyad po de dag gi rdul shin tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go / de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus thams cad
309b2(mdo sde): kyi bar du gcig la'ang so sor rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis rdul shin tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go / nang gi lus ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus kyi sa'i khams kyang rnam pa brgyad
309b3(mdo sde): po 'di dag gis so sor rdul shin tu phra bar brtag go / mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du sa'i khams thams cad nang gi'am/ phyi rol gyi'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/
309b4(mdo sde): dma' ba'am/ bde ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /gang zad pa 'di ni/ mi rtag pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa 'di'ang sdug
309b5(mdo sde): bsngal ba'o/ /gang mi 'byung ba de bdag med pa'o/ /gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang phral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ ji ltar phyi dang nang gi sa'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par rab
309b6(mdo sde): tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ji ltar 'du shes med cing tshor ba med pa de bzhin du sa'i khams kyang 'du shes med cing tshor ba
309b7(mdo sde): med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad
310a1(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang lus 'di la gsher ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ chu ste/ chu'i mtshan nyid
310a2(mdo sde): phran tshogs su na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du nang gi lus chu'i khams thams cad so sor thigs pa tsam du lhag mthong gi tshul gyis brtag go / che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ dma'
310a3(mdo sde): ba'am| bde ba'i mtshan nyid med pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thigs pa tsam du 'du byed thams
310a4(mdo sde): cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pa ji lta bur thigs pa gcig la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go / de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa nas
310a5(mdo sde): nang gi lus kyi chu'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis so so re re la thigs pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go / mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du nang
310a6(mdo sde): gi chu'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi chu'i khams che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ dma' ba'am/ bde ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang
310a7(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /gang zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o/ /de'ang rtog pa med pa'o/ /gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o/ /gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o//
310b1(mdo sde): gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ ji ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi
310b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ji ltar gnas med cing spros pa med pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chu'i khams kyang spros pa med cing gnas med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
310b3(mdo sde): stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba ste/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i
310b4(mdo sde): khams ji lta ba bzhin du me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni/ the tshom gyi rgyu lta bu ste/ nang gi'am/
310b5(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ dma' ba'am/ bde ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / drug gi skye mched dbang
310b6(mdo sde): du gyur pa/ sa'i khams nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o/ /gang skad cig skad cig tu 'byung ba zad pa'i chos nyid dbang po de la zad pa dang / 'gog pa de ni/ 'byung ba zad pa nyid du
310b7(mdo sde): brtag go/ dngos po med pa dang bdag med par dmigs pa/ tshig gi lam med pa dang / rnam par mi 'gro ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa
311a1(mdo sde): dang / zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtog pa med cing smon pa med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / lhag mthong gi tshul gyis brtag

311a4(mdo sde): pa med par rab tu shes so/ /'du byed thams cad gnas med cing nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes so/ /rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs dngos po med pa dbu ba'i phung po ltar brtag
311a5(mdo sde): go / mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa de ni/

311a7(mdo sde): n ang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs de dag lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa
311b1(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ji ltar dmigs pa med cing 'dus byas pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang lbu ba lta bur 'du shes pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa dang / tshor ba med pa

311b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / lus mngon pa'i mtshan nyid du brtag go /gzugs ni/ ci la'ang chags pa med/ snyems pa'ang med/ blang ba dang dor ba med par shes te/ gzugs
311b5(mdo sde): ni| gnyis su med do/ /chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad cung zad kyang dbyer med do/ /tshig gi lam
311b6(mdo sde): thams cad gnas med par yang dag par shes so/ /gzugs ni/ gzhan du song ba'ang med cing yul med pa dang / glo bur gyi sdug bsngal ba dang / rgyun bcad pa dang rgyun ma bcad pa'i
311b7(mdo sde): mdud pa gnyis dang bral ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gnas med par brtag go /gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni/ lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmigs pa med pa dang / kun
312a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa dang / shin tu rang bzhin med par brtag go/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni/ rnam par dag pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi 'byung ba/ mngon par mi
312a2(mdo sde): sgrub pa| chos thams cad spros pa'i rgyun bcad pa thams cad du zhugs pa med par brtag go/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni/ snyems pa med pa dang /

312a5(mdo sde): gzugs la dngos po med pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rtog go / mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du 'du byed thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /gang
312a6(mdo sde): zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o/ /gang mi rtag pa de rtog pa med pa'o/ /gang rtog pa med pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/ /gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o/ /gang 'du byed thams cad kyi
312a7(mdo sde): tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ ji ltar phyi dang nang gi gzugs lbu ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar zhi
312b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ji ltar zad pa med cing gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa de bzhin du zad pa med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang /
312b2(mdo sde): lpu ba lta bur mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems

312b4(mdo sde): kyi mtshan nyid ni/ mig yor lta bu dang / grib ma lta bu dang / lbu ba lta bu/ gnas med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / gsog ba med pa nas
312b5(mdo sde): khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag med pa lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi mtshan nyid thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang / rtag pa'i
312b6(mdo sde): mtha' dang / kun tu gzung ba'i mtha' dang / zad pa med par spyod pa'i mtha' dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtha' dang / yul med pa'i mtha' dang / rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i mtha' dang / smra ba
312b7(mdo sde): med pa'i mtha' dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur gzugs de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / de gnyis kyi gzugs kyi snang ba nam
313a1(mdo sde): mkha' lta bur brtag go / mig yor gyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmigs pa med pa ste/ nam mkha' ji lta bur gzung du med cing kun
313a2(mdo sde): nas ldang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang mig yor lta bu dang / tshu rol dang pha rol bral ba'i gnas med pa'o/ /gzugs kyi mtshan
313a3(mdo sde): nyid ni/ mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs kyi sgra brnyan ni/ khams med pa dang /

313a6(mdo sde): mi len pa dang / yongs su mi rtog pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o/ /de ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shin tu
313a7(mdo sde): 'das shing mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba/ lbu ba'i phung po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba mig gi rnam par shes pas snang ba de'ang mig 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i
313b1(mdo sde): rgyu'o| |bdag med pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang stong pa ste/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa'ang med do/ /mig gnyis ni/ rgun 'brum tsam ste/ mig
313b2(mdo sde): re re la'ang tshad med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'o/ /rdul shin tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po gsog go /'byung ba chen po bzhi po re re la'ang bdag tu mi dmigs shing sems can du mi
313b3(mdo sde): dmigs na/ de la rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam/ kun nas ldang ba'ang lam du shes par lta ci smos/ rdul shin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du mig 'byung ba chen po bsags
313b4(mdo sde): pa dang / rgun 'brum tsam du yongs su brtag go /yongs su brtags pa des de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dang / lam yang med do/ /des yang dag par yongs su brtags
313b5(mdo sde): pas sems can mig yongs su brtags par 'gyur ro/ /gang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro'o/ /ji ltar yang mig
313b6(mdo sde): gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar yang mig
313b7(mdo sde): g is gzugs kyi snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu phyi dang nang gi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad lbu ba'i phung po gzugs kyi snang ba 'byung ba chen po nam
314a1(mdo sde): mkha' la mi brten par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' ji ltar dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid
314a2(mdo sde): snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu de dag thams cad kyang snang ba'o/ /ji ltar gzugs gzhan gyi nam mkha' stong pa ltar nang dang phyi'i lus kyi mtshan nyid lbu ba lta bur snang ba nas nye ba'i bar
314a3(mdo sde): du de dag thams cad gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'ang stong pa'o/ /ji ltar mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par
314a4(mdo sde): shes pas stong ngo / /'dod pa khams dang gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi mig kyang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin
314a5(mdo sde): du ran ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'byung ba chen po lta bu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing dmigs
314a6(mdo sde): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba
314a7(mdo sde): po dang / tshor bar 'jug pa dang / skye ba dang / kun tu skye ba dang / kun nas ldang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtshan ma la mtshan mas
314b1(mdo sde): mtshan ma las dmigs pa'ang med do/ /sems kyi gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / khong du chud pa dang / gnas dang / kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang / yid la byed
314b2(mdo sde): ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gzugs kyi phung po dang / nam mkha' dang / sems kyi rnam par
314b3(mdo sde): shes pa tha dad par rab tu mi shes so/ /khams gsum thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so/ /gang phyi rol dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba
314b4(mdo sde): thams cad lbu ba'i phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang / zad pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas la 'tshe ba med pa'i tshul dang / rtog pa med pa'i tshul dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa dang / 'byung ba
314b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rtag go /nam mkha' dang bral zhing gnas med pa dang / tshig gi lam la bral bar rab tu shes so/ /nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i
314b6(mdo sde): bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad 'jig pa'i chos dang / zad pa'i chos dang / dngos po'i rgyun chad pa stong pa dang / 'khrug pa rgyun chad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gang
314b7(mdo sde): gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o/ /gang rtag pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o/ /gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o/ /gang 'du byed thams cad kyi
315a1(mdo sde): tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ gang phyi dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
315a2(mdo sde): du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar rlung
315a3(mdo sde): med pa de bzhin du bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa'i bzod pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji
315a4(mdo sde): ltar brtsegs pa med cing gnod pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas gcos pa med cing gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar bag
315a5(mdo sde): la nyal ba thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du tshig gi lam thams cad bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan nyid thams
315a6(mdo sde): cad sngar ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar spros pa med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi bag la nyal ba thams cad spros pa med pa'i bzod pa'o/ /
315a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum par gtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang /
315b1(mdo sde): bdag med pa mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o/ /
315b2(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
315b3(mdo sde): sems dpas tshor ba'i phung po'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de la tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba'i tshogs rnam pa drug ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes
315b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste/ 'di dag ni/ tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o/ /tshor ba'i phung
315b5(mdo sde): po de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum du shes par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ bde bar tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal bar tshor ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal du'ang mi shes par tshor ba ste/ 'di
315b6(mdo sde): dag rnam gsum ni/ tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis tshor ba'i phung po tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de la brgyad
315b7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag gis sems can nyon mongs
316a1(mdo sde): pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba zag pa zad pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag tshor ba rnam pa gsum la zhugs
316a2(mdo sde): pa de la nyon mongs pa rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /de la tshor ba'i tshogs drug gis tshor ba rnam gsum tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs pa'i
316a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'byung ba dang / las kyi rtsa ba dang / zad pa'i rtsa ba nub pa tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dma' ba'am/ bde ba'am/ che ba'am/
316a4(mdo sde): phra ba'am/ gang nye ba'am/ gang ring bar mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo / /gang gzugs bde ba'am/ che ba'am/ phra ba'am/ gang ring ba'am/ nye bar mthong ba de la tshor ba sred pa'i
316a5(mdo sde): gnas chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / mngon par dga' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /ji ltar yang mig mig gis stong pa nas ji ltar gang du bshad
316a6(mdo sde): pa'i bar du de glo bur dang / lus ma yin pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / yi ge med pa tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur
316a7(mdo sde): 'byung ngo / /'dod chags kyis kun tu bsgribs pa 'byung ngo / /slong ba po'am/ dgod pa po'am/ kun tu rgyu ba po'am/ gsog par yang mi shes so/ /'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bdag po
316b1(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'gog pa la'ang bdag po med pa dang / mtshan nyid tshor ba la'ang bdag po med pa ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'di dag thams cad la'ang srog med pa dang / srog dang
316b2(mdo sde): bral ba dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / gso ba med pa dang / gso ba dang bral ba dang / gang zag med pa dang / gang zag dang bral ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang /

316b4(mdo sde): bral ba'i mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /brjod du med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /gnyis su med pa'i 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /rgyun chad pa
316b5(mdo sde): med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /rtag pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /mtshan ma med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /
316b6(mdo sde): smon pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /tshor ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /byed pa po'i rnam pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag
316b7(mdo sde): stong ngo / /shes pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /len pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /grol ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong
317a1(mdo sde): ngo / /dngos po med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /mun pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /snang ba med pa 'dod chags
317a2(mdo sde): kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo / /dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmigs pa rnam par bsags so/ /gnas sam byed du 'jug pa'am/ gsog par bya ba yang dag par rjes su mi
317a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dngos po dang dngos po med pa yongs su chad par yang rnam par mi rtog go /ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ci la'ang
317a4(mdo sde): chags pa med do/ /thams cad la mi rten pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'phos pa med pa la gnyis su mi byed do/ /chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag
317a5(mdo sde): par gzhol bar shes pas cung zad kyang dbye bar mi byed do/ /de chags pa'i gzugs la sems rtogs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba gnyis bral ba'o/ /gang chags pa'i gzugs
317a6(mdo sde): la tshor ba gang chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / gang 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag ni/ 'du byed brtag pa med pa'o/ /khams gsum las 'byung ba 'di'ang smon pa med pa rnam

317b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba po med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa 'di'ang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ /gang 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba blang ba med cing dor ba

318a1(mdo sde): ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes shing gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
318a2(mdo sde): ro dang / reg pa mngon par dga' ba rjes su dran pa de la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo / /tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhis bskyed do/ /de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin

318a7(mdo sde): bu med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / snyems pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / phul ba med pa dang / sel ba med pa dang / kun gzhi thams cad dang bral ba dang / chu zla lta bu dang /

319a5(mdo sde): gis stong pa dang / mig gzugs rnam par shes pas stong pa nas ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du'o/ /skad cig tu 'jig pa zad pa'i 'du byed dus gsum gyi zhe sdang gi mtha'
319a6(mdo sde): la des de stong pa nas snang ba med pa'i bar du zhe sdang gi mtha' la des do stong ste/ dus gsum gyi zhe sdang dmigs pa rnam par gsog go /zhe sdang gnas med pa nas zhe sdang can
319a7(mdo sde): gyi gzugs snang ba la sems gzhog pa dang / zhe sdang gi tshor ba dang gnyis bral bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /gang zhe sdang can gyi gzugs la zhe sdang gi kun gzhi 'byung ba dang /
319b1(mdo sde): tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'i bar du bzad pa blta bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna bas sgra nas yid kyis chos kyi bar

319b3(mdo sde): dpa'i zhe sdang gi kun gzhi yid bzhin gyi tshul kun tu rtog par bya ste/ 'di dag ni/ gzugs med pa las ji lta bur gang ma bshad pa'i bar du'o/ /nam mkha' ji ltar khro ba med gshe
319b4(mdo sde): ba med pa ltar zhe sdang gi kun gzhi'ang de bzhin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi ba de la zhe sdang med cing gshe ba med pa dang / ci la'ang chags pa med pa dang / khams gsum thams

320b1(mdo sde): kyi dbang po ma skyes pas chos la rnam par rtog pa 'di'ang sdug bsngal ba'ang med/ bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpas nang dang phyi'i mtshan nyid du snang ba dang /

321a1(mdo sde): so sor brtag par bya'o/ /yang de ltar zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis rgyu dang / rkyen dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bcu gnyis ni/ yang dag
321a2(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyis gti mug gi mun par blta'o/ /'di la ma rig pa'i gnas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni/ gang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni/ gang la
321a3(mdo sde): dmigs/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la dmigs na ni/ lus de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang g.yo ba med pa/ 'gyur

327b7(mdo sde): nas 'byung bar byed pa yang ma yin no/ /skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis phan tshun skyed par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /'gog par byed pa'ang ma yin no/ /chos 'di dag ni/ skad cig ma dang po la
328a1(mdo sde): skyes nas skad cig ma 'di nyid la 'jig ste/ skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de 'gags te reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'du shes dang sems pa
328a2(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye'o/ /de la tshor ba gang zhe na/ tshor ba'i tshogs drug go /mig gis reg nas tshor ba skye ste/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus
328a3(mdo sde): te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba skye ste/ de'ang skad cig ma gcig ma yin/ las gcig rnam par dmigs pa'i skad cig ma ma yin/ tshor ba gsum ni bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang /
328a4(mdo sde): bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal yang med pa'i tshor ba ste/ dus gsum dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi reg pa'i skye mched drug la tshor ba rnam pa gsum po stong bar khong du chud par bya ste/
328a5(mdo sde): ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no/ /yang la la dag 'di skad ces reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste/ skal pa mnyam par phung po la rnam par dpyod pa las
328a6(mdo sde): gnas pa de lta bu ni rtag par lta ba zhes 'dzer to/ /yang gang dag 'di skad ces gang reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste/ phung po med pa'i tshig la
328a7(mdo sde): gnas pa de lta bu'i chad pa zhes zer te/ gnyis ka'ang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ phyir ldog pa la gnas pa 'di
328b1(mdo sde): ni bzod pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'byung ba chen po'i lus kyi phyi rol sems med pa de la ni bskye par bya ba'i gzugs dang / mi bya ba'i gzugs kyi glog gis snang bar byed/
328b2(mdo sde): lus kyi nang du ni snang bar mi byed/ glog ni gzugs kyi rkyen las skyes pa ma yin/ gzugs rnam par dmigs pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi gnas ma yin/ gzugs kyi ro myang bar
328b3(mdo sde): byed pa ma yin/ glog gi gzugs phan tshun la 'jug pa ma yin/ gzugs mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin/ gzugs spangs nas snang bar byed pa ma yin no/ /glog gi gzugs kyi sa
328b4(mdo sde): dang mthun par 'brel te byung ba ma yin/ gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'gag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du myur pa'i phyir reg pa'i skye mched drug la gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi snang bar
328b5(mdo sde): byed de/ 'di la tshor ba gsum dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug go/ /'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pas 'du byed kyi
328b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba la gnas par ma yin no/ /tshor ba sgrub pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no/ /tshor ba 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i ro myang
328b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ma yin no/ /tshor ba mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyir ma yin no/ /tshor ba la kun tu dmigs pa'i phyir ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i ro myang ba dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba'i phung po la 'du
329a1(mdo sde): byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba skyes pa na 'du byed 'gag pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba 'gags pa na 'du
329a2(mdo sde): byed rnams gsog pa ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ glog ni/ nam mkha' bor nas gzugs rnams la snang bar byed pa ma yin te/ nam mkha' dang glog gnyis ka'ang rdzas
329a3(mdo sde): med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du chos rnams dang / ming dang gzugs dang / tshor ba rnams kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi byed do/ /khams gsum thams cad kyang rjes med pa/
329a4(mdo sde): brjod du med pa/ yi ge med pa ste/ skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis gnas pa ma yin/ phan tshun du gsog cing 'phel bas chos kyi dbyings tha dad du byed pa ma yin te/ des na de dag
329a5(mdo sde): ni| stong pa'o/ /skad cig ma gang la skyes ba skad cig ma de nyid la 'gag ste/ skad cig ma'i rgyun la gnas pa ma yin no/ /des na khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang /
329a6(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad 'byung ba med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ brjod du med pa/ stong pa'o/ /me tog gi glog gis brgyan pa 'di ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zad
329a7(mdo sde): mi shes pa snang ba'i chos kyi sgo'i gnas tshul zhes bya'o/ /skad cig ma dang po la tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la sred pa skye'o/ /de la sred pa gang zhe na/
329b1(mdo sde): sred pa'i tshogs drug ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar gyi sred pa 'byung ngo / /gang gzugs la mngon par dga' ba/ gti mug gi dra ba sgrub pa/ lus dang /
329b2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la 'jug pa thibs po ni/ nam mkha' bzhin no/ /zugs la yongs su mi rtog pa'i tshor ba ni/ glog dang nam mkha' bzhin no/ /'du shes
329b3(mdo sde): ni/ rlung dang nam mkha' bzhin no/ /'du byed rnams ni/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa ni/ smig rgyu ba dang nam mkha' bzhin no/ /gzugs las yongs
329b4(mdo sde): su mi rtog cing thar zug tu mos te/ mi rtag pa nyid yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni/ srid pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang gzugs la sdug bsngal du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / sgra dang dri la
329b5(mdo sde): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par yongs su mi rtog pa dang / ro la lam du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / reg bya la skye ba dang / 'gog pa brjod du med par yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni/ srid
329b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas la chags pa/ khams gsum thams cad du 'phro ba/ dus gsum gyi dngos po la srid pa'i gnas zhes bya'o/ /byis pa so so'i skye ba ngan pa rnams ni/ 'khor ba'i chu
329b7(mdo sde): klung gi rgyun gyi shugs 'bab pa la mngon par brtson pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpas gzugs la 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis so sor brtag par bya ste/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i
330a1(mdo sde): gzugs 'di ni/ nad dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyi de ni/ mi rtag pa ste/ ji ltar 'byung ba chen po yongs su
330a2(mdo sde): brtag pa sngar bstan pa de bzhin du so sor brtag go / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni/ sdong po'i tshul du so sor brtag par bya ste/ ji ltar sdong po nam mkha' la gnas bcas te mi gnas
330a3(mdo sde): shing sa la brten te gnas pa de bzhin du gzugs ni/ dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu ste/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par dmigs pas gzugs dang gzugs med pa la 'jug/
330a4(mdo sde): gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang mi 'bral/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i las dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa spangs nas dbu ba'i gong bu ltar snying po med par brtags
330a5(mdo sde): na stong pa ste/ 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa ni/ ji ltar rlung 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis kha nas sgra 'byung ba/ yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi sgra'ang stong par khong du
330a6(mdo sde): chud par bya'o/ /ji ltar rlung 'dus pa dang / nam mkha'i rlung dang / nam mkha' dri med de stong pa de bzhin du khams gsum yang dri lta bur khong du chud par bya'o/ /ji ltar bum pa char ba'i thigs
330a7(mdo sde): pas gang yang de'i nang du sus kyang thigs pa blugs pa med/ bsgrubs pa med/ byas pa med/ byed du bcug pa med de/ thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral
330b1(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du khams gsum bdag dang bcas pa'i ro'i yon tan yang stong par khong du chud par bya'o/ /ji ltar bum pa gar yang nam mkha' dang 'dres par bsgrubs ba med de/ ji ltar nam mkha'
330b2(mdo sde): la ma yin/ nam mkha' dang bum pa phan tshun reg pa dang bral ba/ sems med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi reg pa'ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gti
330b3(mdo sde): mug gi 'khor los bung ba me tog gi dri la chags pa de bzhin du gang yang 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / gang yang gzugs kyi sred pa 'di dag ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i tshul gyis stong par khong
330b4(mdo sde): du chud par bya'o/ /gang yang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi la srid pa gzugs med pa ni/ yi ge med pa rang bzhin med pa ste/ cung zad ma yod pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin
330b5(mdo sde): du stong par khong du chu par bya'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' la brten te rlung rgyu ba nam mkha' la rlung gis 'dres par byas shing chags pa yang med de/ nam mkha' las kyang rlung la ma yin zhing
330b6(mdo sde): gnyis ka'ang brjod du med cing yi ge srid pa de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i phung pa la'ang phan tshun dngos po med par 'grub cing ldan pa ste/ phan tshun gnod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'dre ba dang /
330b7(mdo sde): chags pa dang / gnod pa bskyed pa med pa de bzhin du phung po 'di dag yang chos thams cad mi skye ba'i tshul gyis dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nye bar mi 'gro zhing skyed pa med par khong du chud
331a1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' dang / rlung dang / glog yi ge med cing brjod du med de lhan cig tu rgyu'ang phan tshun chags pa med pa de bzhin du mya ngan las
331a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'ang zad pa med de/ /ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa zad pa'ang ma yin mi zad pa'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam ste/ mnyam
331a3(mdo sde): pa'ang med/ mi mnyam pa'ang med la gnyen po mi dmigs te/ gnyis su bya ba ma yin zhing chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par spyod par shes nas chos kyi dbyings
331a4(mdo sde): dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa cung zad mi sems te/ des na chos kyi dbyings ni/ gnas med pa'i mtha' ste/ de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'o /gang yang dag pa'i
331a5(mdo sde): mtha' de ni/ chos thams cad kyi mtha'o/ /de ni/ dkyil 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pa'i mtha'o/ /de ni/ gcod pa med cing byed pa med pa'i mtha'o/ /de ni/ chad pa med cing rtag pa

331b5(mdo sde): kyi sku mngon par grub pa ston te/ mig gi mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo bar sems can rnams la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang ston la/ 'chi 'pho'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ gang du'ang 'gro
331b6(mdo sde): zhing 'ong bar 'jug pa'ang med de/ 'du byed rnams la rnam par rtog pa'ang med do/ /de ltar don du gnyer zhing mngon par rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skad cig la sred pa
331b7(mdo sde): zhugs nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la len pa mngon par 'grub bo/ /len pa gang zhe na/ len pa bzhi ste/ gzugs kyi len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang / tshul khrims kyi len pa dang / bdag

334b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ gnas khong du chud pa ste/ gang gnas med pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o/ /de mi 'gro ba'o/ /gang mi 'gro ba de kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par
