404b6(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa dang / phye ma leb gsod pa dang / sdom pa med pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba dang / chos ma yin pa la chags pa dang / slu ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe
404b7(mdo sde): gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log pa lta ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gi dngos po rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /de na sems
405a1(mdo sde): can rnams gcig la gcig dga' ba'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / las su rung ba'i sems dang / gzung du med pa'i sems
405a2(mdo sde): dang / sa dang mtshungs pa bral ba med pa'i sems dang / sbyin pa'i sems su gyur cig /de na sems can rnams 'byung ba'i sems dang / tshul khrims kyi sems dang /
405a3(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyi sems dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems dang / bzod pa'i sems dang / bsam gtan gyi sems dang / shes rab kyi sgom pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems
405a4(mdo sde): su gyur cing / /gang la bdag mchod sbyin gyi phyir gsad par bya ba nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong ba dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma
405a5(mdo sde): snyed du rtsal chen po bya ba'i bar du bdag gi sngon gyi ltas de dag byung bar gyur cig / nam mkha' las char 'bab par gyur cig /ces bdag gis tshig de brjod ma
405a6(mdo sde): thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe na bdag gi lus thams cad kyi ba spu'i khung bu las 'o ma zag cing nam mkha' las char kyang rab tu 'bab bo/ /de na yang mchod sbyin can
405a7(mdo sde): des mi gsad par bcom ldan 'das 'dir dbang du gsol to/ /yul de na thams cad kyang dpal phun sum tshogs pa bde ba'i yo byad dang mthun par gyur to/ /nad
405b1(mdo sde): dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / char mi 'bab pa mi snang bar byas te/ gang bdag mir gyur pas chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin gyi ra ba la mchod sbyin byas
405b2(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das dpang du gsol lo/ /bal glang gi gzugs kyis chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi mchod sbyin byas pa nas rta'i gzugs dang / g.yag gi gzugs
405b3(mdo sde): dang / glang gi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / spyang ki'i gzugs dang / phyugs kyi gzugs dang / bse'i gzugs dang / ma he'i gzugs dang /
405b4(mdo sde): wa'i gzugs bsdus pas bdag byol song gi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la skye gnas re re thob pas chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor la mchod sbyin
405b5(mdo sde): byas so| |phyogs bcu kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du rnam pa de lta bu'i bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
405b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams bde bas tshim par byas pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rtsal chen po byas so/ /bam po bcu gcig pa ste tha ma/ yang btsun pa bcom
405b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ ngan pa'i dus kyi tshe nad pa la la zhig gi don du ra'i gtsang sha 'tshal bar gyur la/ yul de na ra ma mchis na de la bdag gis smon lam 'di lta
406a1(mdo sde): bu btab ste/ gal te bdag bla na med pa'i shes rab chen po ma thob kyi bar du bdag gi smon lam 'di grub par gyur cig /bdag
406a2(mdo sde): shing chen po 'di la 'dzegs te bdag mchongs nas rdzus te rar skyes la/ lhas mi rnams la bsgo ba 'di ni/ nad pa rnams kyi sman du gyur pa yin gyi/ sems
406a3(mdo sde): can de dag gi sha zos shig dang / de dag gi nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bdag 'jig rten du sangs rgyas su gyur pa der sems can
406a4(mdo sde): rnams sha za bar ma gyur cig / de na nad kyis reg pa rnams la sman du ma gyur pa'i dngos po med par gyur cig /yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur
406a5(mdo sde): cig / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pas phongs par 'gyur ba'i sgra mi grag par gyur cig /bdag de ltar nga'i
406a6(mdo sde): gzugs kyis nad pa rnams bsnyen bkur byed pa de bzhin du ji srid du yun ring por 'khor ba na sems can rnams nad kyis reg par gyur pa la sha dang / khrag
406a7(mdo sde): dang / 'o ma dang / mar gyis sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi yun ring por sems can rnams kyi nad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du byol
406b1(mdo sde): song gi skye gnas su gyur cig / bdag shing de las 'dzegs nas bdag mchongs te/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam
406b2(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / a ga ru dang / ta ka ru dang /
406b3(mdo sde): dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char rab tu phab nas bdag gi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug la 'di skad ces smras te/ skyes bu dam pa sems can no cog gis
406b4(mdo sde): bdag ma gsad cig dang / bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sems can nad pa rnams nad thams cad las yongs su thar par bya'o/ /char mi 'bab cing mu
406b5(mdo sde): ge 'byung ba thams cad dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar las kyang thar par bya ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
406b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag shing de las mchongs pa lha rnams kyis bdag nam mkha' bar snang las bzung ste/ de na bdag gis sems can rnams bslabs
406b7(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams chos la sbyor bar byas so/ /de na bdag gis sems can khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po lnga mngon par shes pa dang ldan par byas so/ /bdag gi tshig
407a1(mdo sde): gis lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar la btsud cing so sor bkod do/ /btsun
407a2(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi smon lam ni/ de lta bu lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyangs la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin
407a3(mdo sde): nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smon lam de lta bur gyur te/ spyad par dka' ba spyod pa'i seng+ge'i sgra de lta bu bsgrags pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ji ltar sngon
407a4(mdo sde): lan 'ga'i zhes bya ba nyi ma la dga' bar gyur pa de ngas bskul nas thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur tam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
407a5(mdo sde): sngon lan 'ga' 'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ma mchis so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag thog ma byang chub sems
407a6(mdo sde): dpar gyur pa ni/ 'di lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i thad du mchis te/ de'i tshe da ltar ji skad du brjod pa'i smon lam
407a7(mdo sde): de lta bu btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod gal te sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na smon lam de lta bu sus bslabs/ gsol pa/
407b1(mdo sde): de na bdag dben pa zhig tu mchis te/ dog sa la mchis nas smon lam zhig gdab par sems pa de na bdag gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang pos smon lam de dag
407b2(mdo sde): bsgo ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar smon lam btab bo/ /de na bdag sems can rnams la snying rje skyes te 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs so/ /de phyis rjes su dpag pa des
407b3(mdo sde): mchod sbyin smra ba bdag gis yongs su btang ba bgyis te smon lam de lta bu btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod lta bar song ba de dag tu zhugs sam/ gsol pa
407b4(mdo sde): ma lags so/ /su zhig gi mthus/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/
407b5(mdo sde): smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su dgrol gyi/ gzhan gang gi mthus kyang sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs
407b6(mdo sde): su grol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub kyi phyir lung bstan pa 'di su zhig gi dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du yin nam/ 'on te dus
407b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal bar med pa tshor ba'i skye mched drug po 'di dag gi yin nam/ 'on te tshor ba med pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyir
408a1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di su zhig gi yin/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ bdag lung bstan par gsol ba'am bdag la lung ston
408a2(mdo sde): pa'am| bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'di rdzas ma mchis/ dngos po ma mchis/
408a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin ma mchis/ cung zad kyang ma mchis/ yi ge ma mchis/ thob pa ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang rdzas ma mchis shing dngos po ma mchis
408a4(mdo sde): pa nas brjod du ma mchis shing ma skyed pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum gyi gzugs 'byung ba ma mchis te lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas rnam
408a5(mdo sde): par shes pa'i bar du'ang ma skyes pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dus gsum gyi mig 'byung ba ma mchis shing lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas dus gsum gyi nang gi
408a6(mdo sde): yid kyi bar dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / bde ba'ang ma mchis sdug bsngal ba'ang ma mchis pa'i tshor ba'ang ma skyes pa nas lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bar du'o/ /
408a7(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid la skye ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ 'jig pa mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi
408b1(mdo sde): dbyings la'ang gnas par mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /brdar btags pa tsam du'ang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
408b2(mdo sde): ste| de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la'ang
408b3(mdo sde): brdar btags pa tsam du'ang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ dus gsum gyi mig gi yang dag pa'i mtha' nas
408b4(mdo sde): brda tsam du btags pa'i mig gi mtshan nyid nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba'ang ma mchis sdug bsngal la'ang ma mchis pa'i
408b5(mdo sde): bar du'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa
408b6(mdo sde): dang | 'gog pa mi dmigs so/ /yid dang chos kyi khams kyang mi dmigs so/ /bdag gis ni/ yid rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i
408b7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ brag ca lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/ /chos thams cad
409a1(mdo sde): ni| mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ chu zla lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang
409a2(mdo sde): gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin spangs pa'i mtshan nyid bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba zhig
409a3(mdo sde): mchis te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing yongs su gzung du ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin
409a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
409a5(mdo sde): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / rab tu stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong
409a6(mdo sde): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
409a7(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag bzung ba de ni/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
409b1(mdo sde): thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang de skad brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di lta ste/ de ni/ ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dwags so/ /'di
409b2(mdo sde): lta ste/ bdag la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan to snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni/ lung
409b3(mdo sde): bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / brjod pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor
409b4(mdo sde): ma lags pa dang / lam dang / lam ma lags pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid kyi lam ma mchis shing phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid
409b5(mdo sde): dang | chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi lam yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de bzhin du gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas rnam par
409b6(mdo sde): shes pa'i bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi lam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lung
409b7(mdo sde): bstan pa brjod pa 'di'i skabs dang go skabs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang gzugs kyi lung bstan pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / mig nas yid kyi bar gyi lung
410a1(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / gang byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad
410a2(mdo sde): p a na| kun tu rgyu shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sras kyang de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa rab tu thob par
410a3(mdo sde): gyur to| |sems can gzhan mu stegs can nga rgyal bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum po de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog
410a4(mdo sde): pa'i sa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas
410a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin des sems can gyi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi por de dag
410a6(mdo sde): gi sgra brjod pa'i tshig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin des skye gnas dang sgra dbyangs kyi tshig brjod pa thams cad tshim par byed do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge
410a7(mdo sde): dang smras pa nyon cig / grogs po dag nyon cig /grogs po dag /lha dang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / lam gang gis nyan thos kyi theg pa rnyed de sdug bsngal thams cad zad
410b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnyed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par 'gyur ba bde ba dang zhi ba'i lam ston cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis
410b2(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs brjod pa de phyogs bcu kun tu skad dang tshig gcig brjod pas yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi brjod pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa
410b3(mdo sde): des sems can thams cad rang rang gi tshig khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed sgra dbyangs kyis
410b4(mdo sde): rgyas par byed do/ /chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa de'i sems can ngan par song ba rnams kyi rna lam du'ang grag go /de nas sems can de dag
410b5(mdo sde): rang rang gi tshig kun tu shes nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba/ 'di ltar snyan pa/ 'di ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di su'i tshig bdag cag la zhi ba dang bde ba'i lam
410b6(mdo sde): ston pa'i sems can gyi snying po 'di su zhig / lam gang bstan pas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob/ nyan thos kyi sa ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig /rang sangs rgyas
410b7(mdo sde): kyi sa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig /lam gang thob na bdag cag lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad byang zhing sdug bsngal thams
411a1(mdo sde): cad byang ste lus kyi g.yeng ba thams cad srab par gyur/ de bas na bdag gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan par bya snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka'
411a2(mdo sde): stsal pa| grogs po dag / bcu po 'di dag ni/ dge ba'i las kyi lam ste/ des lha dang mir skye ba rab tu 'thob/ sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'ang
411a3(mdo sde): 'thob| sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba thob bo/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam des sems can thams cad kyi mchog dam pa/ khyad par can/ phul/ byams pa chen po/ /snying rje chen
411a4(mdo sde): po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang zhe na/
411a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i las kyi lam gang dang ldan na/ sems can rnams myur du lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/
411a6(mdo sde): de la grogs po dag /lha dang mi rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam la brtson par bya'o/ /sbyin pa sbyin no/ /tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /'du shes bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
411a7(mdo sde): rnam par bam par 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba dang /
411b1(mdo sde): rnam par rnags par 'du shes pa dang / /rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang / 'bus gang bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par zos par 'du shes pa
411b2(mdo sde): dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang / keng rus su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bar 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i
411b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa thob ste/ mir gyur pa thob nas kyang yang gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su 'thob par
411b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i 'du shes bcu gnyis bsgom par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
411b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa
411b6(mdo sde): dang / zhi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lhag mthong rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su thob
411b7(mdo sde): cing mir gyur pa thob nas kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi'i ror mgron bya bar bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
412a1(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ bla na med pa yang dag
412a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra skad dang / dbyangs brjod pas sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'di lta ste/ da ltar
412a3(mdo sde): gyi bzhin du bde ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag rnams ni/ gor ma chag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i spobs pa
412a4(mdo sde): mthong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
412a5(mdo sde): s nyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin des phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa stong par gyur pa'i rnyog pa lnga'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed du sprul pa'i
412a6(mdo sde): phyir sems can tshangs pa la mos pa de dag gi mdun du ni/ tshangs pa'i gzugs su so sor gnas shing chos ston to/ /la la dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
412a7(mdo sde): chub yang dag par len du 'dzud la 'jug par byed cing so sor 'god do/ /sems can la la dag ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/ /la la dag ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la'o/ /
412b1(mdo sde): la la dag ni/ dge ba'i las kyi lam la sbyor bas lha dang mi rnams kyi phyir ro/ /gang dbang phyug la mos pa nas glang po la glang po'i gzugs kyi bar dang / rta la rta'i gzugs dang / yi
412b2(mdo sde): dwags la yi dwags kyi gzugs dang / sems can dmyal ba pa la sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste chos ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i
412b3(mdo sde): sems can la la dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nas lha dang mi'i bar dag la'ang sbyor te/ sems can gang dag der sngon
412b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bskyed pa de dag ni/ de bas kyang brtan par byas so/ /sems can gang dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni/ der bskyed do/ /sems can gang dad pa'i
412b5(mdo sde): r gyu des ngan song gsum po de dag las shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes pa de'i tshe de'i dus na phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs
412b6(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing re rer yang tshad med grangs med pa'i chu klung gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de
412b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun to/ /la la dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob bo/ /la la dag ni/ de lta bu'i bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs rab tu thob ste/ bzod pa dang /
413a1(mdo sde): gzungs ji snyed thob pa'i stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gan du lhags so/ /gang
413a2(mdo sde): r kyen la 'jug pa'i theg pa la sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA'i grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dag las kha
413a3(mdo sde): cig ni| gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing skyong la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong ngo / /kha cig ni/ phyir mi
413a4(mdo sde): ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/ /de bzhin du gang nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag
413a5(mdo sde): tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems
413a6(mdo sde): can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par gnas pa lha dang mi'i lam thob par gyur pa chu klung gang+gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i
413a7(mdo sde): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes so/ /la la dag ni/ smon
413b1(mdo sde): l am gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho skyong zhing byang chub sems dpa' dag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te chos kyang ston pa'i
413b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad sna
413b3(mdo sde): tshogs cho ma cho dgu grangs med dpag tu med pa byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'jig rten dag na mkhas
413b4(mdo sde): pa gang / /blo dang ldan zhing 'jigs med pa/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos shing / /bya bar dka' ba rnams kyang spyod/ /pha yi dngos po rnam par ston/ /sems can sdug bsngal smin par byed//
413b5(mdo sde): bdud bzhi dag kyang 'dul bar byed/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba thob/ /sbyin pa sgom pa sdom pa yis/ /sems can rnams la las ston cing / /theg pa gsum la sbyor ba yis/ /de dag thar pa'i
413b6(mdo sde): skal pa thob/ /gang dag ngan 'gro gsum gnas pa/ /sdug bsngal gnod las thar byed cing / /de dag sems ni dang byas nas/ /lha dang mir ni rab tu khrid/ /dge ba'i chos la rab sbyor

425b6(mdo sde): pa la dgyes na/ deng 'dir ni/ char 'bab pa'ang ma mchis/ shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/ grong khyim dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mi phal yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das
425b7(mdo sde): 'dir ci la dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad ces gsungs/ phal shul ring po nas mchi ba/ bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams srog kyang mi
426a1(mdo sde): 'tsho ste| zas mchis na ni/ srog mchis/ srog mchis na ni/ lus mchis/ lus mchis na ni/ chos lam yang mchis so/ /zas ma mchis na/ srog ma
426a2(mdo sde): mchis| srog ma mchis na/ lus ma mchis/ lus ma mchis na/ chos lam yang ma mchis lags na/ da 'di'i nang du 'di lta bu yid la bab bo gang yang ma mchis par bcom
426a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'dir chos bshad ces gsungs/ de nas shes rab chen po shA radwa ti'i bus sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo la smras pa/ sngar chos kyi phyir
426a4(mdo sde): zhu ba'i rigs kyi/ gzhan bsam mi dgos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhir ma zad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa
426a5(mdo sde): dang / cis kyang mi bsnyengs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa mnga' ste/ gang rten med pa de'i ni/ rten du mdzad/
426a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ma mthong ba ni/ mthong bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mdzad/ bde ba med pa ni/ bde ba la reg par mdzad/ ma grol
426a7(mdo sde): ba ni| rnam par grol bar mdzad/ longs spyod dang mi ldan pa ni/ longs spyod dang ldan par mdzad/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/ de bzhin
426b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rang 'byung med pa'i mya ngan bya ci dgos/ bdag dran pa sngon dra ma chen po dri
426b2(mdo sde): ma med par grags pas phal mang po la chos bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mthu
426b3(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'i lha dang / klu la sogs pa'i phal mang po khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe na zas dag mi snang nas bdag gis de'i tshe phal mang po 'di rnams kyi zas ji ltar
426b4(mdo sde): 'byor snyam bsam pa las dri ma med par grags pas bdag la smras pa/ nyan thos shes rab dman pa/ yang dag pa'i chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi/ thog ma nas zas dang / gos dang / khri
426b5(mdo sde): stan la sogs pa sgyu ma'i rdzas la ci'i phyir rnam par rtog ces dri ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas de skad smras pa'i tshe lha dang / mi rnams ni/ chos lam thob/ bdag ni/ skyengs te/
426b6(mdo sde): khyod da ltar smras pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo/ blo gros kyi mchog shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa bden te/ theg pa chen po
426b7(mdo sde): bsam pa'i rigs kyi lus bde ba'i phyir bsam pa ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas byin gyis brlabs kyi mod las der gser gyi me tog cig
427a1(mdo sde): 'bus nas byung ste/ de'i 'phang du dpag tshad khri phrag bzhi bcu yod la/ stong khams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas bai DUR+ya'i dra bas kyang gser gyi me tog
427a2(mdo sde): khyab par g.yogs te/ me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrus kyi rdzing bu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba/ de'i ngos bzhir me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang
427a3(mdo sde): po la 'di lta ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / puN+Da rI ka la sogs pa rnam pa mang po dpag tu med pas rin po che'i rdzing rnam par brgyan pa byung nas gang la la zhig
427a4(mdo sde): gis gser gyi me tog dang / rin po che'i rdzing bu mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi rnam par dag pa thob na/ nang du zhugs te khrus byas pa lta ci smos/ gal te zhugs te khrus byas pa ni/ rnam
427a5(mdo sde): par dag pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /gser gyi me tog de'i 'og tu seng+ge'i khri rin po che las byas pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa byung ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
427a6(mdo sde): kyis rin po che'i khri de la bzhugs nas sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dang / yan lag kun nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang gser gyi me tog dag gi
427a7(mdo sde): kha dog dang mthun par phyogs bzhir byung bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ri lung dang / yul sa kun kyang
427b1(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur nas thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ sme gtsog pa'ang med la sems can dmyal ba'ang zhi nas yi dwags kyang rnam par grol te/ log spyod dang dam pa'i chos
427b2(mdo sde): la smod pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyur nas tha dad pa med do/ /phyogs
427b3(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od zer de gzigs nas so so nas tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so/ /zhes pas bstod nas legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan
427b4(mdo sde): 'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'di ni/ sngon gyi 'od zer dang mi 'dra ste/ sngon chad kyi 'od ni/ shar phyogs su sngar shar na/ deng gi 'od ni/ phyogs bzhi nas dus gcig tu
427b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcur khyab par shar ba las bltas na/ 'od des ni/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te mya ngan las bzla bar mngon no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de
427b6(mdo sde): nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams so so'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
427b7(mdo sde): mjed nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'od zer chen po gtong ba ni/ gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos bstan cing sems can
428a1(mdo sde): rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral gyi cha na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/ sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phul nas the tshom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi
428a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs nyan cing gsol ba'i rigs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can yongs kyis ngan cing khro la rdzun rgyu can te/ theg pa gcig la ma dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa
428a3(mdo sde): shAkya thub par byams pa chen po thabs sna tshogs kyis theg pa gsum du phye ste srid pa gsum las rnam par grol bar byed do/ /theg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dge ba/ bar
428a4(mdo sde): du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ /ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dge ba/ yongs su dkar ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong
428a5(mdo sde): du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do cig kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ 'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdan khri dang /
428a6(mdo sde): gser gyi me tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tshom dag zhu na/ khyed rnams kyang
428a7(mdo sde): bsod nams thob la/ skye bo kun la phan pa dang / bde bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
428b1(mdo sde): p hrag bcu bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag btsal nas thabs gcig tu dong ste byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te me tog rin
428b2(mdo sde): po che mchog tu bzang po'i char phab nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang /
428b3(mdo sde): ngag gcig dang / sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis
428b4(mdo sde): na| skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
428b5(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /the tshom yod na de kun dris shig dang / ngas khyed rnams la byed brag phyed par bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan
428b6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ theg pa gcig las mi bshad na/ 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg
428b7(mdo sde): pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed
429a1(mdo sde): rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyi/ nyon cig /rigs kyi bu rnams/ dper na/ mi gcig la ming gsum yod
429a2(mdo sde): pa lta bu ste/ chung ngu'i tshe na ni/ byis pa zhes bya/ lo nyi shu yan chad la skyes bu zhes bya/ lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa ni/ rgan po zhes bya'o/ /nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/
429a3(mdo sde): sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni/ theg pa chung ngu bstan/ sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni/ theg pa 'bring po bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam
429a4(mdo sde): chen po la zhugs pa la ni/ theg pa chen po bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig /mdor mtha' gnyis med pa dang phyogs gcig tu mthun te/ shes pa'i sgo tha dad
429a5(mdo sde): kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o/ /mdo ni/ theg pa gcig ste/ thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'du la theg
429a6(mdo sde): pa chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /de bas na theg pa gsum yang theg pa gcig go /zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la
429a7(mdo sde): bzod pa thob bo/ /dge slong brgyad brgyas ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lha nyi khris ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob/ mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni/ mod la bla na med
429b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
429b2(mdo sde): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan
429b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin
429b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ri dang / nags dang / tshal dang / shing drung dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas
429b5(mdo sde): dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / dgon pa dang / dur khrod dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas khang dang / chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba
429b6(mdo sde): dang / khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas na ngan 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur
429b7(mdo sde): ro| |sngon de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/ gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa
430a1(mdo sde): skyes te rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do/ /gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyal ba'i mdo 'di thos te dga' ba skyes nas
430a2(mdo sde): dad pa dang gus pa'i sems kyis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byas sam/ blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs
430a3(mdo sde): 'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni/ tshe 'di nyid la bde ba thob ste/ sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi
430a4(mdo sde): 'phos na'ang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis sngon du lam drangs te bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad
430a5(mdo sde): du zhe na| mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang / gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/ /mdo sde 'di blangs te/ gzungs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni/
430a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te/ de bas na de dag ni/ bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go /rgyu dang rkyen des na mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa rnams gcig tu skye zhing mi
430a7(mdo sde): 'bral bar smon to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod
430b1(mdo sde): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dbyangs can dang / 'phrog ma mo dang / ri'i
430b2(mdo sde): lha dang / shing gi lha dang / klung gi lha dang / mtsho'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rang rang gi stan las langs
430b3(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing gus pas phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das
430b4(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'dri la rtag tu bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu mdun du bdar te yongs su
430b5(mdo sde): dag par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di mchod rten du'am/ gnas khang du'am/ khyim pa'i khyim du'am/ dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/ gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug pa mi gtsang bas mdo
430b6(mdo sde): sde 'di bzung ngam/ ma gus par bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyis na/ bdag cag gis gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/ /gang
430b7(mdo sde): du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / glo bur du gnod la 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / tshe 'phos na'ang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o/ /gang
431a1(mdo sde): la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par bgyis te sug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam/ khrus bgyis te bdug spos kyis bdug cing bklags sam/ kha
431a2(mdo sde): ton du bgyis sam/ 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ rjes su dran nam/ sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na/ bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di
431a3(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang zag de nyal na'ang de'i mdun du mchis te ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /yang gcig tu na dgra ma
431a4(mdo sde): rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/ /de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ste mgron du 'chi na/ bdag cag rnams
431a5(mdo sde): kyis rtag tu 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhir gang du mchi na'ang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun du dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na'ang lhar skye bar bgyi'o/ /
431a6(mdo sde): rgyu de dang rkyen des ni/ sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stor bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
431a7(mdo sde): dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur
431b1(mdo sde): na| mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur/ ga la te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byed par 'dod na/ khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te khang ba
431b2(mdo sde): dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan+dan dang / phye ma dang / byug pas mchod cing phyag btsal nas de ltar nyin
431b3(mdo sde): mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo btsugs nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo se 'di bklags te/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng ba
431b4(mdo sde): dang / bsam pa mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g.yeng ba dang / spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang / bstan cing bslab pa mi g.yeng bar nyin mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas byung
431b5(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa'am/ kha ton du 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang
431b6(mdo sde): nas 'byung ba'i sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyi/ de la the tshom mam yid gnyis su ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i
431b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /'di ni/ srung zhing skyob pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni/ mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o/ /'di ni/ don dam pa'i snying po'o/ /'di ni/ byang chub
432a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni/ 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /
432a2(mdo sde): drug gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / me chen po dang / rlung chen po dang / nyi ma chen po dang / nam mkha' chen po dang / mdo sde 'di ni/ sa chen po dang 'dra ste/ gtsang sme
432a3(mdo sde): dang / bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ chu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme gtsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ me chen po dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa
432a4(mdo sde): dang / gtsog pa dang / ljan ljin thams cad tshig par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ rlung chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme gtsog thams cad 'bud par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ nyi ma chen po dang 'dra
432a5(mdo sde): ste| mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do/ /de lta bu'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen
432a6(mdo sde): po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni/ dpe zla med de/ yar byang chub sems dpa' dang / bar du nyan thos dang / mar 'jig tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shong ba med do/ /de bas na
432a7(mdo sde): khyed rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung ste chongs shig / kun tu spel bar gyis shig /dad cing gus par byos shig dang / khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
432b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thugs su chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o/ /khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te 'chang na/ rgyun du nga'ang
432b2(mdo sde): mthong la/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas
432b3(mdo sde): ' khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa zhes bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan
432b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams gsol zhing zhu ba mchis na/ dpag tu ma mchis
432b5(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad pa la bka'
432b6(mdo sde): stsal pa| shin tu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /khyod kyis dris pa de'ang sems can
432b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag dran pa sngon yun ring por
433a1(mdo sde): 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chen gtsug phud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan gcig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo/ /zhes thos te/ de las yun mi
433a2(mdo sde): r ing ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab bskams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa
433a3(mdo sde): gdugs kyis gdungs te 'gum du nye ba las/ dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang / snying rje skyes te chab dang / kha zas stsal
433a4(mdo sde): kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni/ gson grang na/ tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma
433a5(mdo sde): thag tu dus las 'das te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi sar skyes so/ /zhes gda' na/ deng bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang / dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs/
433a6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang / bde ba dang / dpag tu ma mchis
433a7(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams dang / rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ sdom pa'i
433b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyas byang chub sems
433b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshad na/ bskal pa brgya stong
433b3(mdo sde): khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ 'di ltar chu thams cad kyi thigs pa ni/ bgrang zhing shes par rung gi /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /ri rab
433b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ srang grangs su bgrang du rung gi /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug par shes par rung gi /sangs
433b5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ grangs su shes pa med do/ /ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan gyi/ gang gis rna bar lan gcig thos na/ gang
433b6(mdo sde): zag de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skya bar 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang mos pa dang gus par byas te yi ger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med
433b7(mdo sde): pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas
434a1(mdo sde): gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur/ nga yang mthong la dus ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
434a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams tshul bzhin du gos tshags bcos la lus mi g.yeng ba dang / sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi
434a3(mdo sde): g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng bar byos la chos thos par 'dod na sems rtse gcig tu sdus shig /bcom ldan 'das mar me ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
434a4(mdo sde): 'das rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
434a5(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams
434a6(mdo sde): cad sdud cing 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brjod dpag 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam khyab dka' la
434a7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs la gnas pa'i stobs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gtso la phyag
434b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /thams cad 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'ching ba kun gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gyi mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten kun las
434b2(mdo sde): 'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' ltar dmigs su med
434b3(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi tshogs 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bu gcig gi pha ltar byams pa chen po la phyag 'tshal
434b4(mdo sde): l o| |tshe rabs 'chi 'pho gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin par gyur
434b5(mdo sde): cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs can kun la sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kye 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag par mnyan cing sems thag
434b6(mdo sde): pa nas mchod pa phul cig / ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon/ /sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yangs/ /rnam grol mtshan nyid bskyed par
434b7(mdo sde): byas| |dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag la/ /ngas ni dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang / /des kyang chung bar mi nus te/ /sa bon tshig rnams rang bzhin dong / /grung brtan 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur
435a1(mdo sde): theg pa chung du bsal nas su/ /theg chen nyi tshe yod par 'gyur/ /theg pa gnyis po bsal nas su/ /theg pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur/ /dge rtsa med pa'i gang
435a2(mdo sde): zag gis/ /sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas grangs med mchod myong bas/ /gdod des sangs rgyas mtshan thos so/ /len cing 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /phyogs tsam rnam
435a3(mdo sde): par grol ba ste/ /rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas/ /da yang nga yi chos 'di la/ /sangs rgyas spyad pa kun spyad de/ /sangs rgyas mtshan la phyag 'tshal zhing / /mdo 'di blang zhing klog
435a4(mdo sde): 'chang na/ /bdud kyi las dang bral bar 'gyur/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med dang / /log spyod rnams kyi sdig kyang 'byang / /ma 'ongs dus na gang zag de/ /'phags pa'i lam yang
435a5(mdo sde): nges par 'grub/ /gang zhig dad pa ma skyes na/ /ngan song gsum du ltung yang dag /dad skyes brtson 'grus phyag btsal na/ /tshad med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas rtse
435a6(mdo sde): gcig phyag 'tshal zhing / /sdig pa dpag med byang bar smon/ /de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te yang dag par mnyan nas lus dang
435a7(mdo sde): sems rtse gcig tu bsdus te g.yel zhing 'gyur ba med par yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te sems thag pa nas nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi
435b1(mdo sde): mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrags pa las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla mar me gsal nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
435b2(mdo sde): sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal bu bcu drug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rgyal po la phyag
435b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang mar me rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byin sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od

435b6(mdo sde): sprin 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
435b7(mdo sde): shing sA la rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma dpal gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi
436a1(mdo sde): g.yo 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos tsan+dan la
436a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri legs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab lha'i thur tshugs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
436a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zla gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chags med la phyag
436a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya'i me tog

437b5(mdo sde): 'grus chen po bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i
437b6(mdo sde): dpal 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tu dgram la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas brtson 'grus che btsan la phyag 'tshal

438a1(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan gyi phug rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bzang legs gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
438a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas legs par sad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
438a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i bla bre stong pa nyid du brtan pa'i
438a4(mdo sde): stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rin chen me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
438a5(mdo sde): bai DUR+ya rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku kun tu mngon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
438a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bdud kyi rgyal po rnams tshar gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
438a7(mdo sde): rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dben zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog
438b1(mdo sde): btsun ye shes kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gdugs rin po che'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag
438b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyi ba dan mchog tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
438b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser
438b4(mdo sde): 'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog dbyangs dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
438b5(mdo sde): rgyas ba dan 'od rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi na bza'i rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
438b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog su ma na'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog
438b7(mdo sde): ut+pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas stobs btsan dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga'
439a1(mdo sde): ba'i 'khrug med kyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs bdag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
439a2(mdo sde): gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi ri dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thar pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
439a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blun mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal
439a4(mdo sde): lo| |'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig / sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas
439a5(mdo sde): sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig
439a6(mdo sde): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gal te gang zag la las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos
439a7(mdo sde): na| de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/ de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'das pa'i mtshan/ /de la
439b1(mdo sde): gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /sems nyid thob cing sdig kyang 'byang / /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/ /phyin chad mi byed sdom par nus/ /dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/ /theg chen tshul khrims
439b2(mdo sde): ldan pa ste/ /de phyir da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te/ /theg chen chos la dmod pa dang / /log spyod rnams su lta ba'o/ /gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag na/ /
439b3(mdo sde): log spyod ces su mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dpag med rtag tu mthong / /sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang / /mtshams med sngar bcas gang byas pa/ /rnam dag sems kyis 'gyod nus na/ /de ni
439b4(mdo sde): tshul bzhin gnas pa yin/ /de yang gus par phyag 'tshal phyir/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /theg chen tshul khrims thob las na/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i
439b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad brgyas ni/ theg pa chen po'i sems shas
439b6(mdo sde): tsam skyes so/ /dge slong lnga stong ni/ dgra bcom par grub bo/ /lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag
439b7(mdo sde): tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gsal rgyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i mdog dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
440a1(mdo sde): snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal
440a2(mdo sde): lo| |sangs rgyas seng+ge 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyi ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
440a3(mdo sde): lo| |sangs rgyas yon tan bde gnas rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
440a4(mdo sde): dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
440a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dka' thub seng+ge'i
440a6(mdo sde): nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
440a7(mdo sde): rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
440b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag
440b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la
440b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan+dan 'dab ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid mchog
440b4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ sangs rgyas zil mngar rnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang
440b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan dang ldan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal
440b6(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng+ge'i sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag
440b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer
441a1(mdo sde): dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi rgyal po la
441a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bla na med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug
441a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs thor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
441a4(mdo sde): rgyas bro mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab ting nge
441a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas drin dpal kun tu
441a6(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
441a7(mdo sde): rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid sgra snyan sred la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
441b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal
441b2(mdo sde): lo| |sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la
441b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ta ma ra ba ra tsan+dan
441b4(mdo sde): gyi spos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa thams cad
441b5(mdo sde): bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong /
441b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khri la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/
441b7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la las da ltar bzhugs
442a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na/ de ni/ bskal pa khri phrag drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas gus par
442a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag btsal na/ /las ngan kun las rnam par grol/ /mtshams med lnga pa'i sdig kyang 'byang / /rnam
442a3(mdo sde): dag sa la rtag tu gnas/ /shAkya'i chos la'ang bde gnas shing / /mtha' ru ngan song gsum dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mthong ba dang / /sangs rgyas stong yang mthong bar 'gyur//
442a4(mdo sde): de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste/ /rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye/ /dam pa'i chos kyang thos gyur cing / /sangs rgyas rtag pa'ang mngon par rtogs//
442a5(mdo sde): da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas gzungs kyi sgor chud par gyur to/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag
442a6(mdo sde): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa la phyag
442a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang la phyag
442b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dzam+bu na da'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen
442b2(mdo sde): snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas khyab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab
442b3(mdo sde): ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas skyes bu
442b4(mdo sde): dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mthong dga'
442b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi mtshan mas rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan mthun pa kun tu dpal sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
442b6(mdo sde): rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri
442b7(mdo sde): ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bgegs kyi tshogs
443a1(mdo sde): thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam
443a2(mdo sde): par bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par
443a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lung bstan pa pad+ma'i
443a4(mdo sde): 'od lnga brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje ting nge
443a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi dbang phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs
443a6(mdo sde): med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag
443a7(mdo sde): khri bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gang zag dang la las thos par 'gyur na/ bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems
443b1(mdo sde): can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas da ltar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /log spyod rnams ni ma gtogs te/ /sgrib pa gsum dang
443b2(mdo sde): mtshams med lnga/ /sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la bde gnas shing / /dpag med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos kyang rtag tu thos/ /de bas da ltar
443b3(mdo sde): gus phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ /kha na ma tho 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /las ngan bcu po byas pa yang / /
443b4(mdo sde): da ltar mngon du byang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas kyi/ /ngo bo nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas de la mos par byos/ /kha ton 'bri klog phyag 'tshal na/ /tshe rabs gar byung gar
443b5(mdo sde): skyes kyang / /lta ba log par mi skye'o/ /rnam par grol ba rgyun du thob/ /mtha' 'khob sa ru yong mi skye/ /ngan pa'i yul du'ang mi skye zhing / /rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa 'bum
443b6(mdo sde): phrag bzhi khri'i bar/ /sems can dmyal bar mi skye 'o/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /gzungs chen rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das
443b7(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas ma byon pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga khris phyir mi ldog pa'i sar gnas so/ /dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni/ dgra bcom mar grub bo/ /
444a1(mdo sde): lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis ni/ chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /gzungs chen po dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdo'i sde la
444a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde la
444a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin
444a4(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
444a5(mdo sde): gang gis mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos nas bstod pa byas sam/ phyag 'tshal lam/ brjod dam/ mos pa bskyed dam/ blangs sam/ 'chang bar byed na/
444a6(mdo sde): gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ tshe snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir gus pas phyag 'tshol cig /bcom ldan 'das
444a7(mdo sde): kyis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /nyan thos 'bum phrag bcus theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /
444b1(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha dang mi dpag tu med pa zhig gis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
444b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
444b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
444b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
444b5(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla gang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che la phyag
444b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la
444b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dren mkhan la phyag 'tshal
445a1(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'chad mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag
445a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan rin po che'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas la
445a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin
445a4(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par gus la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rgyal po'i me
445a5(mdo sde): tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson
445a6(mdo sde): 'grus yon tan gyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
445a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' spyan rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
445b1(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam legs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul me tog
445b2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la
445b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la
445b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpung gnas la
445b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gog spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
445b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mnyam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par mi rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
445b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mtshan
446a1(mdo sde): nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
446a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
446a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun du bteg la phyag
446a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun du phab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang
446a5(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
446a6(mdo sde): snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
446a7(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen blta ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dra ba snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
446b1(mdo sde): skyon med rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
446b2(mdo sde): lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
446b3(mdo sde): dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
446b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' btang bzung ri sgul ba'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
446b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dkar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
446b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dbyug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dgra thub med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
446b7(mdo sde): dpa' zhing gi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
447a1(mdo sde): dpa' gzhon nur brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang shar la phyag
447a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal
447a3(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tsan+dan gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la
447a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtsug tor la
447a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang mchog la phyag 'tshal
447a6(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
447a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtsang shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs ldan sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
447b1(mdo sde): dpa' mngon sum mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na
447b2(mdo sde): dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi
447b3(mdo sde): zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thogs med la
447b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal
447b5(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal
447b6(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mthong la phyag
447b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po me tog la phyag 'tshal lo//
