448a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dri mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lan ldon mkhas pa la
448a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges
448a3(mdo sde): par brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' bskyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud
448a4(mdo sde): skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab go
448a5(mdo sde): 'phang 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
448a6(mdo sde): shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba rnam bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
448a7(mdo sde): dpa' rgya mtsho mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
448b1(mdo sde): dpa' mdo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
448b2(mdo sde): dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
448b3(mdo sde): seng+ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgra mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
448b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyi bo skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
448b5(mdo sde): dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang
448b6(mdo sde): ba brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtso mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus kun tu
448b7(mdo sde): mngon par ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku
449a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
449a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rje la
449a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la
449a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin la phyag
449a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
449a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
449a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu phan gdags la phyag 'tshal lo//
449b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
449b2(mdo sde): dpa' yang dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
449b3(mdo sde): rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ston pa'i mkhan po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod
449b4(mdo sde): pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
449b5(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rigs la phyag
449b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu snying rje la phyag 'tshal
449b7(mdo sde): lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
450a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin la phyag 'tshal
450a2(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' ri ngar can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
450a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
450a4(mdo sde): dpa' char pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
450a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
450a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo//
450a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chu la phyag 'tshal
450b1(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
450b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
450b3(mdo sde): gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i thor tshugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
450b4(mdo sde): dpa' 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo rig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bla ba rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
450b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
450b6(mdo sde): sbyin pa rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dam pa la
450b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnyen pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma'i 'od la phyag
451a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba
451a2(mdo sde): dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
451a3(mdo sde): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la
451a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal btsun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya che la phyag 'tshal lo//
451a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
451a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' snang thar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
451a7(mdo sde): gzugs stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus spyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig dang /
451b1(mdo sde): bcu dang / brgya dang / stong dang / khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya/ khri phrag nyis brgya/ khri phrag sum brgya/ khri phrag bzhi brgya/ khri phrag lnga brgya/ khri phrag drug brgya/ khri phrag
451b2(mdo sde): bdun brgya/ khri phrag brgyad brgya/ khri phrag dgu brgya/ khri phrag stong rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
451b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig / 'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ 'bum phrag khri phrag khri la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa
451b4(mdo sde): tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi zad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed
451b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal
451b6(mdo sde): lo| |gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA brgya'i
451b7(mdo sde): bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA khri'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang+gA bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams
452a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis byang
452a2(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa gsum gyi khams su
452a3(mdo sde): mi gtogs te/ rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur/ mtha' 'khob tu mi skye/ yul ngan par mi skye/ lus ngan par mi len/ log par mi lta/ rigs ngan du
452a4(mdo sde): mi skye/ mu stegs can du mi skye/ dbang po yan lag tshang bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan bar
452a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas
452a6(mdo sde): shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can
452a7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dge slong sems stor ba
452b1(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni/ sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni/ gzungs chen po thob ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i
452b2(mdo sde): dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
452b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba can rnams kyis lan gcig thos na/ 'chi 'phos pa'i tshe lhar skye'o/ /zhes khyod nyid kyis
452b4(mdo sde): bshad pa dang / da yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod
452b5(mdo sde): dang skye bo kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyi/ don dam par na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshad pa gang la la de'i mtshan thos na
452b6(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas dran par byas te/ 'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan lan gsum du/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH saM g+hA ya zhes de
452b7(mdo sde): skad ched du brjod du bcug na/ mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
453a1(mdo sde): thams cad la mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen
453a2(mdo sde): po'i phyogs su rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu/ gang zag de'ang bskal pa grangs med
453a3(mdo sde): pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad
453a4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi/ dngos po gcig gam/ dngos po gnyis sam/ dngos po gsum du bgyi/ ci ste dngos po gcig na
453a5(mdo sde): ni| skyabs gcig tu song bas dngos po gsum lags na ni/ skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum du gyur na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te/ dge
453a6(mdo sde): 'dun yang de bzhin no/ /gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni/ skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa gsum gyi bar chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi mjal
453a7(mdo sde): bar mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol/ bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par
453b1(mdo sde): gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom
453b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /don chen po 'di lta bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni/ shin tu
453b3(mdo sde): legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po 'dri ba'ang sa dang po dang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun
453b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no/ /khyed legs par nyon cig/
453b5(mdo sde): ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ skye bo thams cad ni/ thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis
453b6(mdo sde): gzir te/ lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs te skyabs tshol ba/ mu stegs rnams rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog
453b7(mdo sde): btang ste skyabs tshol na'ang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do/ /me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus med do/ /de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin
454a1(mdo sde): g shegs pas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun du 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag
454a2(mdo sde): pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir bslab pa dang po nyan thos dang / rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do/ /de'i 'og
454a3(mdo sde): tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyad pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos po gcig par yang bshad de/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig gi nang
454a4(mdo sde): na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/ dper na/ 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun po phongs pa rnams
454a5(mdo sde): la 'tsho ba bstangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang / ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /dkon
454a6(mdo sde): mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni/ sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad
454a7(mdo sde): de| byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ni/ ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad pa'o/ /dge
454b1(mdo sde): 'dun zhes bya ba ni/ mchod pa'i gnas so/ /ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te/ mthun pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma
454b2(mdo sde): byas thob pa ni/ yang dag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid grol ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad pa'ang 'dus ma byas
454b3(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu mthun te/ rtsod pa med pa ni/ mthun pa ste/ don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /rigs
454b4(mdo sde): kyi bu| chos ni/ dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa rnams so/ /sdig pa'i chos ni/ spang bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni/ 'phel bar bya'o/ /de'ang sems kyis
454b5(mdo sde): dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun gnyis dngos po'ang mi gcig la/ ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do/ /chos ni/ dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su
454b6(mdo sde): dbyings mthun te/ so sor dbye bar dka'o/ /ji ltar so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na/ gal te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gnyis kyi mtshan bla dwags su btags te rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam
454b7(mdo sde): par grol ba'i phung po lnga thob pa dang / dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go /zhes bya bar don de lta bu'ang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi
455a1(mdo sde): dbang gis mi lus thob pa yin no/ /chos dang bral na mi med la/ mi las gud na'ang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ga la yod/ deng 'dir gleng ba ni/ mi dang chos su
455a2(mdo sde): gcig tu mthun la tha dad pa'ang yod de/ chos kyi dbang gis mir grub/ mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
455a3(mdo sde): dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa'ang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /nyan
455a4(mdo sde): thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni/ dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gtan tshigs su
455a5(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni/ chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /ye ni/ dbyings gcig ste/ don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun tha dad pa'ang yod de/
455a6(mdo sde): de'ang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o/ /de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na/ khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur
455a7(mdo sde): ro| |spyod pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad de/ de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o/ /
455b1(mdo sde): sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o/ /chos ni/ mi rtag go /dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/ sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na/ deng 'dir bshad pa
455b2(mdo sde): ni| rtag tu gnas pa ni/ rnal 'byor spyod pa ba rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing / phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba/ skye 'gag med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni/
455b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni/ yang dag pa'i chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /spyod pa pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos
455b4(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni/ dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /yang phyin ci log brgyad gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo thams cad mthun zhing nam
455b5(mdo sde): du'ang rtsod pa med pa ni/ dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /sngon dkon mchog gsum mi dang chos su tha dad par bshad/ deng 'dir sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang
455b6(mdo sde): der byung bas don de'i phyir nas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad de/ skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
455b7(mdo sde): dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ gang la rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
456a1(mdo sde): kyi bu| khams gsum mi rtag par bsam ste theg pa chen por bsgrub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa la
456a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag la byams pa dang snying rje thog
456a3(mdo sde): mar 'gro bar bya ste/ skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na'ang lan mi re ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can yongs su mi gtong ste theg pa chen po bsgrub
456a4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper na/ grong khyer chen po gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la/ sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror na/ lam na g.yang sa dang / mun nag pa dang / shin tu
456a5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes bu mi gcig la bu gcig pa zhig yod pa shin tu'ang sdug mod kyi/ grong khyer de na bde skyid
456a6(mdo sde): pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do/ /zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyi lam 'jigs sa rgal nas grong khyer de'i sgor
456a7(mdo sde): phyin pa dang / rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste/ rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsam mo/ /bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma
456b1(mdo sde): khrid| da su zhig slad na gso zhig gu zhes bsam nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du chas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje'ang de dang 'dra ste byams
456b2(mdo sde): shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgoms te zag pa zad na yang mi shes grub pa mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag
456b3(mdo sde): pa zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa spong ste/ so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o/ /dper sgo
456b4(mdo sde): mang po zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o/ /dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o/ /dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes
456b5(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni/ ye shes la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni/ byang chub
456b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o/ /dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la bya'o/ /dper bu la dran pa ni/ snying rje chen po la bya'o/ /dper bu'i
456b7(mdo sde): thad du ldog pa ni/ sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o/ /dper lan dang grub pa mi len pa ni/ thabs mkhas pa la bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems
457a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos bsdus te mi gtong ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di lta ste/ byang
457a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dpog par bya'o/ /bcu po gang zhe na/ srog mi
457a3(mdo sde): gcod pa dang / ma byin par mi len pa dang / 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa dang / brdzun du mi smra ba dang / phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang / ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang / don med
457a4(mdo sde): pa'i gtam tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / brnab sems mi byed pa dang / gnod sems mi byed pa dang / log par mi lta ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang / snying
457a5(mdo sde): rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na/ byams pas ni/ dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/ snying rjes ni/ sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / dmyal ba las sgrol bar byed do/ /skye bo
457a6(mdo sde): rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar sgrub 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can
457a7(mdo sde): thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon par ston te/ theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
457b1(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang /
457b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos mi skye ba ni/ gang / mi 'gag pa ni/ gang / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdig pa'i chos ni/
457b3(mdo sde): mi skye bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni/ mi 'gag par bya'o/ /de lta bu spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khams
457b4(mdo sde): gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi tshig dang / yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par
457b5(mdo sde): bshad mod kyi/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ni/ dus gsum du mi gnas la/ mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos/ chos bcu po gang
457b6(mdo sde): zhe na| bstod pa dang smad pa la sems skye bri med pa dang / snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang / shes rab can dang gti mug can la 'dra bar snying rje bskyed
457b7(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste snyoms par lta ba dang / mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyags mi 'dogs pa
458a1(mdo sde): dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na'ang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgra thos na'ang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa'i sems mi skyed pa
458a2(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang / bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du
458a3(mdo sde): shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/ chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu
458a4(mdo sde): dam pa khams gsum na bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste/ de bas na/ bsam gyis khyab dka' zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig
458a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam dag na/ /bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/ /tshul khrims dam du srung ba ni/ /skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam/ /byams pa spyad pas dam pa mchog /gang zhig 'jig rten sa 'di
458a6(mdo sde): ru| |lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de/ /ngan song gsum du ltung nges dag /byams sems de yis 'phral du 'byang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis/ 'jig rten ngan par
458a7(mdo sde): skyes na yang / /'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig /ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang / /mgo son ba tsam gyis 'byang / /gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa spang
458b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang / /dam chos srung bas shes rab 'phel/ /rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum/ /tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas/ /deng nas sang gi bar dag tu//
458b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di na gnas kyang sla/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas ni mi 'khrugs 'jig rten dang / /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis/ /shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na/ /sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med/ /khams
458b3(mdo sde): der bsod nams bya ba ni/ /dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad de/ /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /rang gis mi bzod bzod bya ste/ /pha rol po yang bzod bcug na/ /de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog /de
458b4(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par/ /sems can thams cad 'dren bya ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na/ /
458b5(mdo sde): bla med byang chub myur du thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams
458b6(mdo sde): kyis deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang /
458b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba /rnams bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs spyad pa la
459a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa dri ba legs kyi/ 'dod pa bzhin dris shig /ngas khyod la bye brag
459a2(mdo sde): phyed par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems
459a3(mdo sde): dpas ci bgyis na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems la gdung ba ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/
459a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul mi g.yo bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems
459a5(mdo sde): dpas ci bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ byang chub
459a6(mdo sde): sems dpas ci bgyis na/ thabs shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sems can gyi ston pa bgyid par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/
459a7(mdo sde): tshe tshe rabs rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sems spyod pa rnams gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis
459b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ chos rin po ches legs par sgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshul khrims dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na
459b2(mdo sde): mtho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par
459b3(mdo sde): 'gyur| byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar
459b4(mdo sde): 'gyur| byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ gzhan gyis bstangs pa la rag mi lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/
459b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
459b6(mdo sde): dpas ci bgyis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang / khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid bar mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bgyis pa dang /
459b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu nus pa'ang
460a1(mdo sde): shin tu legs so legs so/ /khyod legs par nyon la dran pa mngon du zhog cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bka' bzhin du thos par smon te mnyan
460a2(mdo sde): cing mnos par 'tshal lo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
460a3(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems mi gdung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la snying rje cher bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus
460a4(mdo sde): bskyed cing le lo mi byed pa dang / skye shi'i 'khor ba rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems
460a5(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi sems gdung ba med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nges pa'i tshig la bar ma
460a6(mdo sde): dor 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag med par mngon par chung ces brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cog la dad pa'i 'du shes
460a7(mdo sde): bskyed pa mi rigs zhes brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis las dge sdig gi 'bras bu mi brlag ces brjod
460b1(mdo sde): pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims srung ba dang / mang du thos pa dang / sbyin pa
460b2(mdo sde): byin pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jigs pa med cing tshul las mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khe stor ba dang mi snyan
460b3(mdo sde): par grags pa dang / smad cing dma' dbab pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis non kyang mi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos dkar po yongs su 'grub
460b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po las dge sdig yid ches par ston pa dang / sbyin pa la lan mi re ba dang / dam pa'i chos srung zhing skyong ba dang / shes rab chen pos byang chub
460b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par shes par 'gyur ro/ /
460b6(mdo sde): chos bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun du bskyed pa dang / nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang / thabs la shin tu mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang chub tu bsngo ba dang
460b7(mdo sde): bzhi'o| |byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bsod nams
461a1(mdo sde): dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems skyed pa dang / sdig yod na 'gyod tshangs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
461a2(mdo sde): gsol ba 'debs pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang bde
461a3(mdo sde): ba sgrub par byed pa dang / rang gi dga' ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / mnyan des byas te bzod pa sgom pa dang / le lo spong ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
461a4(mdo sde): tshe tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi zos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu dran par byed pa dang / bsod nams byas so cog
461a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su sgrog par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
461a6(mdo sde): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems spyod pa rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su mi spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
461a7(mdo sde): spang ba dang / chos sgrub bas skyo mi ngas pa dang / chos ci thos pa gzhan la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos rin po che legs par
461b1(mdo sde): sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa chen po'i chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel ba'i phyir sman
461b2(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang mi brlag pa'i phyir nor gyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir sdug
461b3(mdo sde): bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi
461b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams rgyu dang
461b5(mdo sde): rkyen las skye ba shes pa'i phyir chos la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / tha dad pa'i sems rgyud med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub
461b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon par bzhag pa dang / dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdam pa
461b7(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang / dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'dzin spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshogs mang po
462a1(mdo sde): kun dang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag chos sgrub na'ang khyad par thob par mi sgrub pa dang / le lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems
462a2(mdo sde): skyed pa dang / chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig tshol gyi bdag mi spyom pa dang / gzhan la dge ba'i chos bstan kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi tshol ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub
462a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / rang gi shes
462a4(mdo sde): rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la ston par byed pa dang / rtag tu ya rabs kyi chos spyod pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems
462a5(mdo sde): dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sngon gyi dbang gyi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang mi bza' ba dang / zhe sdang can la
462a6(mdo sde): rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang / rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du bshad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub la rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
462a7(mdo sde): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la
462b1(mdo sde): byin pa dang / gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba mi brjod pa dang / chos kyis bsdus te sems can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang / chos zab mo chub par shes pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
462b2(mdo sde): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su mngon du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems mnyen des su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
462b3(mdo sde): mthu rnyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang / shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du sgom nus pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi
462b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na| sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs med par myong na'ang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad med
462b5(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / byams sems tshad med par bsgom par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos pa skyed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
462b6(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir smon lam mi gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa
462b7(mdo sde): dang / brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos rgyun du spyod pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod
463a1(mdo sde): cing spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po'i rnam grangs spyad de/ sems can la phan pa dang bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun
463a2(mdo sde): mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khris ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni/ chos la
463a3(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni/ chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do/ /de'i tshe
463a4(mdo sde): de'i dus na'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod mdo sde 'di legs par
463a5(mdo sde): zungs shig / chongs shig /ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji
463a6(mdo sde): ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ni/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa/ mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas
463a7(mdo sde): par gzhig pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ log par lta ba dang / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba/ khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dral ba/ 'khor ba las thar cing
463b1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su sgrol ba/ sa bon dam pa'i rgyu bskams pa la rlan par byed pa/ rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can theg pa gsum
463b2(mdo sde): gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
463b3(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang / 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / tshogs
463b4(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / don rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
463b5(mdo sde): chos de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni/ thos ma myong ste/ deng
463b6(mdo sde): thos pa 'di dag rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag la/ chos dang dge 'dun ni/ 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ khams gsum gyi sems can rang skye
463b7(mdo sde): zhing rang 'gag par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro/ zhes brjod do/ /bdag cag de bzhin
464a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bsnyegs te mya ngan las 'da'o/ /zhes bla dwags su brjod pa legs so/ /
464a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sku
464a3(mdo sde): thob par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o/ /gzung zhing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar
464a4(mdo sde): bshad pa bzhin bsgoms te dus gcig tu sangs rgyas 'grub par bgyi'o/ /mi gtong bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan
464a5(mdo sde): 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha ton du bgyid dam/ glegs bam du yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir
464a6(mdo sde): 'jug na/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu
464a7(mdo sde): rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcur nor
464b1(mdo sde): bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig
464b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas/ theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang na yi ge 'bru gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig gam/
464b3(mdo sde): sh+lau ka gcig 'bri'am/ 'brir 'jug na/ de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas
464b4(mdo sde): kyang sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i sh+lau ka gcig klog gam kha ton byas na/ bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/ /stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi
464b5(mdo sde): skyabs byin pa bas kyang gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te gzhan la tshig gcig gam/ sh+lau ka gcig gi don bstan na/ bsod nams de bas kyang
464b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med par che'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod pa skyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro/ /theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin
464b7(mdo sde): pa ni| sems can rnams kyi byang chub rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni/ sngon sdig can ma
465a1(mdo sde): rungs pa yin na'ang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon sdug bsngal can yin na'ang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon 'ching ba can yin na'ang da grol thar pa dang ldan
465a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /sngon ma rgal ba yin na'ang da rgal ba can yin no/ /sngon blun pa zhig yin na'ang da ni/ slob dpon du chud pa'o/ /sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na'ang da ni/ zag pa
465a3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ /sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na'ang da ni/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na'ang da ni/ 'phags pa'i lam la chud
465a4(mdo sde): pa'o| |lus skye bo'i lus can yin na'ang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni/ 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra'o/ /sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na'ang da mdo sde 'di klog pa
465a5(mdo sde): dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces
465a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/ sngon so so'i skye bo lags kyang da ni/ 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang / sngon nyon mongs
465a7(mdo sde): pa can lags na'ang da ni/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/ /zhes byung na/ tshul khrims zhig pa dang /
465b1(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis par spyad pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa'ang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa zhig lags sam/
465b2(mdo sde): don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /
465b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kyang legs par zhugs pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang /
465b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba btab pa yong
465b5(mdo sde): med do/ /de ji ltar zhe na/ dper na/ dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig bu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phang shing sdug na/ pha yod pa'i tshe na ni/ nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so
465b6(mdo sde): cog la 'gal ba med/ bu'ang pha la sri zhu che ste pa'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo / /re zhig dus gcig na pha lam ring por mgron du song ba las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i
465b7(mdo sde): bar du bu de pha'i bston ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du byung ngo / /pha ring du lon te sar ma 'khor ba'i phyir ba shi ba skad du brjod de dud mo dag byed cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do/ /mya ngan
466a1(mdo sde): gyis non te sems stor nas pha'i bstan pa'ang brjed de chos la skur ba dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do/ /pha de yun ring mo zhig lon nas dus gcig
466a2(mdo sde): na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu'ang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pha'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzung su bzung nas nyes pa'ang ma byung ngo / /pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi
466a3(mdo sde): bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar spyad pas skur ba can zhes kyang mi bya ste/ rigs kyi bu/ dra ma zhes bya ba ni/ de
466a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bu gcig bu zhes pa ni/ sems can thams cad do/ /phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims so/ /lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin
466a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o/ /pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni/ tshe 'das so/ /zhes brjod pa'o/ /mya ngan gyis non pa ni/ sgrib pas
466a6(mdo sde): bsgribs pa'o/ /gzungs su mi 'dzin pa ni/ tshul khrims zhig pa'o/ /shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o/ /don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur ba btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
466a7(mdo sde): khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te sems can gyis mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang
466b1(mdo sde): bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o/ /mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa ni/ ltung ba med pa'o/ /bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni/ chos la mi skur ba
466b2(mdo sde): yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni/ 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
466b3(mdo sde): mtshan thos pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
466b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa spyod pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di'i don shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
466b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs par
466b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ bskal pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu rtsi ba/ zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig
466b7(mdo sde): 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do/ /yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni/ shin tu dkon
467a1(mdo sde): no| |gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o/ /de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang /
467a2(mdo sde): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'brir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la yang bstan na/ log par lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
467a3(mdo sde): zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yong su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa'ang 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
467a4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na/ so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar
467a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas yon mi 'ju mi srid de/ sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na'ang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin
467a6(mdo sde): la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
467a7(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mdo sde kha cig las byung ba lta ba log pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams
467b1(mdo sde): gcig tu lhan cig gnas su'ang mi rung ba dang / chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du'ang mi rung ngo / /zhes byung la/ gso sbyong gi tshe gang dag de 'phag pa'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge
467b2(mdo sde): 'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na/ ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs/ gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na
467b3(mdo sde): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad la/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/
467b4(mdo sde): bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par grol bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka'
467b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang / snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsam ste don
467b6(mdo sde): de zhu ba ni/ rab tu'ang legs te/ ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyi/ legs par soms la nyon cig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
467b7(mdo sde): kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la/ bdud dang / mu stegs dang / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par zad
468a1(mdo sde): do| |rigs kyi bu/ ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa/ sems can bzang ngan rnam par me rtog par sbyin pa byas na/ bsod
468a2(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub bo/ /zhes bshad de/ byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni/ bsod nams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /log spyod la spyod pa byin pas ni/
468a3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni/ 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyun du 'gro'o/ /drin mi gzo ba dang / khre
468a4(mdo sde): med pa ni/ 'chi 'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o/ /log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'ang bsod nams can gyi yon 'ju na/ mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i gang zag
468a5(mdo sde): lta zhig ci smos/ de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / mtshams
468a6(mdo sde): med par 'gro ba dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba dang / log par lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na/ mchod yon yang 'ju bar nus so/ /
468a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thar pa chen po phyogs su
468b1(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i mthu dang phyin yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
468b2(mdo sde): de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol ba/ dang de nas bcom ldan
468b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bya ba
468b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyad pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i
468b5(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la
468b6(mdo sde): mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba
468b7(mdo sde): phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na nga
469a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te bsnyan bkur byas na'ang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang
469a2(mdo sde): bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa
469a3(mdo sde): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
469a4(mdo sde): 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas nas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming thos te nyon mongs pa
469a5(mdo sde): yongs su spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'di da dung ma mthong ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsags te mchod pa phul na'ang de
469a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nga sngon bskal pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang / bsnyen
469a7(mdo sde): bkur dang bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang / tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshang par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bslab
469b1(mdo sde): pa dang / nga rgyal dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa
469b2(mdo sde): dang | thos so cog thams cad mi brjod pa dang / 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba chos nyan pa dang /
469b3(mdo sde): klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang / nyams pa mang
469b4(mdo sde): du byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na byang
469b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas par bsgoms par
469b6(mdo sde): byas na| lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na'ang rdzogs par mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu/ nga bskal
469b7(mdo sde): p a de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa der
470a1(mdo sde): mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang / mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / don bsam pa la sogs
470a2(mdo sde): byas nas de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
470a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bar lung bstan to/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te 'chang ba dang / klog pa la
470a4(mdo sde): sogs pa byas na sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang myur du thob par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu/ de'i phyir ngas
470a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu
470a6(mdo sde): sbyin par byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu pa rjes chu/ /theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhun/ /theg pa chung ngu grog ma'i
470a7(mdo sde): mkhar| |theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu me stag tsam/ /theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o/ /dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ /sems can thams
470b1(mdo sde): cad go 'byed do/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa 'di las 'da' ba med/ /theg pa chen po 'di nang nas/ /theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / /dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni/ /
470b2(mdo sde): thams cad bsgral bar mi nus so/ /theg pa bla na med pa 'di/ /sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la/ /gang gis dpag med 'di spyad pa/ /nam mkha' dpag
470b3(mdo sde): tu med pa bzhin/ /gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yong med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te/ /thogs pa med cing dpag tu med/ /sems can thams cad de dag kun/ /theg pa chen po 'di zhon la/ /
470b4(mdo sde): theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na/ /gtos rgya che zhing mang du shong / /gal te theg chen yon tan dang / /theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni/ /bskal pa dpag med rab bshad kyang / /mtha' ru rdzogs par
470b5(mdo sde): yong mi nus/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa chen po dam pa'i mchog /sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na/ /byang chub shing drung mngon par 'gro /'ching ba med cing thogs med pa/ /
470b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di/ /theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas/ /byang chub dkyil du 'jug par 'ong / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse phyir/ /
470b7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la/ /theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya/ /gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni/ /'phel ba'am 'grib pa yong med de/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas/ /
471a1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab/ /de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni/ /ye shes chen po
471a2(mdo sde): thob par bya/ /lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud/ /mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na/ /theg pa chen po'i skyabs song la/ /mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos/ /rig pa gsum dang rnam
471a3(mdo sde): thar gsum/ /des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms/ /log par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na/ /theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang / /dge rtsa phun sum
471a4(mdo sde): tshogs 'gyur bas/ /theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'/ /'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad/ /slob dang mi
471a5(mdo sde): slob de dag kun/ /theg pa chen por kun 'dus so/ /sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni/ /log par lta ba dang ni sdig grogs bsten/ /gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa/ /
471a6(mdo sde): des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus/ /de rnams spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba/ /grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob/ /skyes bu gang zhig don 'di shes 'dod pa/ /
471a7(mdo sde): theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye/ /de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon/ /zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan/ /de yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan/ /gang zhig
471b1(mdo sde): theg pa chen por spyod nus pa/ /de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi chad/ /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni/ /de ni bsod nams dpal med thob pa'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig
471b2(mdo sde): rten khams su phyin pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag med mchod pa dang / /de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo/ /mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med/ /dpal dang gzi
471b3(mdo sde): brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms/ /de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'/ /byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub/ /
471b4(mdo sde): gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni/ /bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin/ /lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na/ /de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims brtson
471b5(mdo sde): 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang nus/ /de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so/ /rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa/ /des ni theg pa chen po thob
471b6(mdo sde): pa'o| |sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang / /theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang / /gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa/ /de ni tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin//
471b7(mdo sde): yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed/ /dam chos yang dag don la brten pa yang / /theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'jigs dang ni
472a1(mdo sde): stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang / /rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang / /theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis
472a2(mdo sde): so| |rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste 'bru gcig gam/ tshig gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig 'chang ngam klog na/ bsod nams 'di lta
472a3(mdo sde): bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ /sdug bsngal kun dang yong bral lo/ /nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste/ /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par
472a4(mdo sde): 'gyur| |gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs dus ngan tshe/ /mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang / /ngas ni lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol pa/ /rgyal
472a5(mdo sde): ba'ang rtag tu de la gzhol/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na/ /rgyal ba'ang de la srung bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus/ /'khor ba'i
472a6(mdo sde): rgyud las bsgral ba dang / /bdud kyi dbung bcas 'jil yang nus/ /rgyal ba 'od mi 'gyur de las/ /ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa/ /shAkya thub ces
472a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'grub/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ /ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /
472b1(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di yi don shes te/ /blun po rnams la rab bshad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mi bzhugs kyang / /mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar/ /
472b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di ma nos te 'chang ba
472b3(mdo sde): dang | bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di
472b4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad/ deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan
472b5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan
472b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/ gal te ngas rgya cher bshad
472b7(mdo sde): du bskal pa'i bar du'ang bshad pas mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do/ /de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrungs pa dang /
473a1(mdo sde): yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la bsu skyel dang / chos nyan pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod

473a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng+ge'i ro stong lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phrag so shin
