478a6(mdo sde): mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni/ yang dag pa'i 'bras bu mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na/
478a7(mdo sde): sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o/ /sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni/ sems can mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum
478b1(mdo sde): tshogs par mdzad pas na/ sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o/ /sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni/ chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod
478b2(mdo sde): yul de la yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te yang dag par rdzogs pas na/ sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o/ /sku sprul cing 'byung pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ de bzhin
478b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na/ sku sprul
478b4(mdo sde): cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni/ nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so/ /nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas
478b5(mdo sde): na chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'ang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra bas sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du sku rnam pa
478b6(mdo sde): lngar ston pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no/ /chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du
478b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba legs so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
479a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pas spyod yul thams cad la rab tu chod pa'am thogs pa med
479a2(mdo sde): de| rigs kyi bu/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag
479a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na/ ngan song lta ci zhig smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang / 'jig rten der de
479a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa chen po
479a5(mdo sde): thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang / bcangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te phyag
479a6(mdo sde): 'chal zhing mchod pa byas na/ 'jig rten longs spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang la las theg pa chen po chos sgrub na'ang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
479a7(mdo sde): 'gyur| gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa de ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
479b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu
479b2(mdo sde): gnyis kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog ste/ seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni/ nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o/ /nges pa'i tshig bstan
479b3(mdo sde): pa ni| de bzhin gshegs pa brtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o/ /yang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i
479b4(mdo sde): bdud mu stegs la sogs pa spa bkong ste skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ seng+ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/ /de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams kun khebs
479b5(mdo sde): par g.yogs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs
479b6(mdo sde): dma'| lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mnon dbus dma' ba ni/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o/ /ljags kyi
479b7(mdo sde): drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so/ /snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni/ rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni/ dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni/ bde bar byas/ ma rig
480a1(mdo sde): pa ni| rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang / nags tshal dang / yul sa dang / chu bo'i klung dang / rgya mtsho dang / lcags kyi ri
480a2(mdo sde): khor yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par gyur cing nyal nyil dang / ljan ljin med de/ kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dper
480a3(mdo sde): na| shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa'i me tog gi char
480a4(mdo sde): bab pa dang 'dra'o/ /sa 'og nas byung ba ni/ sprin dang / na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste nam mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do/ /sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig
480a5(mdo sde): mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do/ /zhes gsungs/ yang chos thams
480a6(mdo sde): cad ni/ stong pa nyid do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /spyod la ma de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni/ theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi
480a7(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/ de'i tshe tshigs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi
480b1(mdo sde): rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma
480b2(mdo sde): snyed kyis ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni/ theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig ni/ dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo/ /dge slong
480b3(mdo sde): ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni/ rgyun du zhugs
480b4(mdo sde): pa'i lam thob bo/ /lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni/ chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par
480b5(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i sgra stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos
480b6(mdo sde): gtugs te phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gong du bstan pa bzhin na ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang / chos kyi mtshan thos
480b7(mdo sde): na'ang sdig 'byang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na'ang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/
481a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni/ sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni/ chos la gsol ba bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni/ dge 'dun la
481a2(mdo sde): gsol ba bgyi lags na gsum char la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/ gong na gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo / /zhes byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid
481a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta ci zhig smos zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
481a4(mdo sde): to| |legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu legs par nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /
481a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthus sangs rgyas ni/ sems
481a6(mdo sde): can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/ /sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mar
481a7(mdo sde): pos khams gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na/ phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do/ /de bas na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyang
481b1(mdo sde): chos so| |chos kyang dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun ni/ 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas pa ni/ stong pa nyid de/ 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa
481b2(mdo sde): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan med do/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod zer ba lta na/ rnam pa gcig tu sgrub pa'i rigs
481b3(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa gsum du sgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi gcig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin rgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo/ /rigs kyi bu
481b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub
481b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng+ge sgras gsol pa/ legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'phags pas bstan pa ltar na bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so/ /
481b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ yum/ byang chub sems
481b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi ni/ shul chen po/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni/ mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na ma
482a1(mdo sde): mchis pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste/ theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing
482a2(mdo sde): bskyab par bgyi'o/ /sdom pa ma nyams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la'ang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gal te gang zag gang la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen
482a3(mdo sde): bkur bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing 'tshe ba'i glags lta ba mchis na/ bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /
482a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba'ang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
482a5(mdo sde): stsal pa| rigs kyi bu/ khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /ston pa la'ang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge
482a6(mdo sde): sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH sang+gA ya/ a dan+ti d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ A kA sha ni ba ni/ sarba d+harmA ni ba ni/ i
482a7(mdo sde): sha ma da/ pi ba sha na/ bi ma la su pa ri/ d+harma ni kha na/ bar du ni tsa ya ta ma le/ tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi bi te/ man+t+ra man+t+ra/ man+t+ra swAhA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing
482b1(mdo sde): mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtsog gyi
482b2(mdo sde): tu bgyi ste sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so/ /
482b3(mdo sde): gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di la smod pa ni/ tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub tu bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur lte/
482b4(mdo sde): srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni/ sems dran pa nyams pa rnams slar rnyed pa dang / gzungs 'di lan gcig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger 'bris
482b5(mdo sde): te sha dang chang mi 'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtsed 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par
482b6(mdo sde): 'dzin na/ gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas glang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re
482b7(mdo sde): zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi bskyang bar bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang /
483a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge sgra la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang /

483a3(mdo sde): lta ba rnams bzlog ste yang dag par lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni/ shin tu yang legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can thams cad khyod kyi ming dang sngags kyi

483a6(mdo sde): bsgrubs te/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang / /rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi
483a7(mdo sde): bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang la las nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo
483b1(mdo sde): sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsam na/ gang zag de ni/

483b6(mdo sde): tu skad cig ma der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag btsal nas tshig mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag bskal pa grangs
483b7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig grangs ma
484a1(mdo sde): m chis par bgyis pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol te 'gyod tshangs
484a2(mdo sde): su gsol zhing mchis na skabs dbye zhing ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed

484a4(mdo sde): nyid mthong du nye bas yid la dran pa bzhin du mthol zhing shogs shig / de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams
484a5(mdo sde): p a'i gsung thos nas gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag btsal nas bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la
484a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs
484a7(mdo sde): su mchi'o/ /yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug pa mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal
484b1(mdo sde): zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su

484b4(mdo sde): phyogs na kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bla ma phyogs na nam mkha'i snying
484b5(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa

484b7(mdo sde): la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /skyes bu chen po dri ma med
485a1(mdo sde): par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srung la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs
485a2(mdo sde): su gsol lo/ /'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la'ang phyag
485a3(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sde snod chen po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su
485a4(mdo sde): gsol lo/ /cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung dang ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da lta na sku gzugs bzhugs pa thams cad
485a5(mdo sde): la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang / bar snang la gnas
485a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / shing drung gi lha dang / drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan
485a7(mdo sde): mnga' ba thams cad kyis snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig / kun dbang du gsol te sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams
485b1(mdo sde): cad byang bar gyur cig / yang de skad ces smras pa dang / bdag cag thog ma mchis pa nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du nor cing 'khrul ba'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba
485b2(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis pa nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal rang gis ma tshor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te tshe
485b3(mdo sde): phyi ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing las ngan pas bar du chod nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang
485b4(mdo sde): bsten cing dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag rang nyams kyi dbang gis
485b5(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis
485b6(mdo sde): par bshad pa'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/ chos ma lags pa ni/ chos
485b7(mdo sde): lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa
486a1(mdo sde): dang shes rab la ni/ ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag
486a2(mdo sde): tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' bdag ste phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/
486a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas la 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags
486a4(mdo sde): par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slad chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad
486a5(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / ngag rtsub mo gtong ba
486a6(mdo sde): dang / dam pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing mthol ma myong ste/ sems la nongs pa'am/ ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma
486a7(mdo sde): mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems
486b1(mdo sde): thog ma nas ma mchis par dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs nas mthol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos mun du btsugs te rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smos shing
486b2(mdo sde): brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do/ /zhes brjod pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma
486b3(mdo sde): mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnod zhing khrel ba dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs
486b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi
486b5(mdo sde): sdig bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par
486b6(mdo sde): smon| yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu lta lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni/ sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni/ rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig
486b7(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/ ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni/ zhig par bshad/ lci ba rnams ni/ yang par bshad/ yang ba rnams ni/ lci bar bshad/ dag pa rnams ni/ ma dag par bshad/ ma
487a1(mdo sde): dag pa rnams ni/ dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas chos dang mdo sde la ni/ ma gus te smre
487a2(mdo sde): ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ bdud kyi tshig go /zhes bgyis
487a3(mdo sde): pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar
487a4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das te med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go / zhes bgyis nas lus dang / sems 'khrul cing phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs
487a5(mdo sde): shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa dang
487a6(mdo sde): thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma
487a7(mdo sde): mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang
487b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug gi bar du dge 'dun spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ da ltar
487b2(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa'am/ rang nyam du spyod pa dang / yang rang
487b3(mdo sde): smos te bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo/ /zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te khyim nas khyim
487b4(mdo sde): med par rab tu byung na yang pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba
487b5(mdo sde): dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po dang / bdun shin tu lci ba'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas pham pa la thug gi bar du nyes pa
487b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / mdo sde zab mo la skur ba dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas nongs pa bcabs te 'gyod cing mthol ma myong bas nyin
487b7(mdo sde): mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni/ dam pa'i chos la skur ba'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma
488a1(mdo sde): bshags ma mthol na/ sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang
488a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so/ /zhes byung bas na/ de'i slad du
488a3(mdo sde): deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnod zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / /ma 'ongs
488a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byams pa dang thugs rje
488a5(mdo sde): mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun
488a6(mdo sde): chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bam pa bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams
488a7(mdo sde): mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ deng bdag cag gis sems can rnams dang / bdag cag rang rang gi slad
488b1(mdo sde): du phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar da mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha
488b2(mdo sde): ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs snyems te dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
488b3(mdo sde): las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bar skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing nyon mongs pa'i sems 'khrugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i
488b4(mdo sde): yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus te 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems
488b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs te/ spros pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang
488b6(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa'ang rjed so sor 'chags
488b7(mdo sde): so| |mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas la'ang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /ma rig pa'i dbang
489a1(mdo sde): gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag
489a2(mdo sde): kyang deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor
489a3(mdo sde): 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni/ ma lus pa'i sems can
489a4(mdo sde): de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
489a5(mdo sde): kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa
489a6(mdo sde): dang skrag pa skyes nas nyes pa rnams mngon par mthol ba'i steng du sems can gyi sdig pa mang po'ang khyod kyis mthol zhing 'chags pa'i phyir khyod ni/ skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa
489a7(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i steng du sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ring du dbral bar byas pas de'i phyir khyod ni/ skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin
489b1(mdo sde): te| rang gi don du smon pa ma yin te/ thog mar sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir
489b2(mdo sde): khyod ni| skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
489b3(mdo sde): su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do/ /bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo khyod/ /khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen/ /thams cad mi mnyam pa nyid/ /bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshal
489b4(mdo sde): lo| |skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir/ /nor rdzas byin cing lan yang re/ /byams chen rgyal ba de min te/ /dgra gnyen byams dang phan snyoms mdzad/ /rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun/ /shes rab spyan
489b5(mdo sde): gyis mkhyen gzigs la/ /brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi/ /lhag gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar bzhugs/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin rgyal
489b6(mdo sde): ba skyabs gsol ba'ang / /dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig
489b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa'ang / /mang du thos la 'brang bar byos/ /slob dpon dge la bkur byas na/ /sangs rgyas 'grub la yun mi ring / /gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyad/ /de ni dge slong
490a1(mdo sde): yang dag yin/ /gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa/ /de ni ting 'dzin thob ces bya/ /gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa/ /de ni byang chub spyod pa 'o/ /gang zhig mya ngan
490a2(mdo sde): 'da' 'gyur ba/ /de ni dga' ba yang dag pa 'o/ /tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / /rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma/ /zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos/ /chos gos rnam pa lus gyon
490a3(mdo sde): te| |lhung bzed gseg gshang thogs nas su/ /rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/ /lha rnams kun kyang dga' 'gyur bas/ /thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal/ /ngas kyang lha dang mi
490a4(mdo sde): rnams kun/ /de yi bya ba byed du gzhug /dper na lha bran thams cad kyis/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/ /rim gro gus par byed pa bzhin/ /da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste/ /phyi ma'i dus
490a5(mdo sde): su'ang dpag tu med/ /rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga dang sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten pa yi mi kun
490a6(mdo sde): kyang / /rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa ni/ /
490a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing / /theg pa gcig lam mngon par shes/ /'das
490b1(mdo sde): pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa/ /phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu la/ /gnyis sam gsum zhes bya med par/ /de ltar yid la bskyed nas su/ /sems kyis rnam par mi
490b2(mdo sde): rtog na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /rgyal ba'i drin lam lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin/ /rtag tu dad pa'i sems
490b3(mdo sde): bskyed de/ /sangs rgyas kun la sangs rgyas kyi/ /bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing / /lha yi 'bras
490b4(mdo sde): bu mi re ste/ /gcig cer bla med lam bsgrubs na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyin/ /gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/ /yud
490b5(mdo sde): tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing / /mkhan la srid zhu mchod byas na/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /gang zhig nor rdzas sna
490b6(mdo sde): 'ga' 'am/ /kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams/ /kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na/ /gang zhig 'ga' la
490b7(mdo sde): blo brtan nas/ /yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/ /mchod pa phul bas de lhag go /theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum/ /
491a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ /snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge
491a2(mdo sde): mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan blan 'dod pas/ /skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pa/ /stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi/ /srog gi sbyin pa
491a3(mdo sde): byin pa bas/ /bsam gtan sgom pa yon tan che/ /gang zhig sgom la skur ba dang / /dge 'dun 'khrug par byed pa ni/ /stong khams gsum po gang ba yi/ /mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang / /
491a4(mdo sde): srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/ /de sdig yang ni de bzhin no/ /gang zhig dge sbyong mthong ba la/ /skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas/ /de ni
491a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bo nas blangs te tshigs su
491a6(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la/ /gang mang lags shing gang mi mang / /mang dang mi mang gnyi ga yang / /dngos po dmigs su yod ma mchis/ /yang
491a7(mdo sde): dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /chos rnams kun dang mi 'gal lo/ /sems can kun la byams slad du/ /thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas/ /de bzhin
491b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang de nas byon/ /yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad/ /de
491b2(mdo sde): yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems/ /sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che/ /rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs/ /
491b3(mdo sde): le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing / /'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ /rab tu sdug
491b4(mdo sde): bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la/ /zhi ba'i tshul yang rab tu mkhyen/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na/ /'gyur ba ma
491b5(mdo sde): mchis bden par nges/ /de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang / /mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi/ /rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas/ /spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan/ /de slad mtshan ni
491b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ /mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi/ /chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing / /dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas/ /thams cad kun la byams slad du/ /dus skabs
491b7(mdo sde): sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad/ /skye rgan 'chi rab bsal cing / /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /'jig rten gang
492a1(mdo sde): nas mchis pa dang / /'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags/ /thugs rje chen pos sems can
492a2(mdo sde): bsgral| |gnyen des dge ba bstan cing btul/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyad/ /thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med/ /de
492a3(mdo sde): yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /bla na med ces bgyi ba lags/ /nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan/ /rnam grol dam pa mchog bshad pas/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /lha dang mi yi
492a4(mdo sde): ston zhes bgyi/ /dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo ba/ /bas sam ma bas chos kun yang / /byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas/ /de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs
492a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams rdzu 'phrul chen po ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sku nam mkha' la 'phags te zhal so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum
492a6(mdo sde): stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni/ nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ bar na'ang mi gnas so/ /sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu'ang nga brtan to/ /rnam par grol ba'i
492a7(mdo sde): phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo/ /shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/ /dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu'ang che'o/ /de bzhin du
492b1(mdo sde): mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni/ nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs
492b2(mdo sde): pas rgyun du nga'ang mthong la/ deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni/ nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin
492b3(mdo sde): chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen
492b4(mdo sde): po mdo sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zham ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge
492b5(mdo sde): mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra
492b6(mdo sde): ba'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu'am/ sangs rgyas brgya'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs rgyas
492b7(mdo sde): khri'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes su bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag
493a1(mdo sde): tu med pa'ang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/ /bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan stong gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur/
493a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba'ang nges te/ the tshom med do/ /de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthol zhing bshags par byas la sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed na/ gdon
493a3(mdo sde): mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis gcig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa 'di skad ces
493a4(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje chen/ /shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje/ /tshogs kyi nang na seng+ge'i sgras/ /khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/ /pha la gzigs pa bcu gcig
493a5(mdo sde): bzhin| |rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis/ /de lta bu yi bla med pa/ /mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong rnams la
493a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas da ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
493a7(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ /khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa
493b1(mdo sde): nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
493b2(mdo sde): drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ba ste/ de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byang bar gyur nas rgyun du zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs
493b3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /dgra bcom par
493b4(mdo sde): 'os pa ni/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /rang sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no/ /byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin
493b5(mdo sde): n o| |da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa'ang phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
493b6(mdo sde): ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i
493b7(mdo sde): mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa'ang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa'ang dus gsum
494a1(mdo sde): gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs
494a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum gyi
494a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin gyi dbyings dang ldan pa'ang
494a4(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'ang
494a5(mdo sde): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las seng+ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting
494a6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byams pa
494a7(mdo sde): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal
494b1(mdo sde): ba'i yon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams
494b2(mdo sde): cad nor cing 'khrul ba'i sems 'khrugs te mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
494b3(mdo sde): dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis
494b4(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyed la dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don
494b5(mdo sde): tam| yi ger bris sam/ kun chub par byas te dben pa'i gnas khang pa gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri chus chag chag btab ste 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog
494b6(mdo sde): spos zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsal ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la/ gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan
494b7(mdo sde): gcig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na khrus lan gcig byas te seng+ge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang /
495a1(mdo sde): sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/ dang po bas bye brag phyed cing gsol ba brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dri spos zhim po
495a2(mdo sde): bsregs la 'khrul sems bsal cing dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu mas ma mo/ /de ltar spyod pa rnams mthun zhing
495a3(mdo sde): 'dum pa ni/ mchog ste/ de la mi mthun zhing rtsod pa ni/ mthol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro/ /khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po dran
495a4(mdo sde): zhing don dam pa bsam la nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo / /nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ton nam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas
495a5(mdo sde): la dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag btsal nas mthol tshangs su byas te mdo sde 'di nyan na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing
495a6(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang / sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang / sems thag
495a7(mdo sde): pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang /
