495b2(mdo sde): rgyas dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa
495b3(mdo sde): dang / sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i
495b4(mdo sde): nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang bar dri chus yang chag chag btab ste lus la'ang spos chus bkru bar bya'o/ /pog spos bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod par byas pa de
495b5(mdo sde): dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul bar gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /
495b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun
495b7(mdo sde): gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes she na/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la rtags su
496a1(mdo sde): byas te| rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byang ngo / /rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo'i rmi lam
496a2(mdo sde): na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i steng du 'gro bar rmis na/ de ni/ nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas
496a3(mdo sde): pa dang / lus la char bab par rmis na/ de ni/ nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/ gral du 'dug par
496a4(mdo sde): rmis na| de ni/ nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nam/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
496a5(mdo sde): dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na/ de ni/ chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to/ /gal te rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras
496a6(mdo sde): bu 'grub par mngon no/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma'am/ byang chub sems
496a7(mdo sde): dpa' dad pa can gang la las dran pa nyams te nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig
496b1(mdo sde): mi 'byang mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ cho ga 'di ltar
496b2(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo / /cho ga 'di spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo/ /de ltar
496b3(mdo sde): mthol tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na/ de ni/ mthol tshangs zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dran par gyis shig /bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas
496b4(mdo sde): de ni| bdag tshul khrims srung ngo / /da ni/ bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do/ /da ni/ bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa dang / kha ton bgyi'o/ /zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis
496b5(mdo sde): shig / bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni/ rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to/ /des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
496b6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du 'greng ste dbang du byed do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'ang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do/ /'phags pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas kyi rten byed
496b7(mdo sde): do| |'jam dpal/ 'di ni/ sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni/ gnas thob pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom
497a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom
497a2(mdo sde): pa brgyad dang / sdom pa phyed can dang / khrims bcu dang / gsum la skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang / 'dul ba re re nas zhig
497a3(mdo sde): pa'am| nyams pa'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma mthol na/
497a4(mdo sde): mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mnar
497a5(mdo sde): med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par
497a6(mdo sde): smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/
497a7(mdo sde): shin tu'ang mkhas so/ /shin tu'ang mkhas so/ /des na 'di lta bu 'dri ba'ang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig /ngas bye brag
497b1(mdo sde): phyed par bshad do/ /ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /gcig tu na dgag
497b2(mdo sde): pa'am| 'or bar bya ba'ang med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tsha ba ni/ rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni/ shin tu'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang mi ngal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs
497b3(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na me chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing mched pa khong du zhugs pa'i phyir mnar med
497b4(mdo sde): pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni/ gru bzhi lham pa dpag tshad brgyad khri
497b5(mdo sde): yod de| lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing steng du'ang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad bco brgyad yod do/ /de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri
497b6(mdo sde): tshal rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ /lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can yod do/ /lcags kyi khang pa bar chad bco brgyad po brtsegs mar
497b7(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /de'i gra bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi bong tshad ni/ 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni/ glog gi 'od bzhin/
498a1(mdo sde): mche ba ni/ ral gri'i sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni/ spu gris gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni/ lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/ sder mo ni/ lcags kyi gsal shing dang
498a2(mdo sde): mtshungs/ mjug ma ni/ lcags kyi sbrul dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni/ 'jig
498a3(mdo sde): rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bskrun du med do/ /dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la de'i sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srung ma bco brgyad 'dug go /mgo ni/ srin po mgo /kha ni/ srin po'i kha dang
498a4(mdo sde): 'dra ste| mgo la rwa bco brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so/ /ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal
498a5(mdo sde): mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni/ chu mig dang 'dra bar 'byung ngo / /lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni/ kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na zangs po che bco
498a6(mdo sde): brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing sgo bzhir bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo/ /khang pa bar chad re re'i nang na'ang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad
498a7(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong yod pas khar bdug pa'i me skyug cing rab kun tu gang bar gtong ngo / /sbrul gyi sgra sgrog pa ni/ 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no/ /lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab
498b1(mdo sde): ba'ang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo / /der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni/ 'bum phrag brgyad khri'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe
498b2(mdo sde): zla med do/ /mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o/ /'bar ba'ang lcags kyi ra ba
498b3(mdo sde): kho ra khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal
498b4(mdo sde): gcig car ldang ba ni/ gong du smos pa bzhin no/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di
498b5(mdo sde): las 'byung ba bzhin mthol tshangs ma byas na/ gnong bskur ba'am/ khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu stobs tshan po che'i dpung pa brkyangs shing bskums pa tsam gyis
498b6(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste tsha ba'i gzir bas phongs nas kha gdangs mig btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so/ /de sdig mang
498b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ral gri'i 'khor lo grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha' nas char bzhin 'bab ste klad par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni/ sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin
499a1(mdo sde): brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o/ /gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi
499a2(mdo sde): bar du'o/ /sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni/ de las 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo / /mtshams med pa lnga'ang 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo / /mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs
499a3(mdo sde): pa'ang 'gyur gcig gis mang ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la mi mos pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshangs par spyad pa la dri ma can du spyod pa dang /
499a4(mdo sde): mkhan po dang slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yem pa rnams gong ma dag las kyang 'gyur gcig gis bskyed do/ /log spyod kyi rnams ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas
499a5(mdo sde): nam yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas mi thar pa ni/ der ma gtogs so/ /de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa
499a6(mdo sde): khong du zhugs te rmugs nas mchi'o/ /de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srung mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te sos sos zhes bos pa dang / bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang
499a7(mdo sde): sos yang sos nas nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni/ 'chi/ lan khri ni/ 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni/ gong du bstan pa bzhin no/ /nam zhig
499b1(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na'ang tshul khrims bshig pa dang / yon bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la
499b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba grang sbrabs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang / dmyal ba spu gri'i so gtams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri'i 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba me'i shing rta
499b3(mdo sde): can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba chu tshan dang / dmyal ba me mur klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor dang /
499b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba lcags kyi sha ma ri ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum
499b5(mdo sde): dang / dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang / dmyal ba zangs khol dang / 'di rnams so sor re re'i nang du'ang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyon mongs nas gzod thar te/ 'on
499b6(mdo sde): kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so/ /brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni/ byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/
499b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni/ slar yang dmyal bar ltung ngo / /nyes byas pa'i sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma bshags na dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba'ang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i
500a1(mdo sde): lha'i lo grangs lta bur lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni/ de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed
500a2(mdo sde): do| |dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'ang de las nyis 'gyur du bskyed do/ /sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe tshig gzhan mi phyin te/ A ba pa/ A ta ta/ A la la/
500a3(mdo sde): A ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go /de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor mthol zhing bshags la dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig /'jam
500a4(mdo sde): dpal| yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsal shing 'byang bar 'dod na/ mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs byos shig /cho ga
500a5(mdo sde): nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za gcig tu byas la yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i tshe mi chen po'i mtshan
500a6(mdo sde): dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang / 'od zer can gyi mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang /
500a7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bor 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o/ /yang gcig tu na byang chub sems
500b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yi dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o/ /yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te slar
500b2(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /shes rab sgron ma las langs te
500b3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te
500b4(mdo sde): seng+ge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / seng+ge nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te seng+ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /seng+ge sprug pa las langs te rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /
500b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho yid las langs te kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /kun tu ye shes las langs te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te kun
500b6(mdo sde): tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chos kyi dbyings nyid las
500b7(mdo sde): langs te seng+ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / seng+ge'i rgyal po las langs te chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chos kyi rgyal po las langs te bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog
501a1(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /stong pa nyid kyi shes rab
501a2(mdo sde): las langs te stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge
501a3(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug / chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus
501a4(mdo sde): gzugs can las langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te byang chub sems dpa'
501a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdo rje'i gtsug tor
501a6(mdo sde): gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /rgya mtsho thams cad las langs te gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge
501a7(mdo sde): 'dzin la 'jug / gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod
501b1(mdo sde): yul rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam
501b2(mdo sde): par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te gdod thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /mtha' med mu med
501b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug / yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la
501b4(mdo sde): 'jug par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de mdo 'di yi ger 'bri ba'am/ klog
501b5(mdo sde): pa'am| kha ton du skad cig mar dran te bsam pa'i 'du shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang / rtogs pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na/ skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
501b6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'tsho skyong
501b7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ yi dwags mthu chen thams cad dang / /dud
502a1(mdo sde): 'gro glang po ma rungs dang / /bud med g.yem dang ma rungs klu/ /dpag tu med pa'i ma rungs rnams/ /ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra /lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i phreng / /las
502a2(mdo sde): dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas/ /dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir/ /thub pa mya ngan 'da' ba'i khar/ /bskal
502a3(mdo sde): pa grangs med phyir bshol lo/ /ma ga d+ha yi skye bo dag /kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /kauN+Di n+ya la sogs
502a4(mdo sde): pa dang / /nyan thos lnga brgya rnam dag gis/ /ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba'ang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang / /
502a5(mdo sde): sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu/ /da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang / /'das pa'i phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /rgyal ba rnams la phyag bya'i yon/ /dam pa'i don la chud pa dang / /phyogs
502a6(mdo sde): bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad/ /tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /
502a7(mdo sde): rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /sngon nga rgyal por byed pa'i tshe/ /drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya/ /de ni sangs rgyas ma byung ste/ /bram ze lnga brgya rnams shig la/ /kha zas dang ni gos rnams
502b1(mdo sde): dang / /khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar/ /lo grangs nyi shu tshang bar du/ /rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul/ /des ni de tshe bsgo ba la/ /khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cing / /bram ze lnga brgya de dag
502b2(mdo sde): gis/ /mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang / /dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas/ /mod bzhin nga la slar smras pa/ /'jig rten nang na byang chub dang / /rnam par grol ba med do zhes/ /de skad smras
502b3(mdo sde): par ngas thos nas/ /mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do/ /bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas/ /dmyal ba mnar med ltung bar gyur/ /sems can dmyal bar lhung nas
502b4(mdo sde): su| |dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang / /dus gsum rgyal la phyag byas so/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang / /byang chub dge 'dun dad bskyed de/ /dran pa rnam gsum byas nas su/ /med la dmyal
502b5(mdo sde): nas byung ste dong / /'jig rten zil mngar rnga ru skyes/ /tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub/ /de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon/ /bram ze de dag thams cad kyis//
502b6(mdo sde): thog ma skur bas dmyal ltung yang / /phyis ni dad pas mod la thar/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ni/ /khrel dang ldan pa smos ci dgos/ /sdig gi rang bzhin thog ma nas/ /med pas sems
502b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi phyir/ /rtsa ba bzhi po'i sdom pa dang / /mtshams med lnga po'i sdig rnams dang / /log spyod bar du mthol bshags so/ /so so'i skye bo la la zhig /de lta bu yi sdig byas pa/ /
503a1(mdo sde): de bzhin mthol tshangs byed nus na/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/ /log spyod par du sdig 'byang ste/ /sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang gdon mi za/ /ma dad
503a2(mdo sde): pa ni der ma gtogs/ /gang zhig dad pa'i sems shes te/ /rgyal ba rnams la phyag byas na/ /chos lam mi 'grub mi srid do/ /de nas rgyal bud dge mthong dang / /sum
503a3(mdo sde): stong po yi mi rnams kyis/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshig mthun par/ /'di skad gsol te bdag cag rnams/ /sangs rgyas grub na skye shi las/ /'khor ba'i rnam dag bsgral
503a4(mdo sde): bar smon/ /lha mi'i nang na btsun bzhugs pas/ /bye brag phyed par bshad du gsol/ /de la gzungs su bzung ba dang / /yi ger bris shing klog 'chang ba/ /de yi bsod nams ji
503a5(mdo sde): tsam mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bye brag phyed par ngas bshad kyi/ /rgyal bu dge mthong legs par nyon/ /gang zhig rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /stong khams gang ba'i sems
503a6(mdo sde): can la/ /sbyin pa byas shing yon phul nas/ /de yi steng du chos bshad cing / /dgra bcom 'bras bu thob byas pas/ /la la zhig gis rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /thos nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /skad
503a7(mdo sde): cig dus su phyag byas na/ /de yi bsod nams de bas 'da'/ /yi ge bris shing klog 'chang ba/ /dad pas phyag 'tshal smos ci dgos/ /de yi bsod nams dpag tu med/ /gang gis yi ger bris pa dang / /klog pa
503b1(mdo sde): dang ni 'don pa dang / /dus su phyag 'tshal sems bskyed na/ /mchod rten stong khams chub par du/ /brtsigs pa'i bsod nams bas ni che/ /de nas 'od srung chen po dang / /shA ri'i bu dang kun dga'
503b2(mdo sde): po| |'jig rten srung ba mthu bo che/ /tshangs lha rnams dang lha dbang po/ /'khor los bsgyur dang rgyal chen bzhis/ /bcom ldan zhabs la mgos btud nas/ /tshig mthun par ni 'di skad
503b3(mdo sde): gsol| |bcom ldan mya ngan 'das slad na/ /bdag cag rnams kyis sems can la/ /khyab par spel zhing bstan par bgyi/ /lus sems rtag tu bde ba'i phyir/ /phyag 'tshal rnams la bsrung
503b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ /gang zhig sdom pa zhig pa dang / /mtshams med lnga yi sdig pa dang / /mnyam pa nyid la skur ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas de dag mtshan thos pas/ /rnam dag sa ru bde bar gnas/ /dper
503b5(mdo sde): na rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin/ /da dung ma 'ongs phyi dus la/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshogs chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
503b6(mdo sde): stsal to| |khyed rnams legs par nyon cig / khyed rnams la sngon byung ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen bshad par bya'o/ /nga sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs
503b7(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa'i 'od ces bya ba la phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sang rgyas kyi mtshan thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te
504a1(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar cing spyi bos blangs so/ /blangs nas kyang sems can gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la rgya cher
504a2(mdo sde): spel zhing bstan te sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos par byas so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na tshogs rnams kyi nang du mi sum stong nyi tshe zhig nga'i chos kyi don dang mthun te dad pa'i sems dpag tu
504a3(mdo sde): med pa skyes nas nga'i thad du sangs rgyas de rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag byas pas de ltar phyogs bcur snang zhing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dag /rtsa ba bzhi dang
504a4(mdo sde): mtshams med pa'i sdig lci pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang / log spyod kyi bar du sdig 'byang bar 'dod na dad pa'i sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ yang 'di lta ste
504a5(mdo sde): gang la las ma dad cing ma gus pas mdo sde bcu gnyis la bskur cing dbang zos pa dang / rdo rje'i sku dang / skyes bu dam pa 'jam dpal dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams la
504a6(mdo sde): skur cing dbang za ba rnams gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ rdzun pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ma dad pa'i phyir ro/ /dam pa'i chos la skur ba'i phyir ro/ /
504a7(mdo sde): bla ma rnams la brnyas pa'i phyir ro/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la smad pa'i phyir te/ nges par dmyal bar ltung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag la dad cing
504b1(mdo sde): sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal na/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'i sdig lta zhig mi 'byang mi srid do/ /ma dad pa dang / ma gus pa dang / dge
504b2(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa dang / log spyod rnams ni/ der ma gtogs so/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ shAkya thub pa'i sku 'bum phrag brgyar sprul pa'ang 'jig rten re re na ston pa mdzad cing bzhugs
504b3(mdo sde): te| tha ma'i sku ni/ nga yin no/ /de'i tshe nga dang 'grogs pa'i mi sum stong po kun da ltar sangs rgyas su grub ste/ stong dang po'i gtso bo ni/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'od ces bya/ stong par ma'i
504b4(mdo sde): gtso bo ni/ sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya/ stong tha ma'i gtso bo ni/ sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya'o/ /de bas na khyed rnams kyang de bzhin du phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi
504b5(mdo sde): mtshan brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba'i rigs so/ /khyod rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshogs mang po rnams la chos ston pa rgya cher byed cing mtha' med pa'i sems can rnams la phan gdags
504b6(mdo sde): te| khams gsum nas bzlas shing zhi ba dang dben pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor gyis la nga dang 'dra bar byos shig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin stan las langs
504b7(mdo sde): t e bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la
505a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ ji ltar bsgom zhing spyad par bgyi/ de skad
505a2(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni/ sdom pa lci ba rnams la phan gdags pa'o/ /zhes bya bar zungs
505a3(mdo sde): shig / rdo rje rin po che'i snying po zhes bya bar zungs shig /sde snod kyi sgo dpag tu med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar zungs shig /thams cad kun tu bsdus pa'o/ /zhes bya bar zungs shig /rgya
505a4(mdo sde): chen po dpe zla med pa'o/ /zhes bya bar zungs shig /mi sum stong sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te bsod nams
505a5(mdo sde): thob pa'o/ /zhes bya bar zungs shig /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin gyis 'di skad ces
505a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ltar na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba chen po
505a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i slad du sdig sbyangs pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'grub pa mdzad pa'i mdo 'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni/ yum mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ lam
505b1(mdo sde): mo| |nyan thos rnams kyi ni/ mig go /lha dang mi rnams kyi ni/ khang khyim lags te/ de lta bu'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dan dang ldan pa bdag gis gzungs su gzung bar bgyi'o/ /lha
505b2(mdo sde): dang mi gang nas gang du gnas pa de dang der rgya cher spel bar bgyi'o/ /rgyun mi 'chad cing yun du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /khyod
505b3(mdo sde): ni| skyes bu dam pa yin te/ sde snod chen po dpag tu med pa thams cad gzungs su 'dzin pa lags te/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga 'gro ba'i gnas su khyod 'gro zhig /nga 'dug pa'i
505b4(mdo sde): gnas su khyod 'dug cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa zhig phyir mi ldog pa dang / mi 'gyur pa'i sar gnas
505b5(mdo sde): so| |nyan thos brgyad khri zhig theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha dang mi brgyad khri bzhi stong zhig chos kyi mig rnam
505b6(mdo sde): par dag pa thob bo/ /sems can stong phrag brgya zhing ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad zin nas
505b7(mdo sde): shing sA la ga la ba de logs su gshegs so/ /gshegs nas gser gyi me tog rin po che rdzing bu dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyang bsdus
506a1(mdo sde): nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtho dma' dang / gtsang sems yang sngon bzhin no/ /mi rnams nyes byas pa'i phyir dmyal ba yang sngon bzhin no/ /bcom ldan
506a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis
506a3(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas yongs su grub pa bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
506a4(mdo sde): mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya nag gi 'gyur sh+lau ka bdun brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te/ bam po gnyis dang / sho lo ka brgya bcu gnyis/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
506a5(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga dang / mtshan nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi gleng gzhi dang / dus
506a6(mdo sde): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / bshags pa'i le'u
506a7(mdo sde): rnams 'byung ba nyi tshe bcos shing bsgyur ba/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
506b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong la/
506b2(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i chos thos nas bdag cag dang / lha dang mis mdo sde gsung rab 'di lan gcig 'dzin pa dang / 'chang bar gsol te gnang bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs
506b3(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yul khams 'di dang / phyogs gzhan du ri dang / tshal dang / shing drung gi rig sngas 'chang ba'i gnas dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang gnas dang /
506b4(mdo sde): khyim dang / dgon pa'i gnas dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung dang / bla gab med pa dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / mi mang po 'du
506b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos bshad pa'i gnas dang / mi phal gyi gnas dang / mir gyur pa thams cad la rgya cher khyab par bstan te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yun
506b6(mdo sde): ring du gnas na ngan 'gro rnams gtan du bkag pa'i slad du'o/ /ji lta zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan bas sems can dmyal ba'i sgo bkum zhes thos te/ chos kyi gzhung 'di las
506b7(mdo sde): tshig 'bru gcig tsam kha ton du bton na/ lha rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ste rtag tu bsnyen zhing mchis nas rang yang dge ba spyod par bgyid lags so/ /mi la la dag kyang rtogs pa chen
507a1(mdo sde): pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la mos shing gus te yi ger 'bri la 'don cing klog pa dang / 'dzin cing 'chang la
507a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te chos kyi gzhung 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'ga'i mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpal 'ga'i ming nas brjod na'ang mi des da ltar gyi tshe 'di la
507a3(mdo sde): bde zhing skyid pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba mi 'byung la/ nam 'gum pa'i tshe na'ang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' dang / lta rnams kyis de'i mngon du shul 'dren cing sangs rgyas
507a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag mthong la/ dad nas gnas gcig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing yongs su bzung ba'i slad du'o/ /mdo sde 'di
507a5(mdo sde): len cing yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su 'dzin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' lags te/ de bas
507a6(mdo sde): na| bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig ste/ rgyu de'i slad du chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung bas gnas gcig tu skye zhing gcig gis gcig mi spong zhing mi 'bral bas smon lam
507a7(mdo sde): gcig pa lags so/ /de nas yang lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po dang / tshangs pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba phyogs bzhi'i
507b1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag brnyan lag na rdo rje dag dang / sde dpon chen po la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po dang / nam mkha'
507b2(mdo sde): lding gi rgyal po dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dang / bu dgu ma'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / 'bab chu'i lha dang / mtsho'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi
507b3(mdo sde): lha la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag dang / lha chen po rnams dang 'khod pa las langs te gdong dang spyi bos phyag btsal nas thal mo sbyar te rjes dang
507b4(mdo sde): gus par bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas slan chad rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rtogs pa chen pos yongs su
507b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di yongs su bzung ste/ mdo sde 'di gang na gnas par bdag cag lha'i rgyal po rnams rtag tu de'i mdun du mchis te gtsang zhing dag par bgyis la/ mchod rten gyi
507b6(mdo sde): nad ngam/ mi phal gyi gnas sam/ dben pa'i phyogs na gnas sam/ yang na mdo sde 'di la gtsang sbra ma phyed pa'i yan lag gis 'dzin kyang rung / bdag cag gis mi de la mi rigs pa'i
507b7(mdo sde): gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/ /de mchis pa'i gnas khyim gyi rim gro'ang bgyi'o/ /bdag cag lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad kyis de phan tshun mchi na'ang de'i mdun du 'dren cing
508a1(mdo sde): shul sel ba dang / ci 'tshal ba bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de phyogs bzhi dag tu mchis na'ang sgrib cing chags pa ma mchis la/ rtag tu dga' ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe
508a2(mdo sde): brjes na lha'i nang du skye ba dang / de'i bsod nams kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mjal zhing theg pa chen po las mi nyams par bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
508a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha ma srin rnams kyi rgyal po la sogs pa dag la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ /de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis smras pa de bzhin te/ chos kyi gzhung
508a4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di thos par yang dka' na rtogs par lta smos kyi dgos/ chos kyi gzhung 'di len cing 'dzin la/ 'don cing klog par byed na/ gtsang sbra dang / khrus kyis dag cing dad par
508a5(mdo sde): byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gnas gtsang mar byas la dar gyi bla bre dang / ba dan la sogs pas gnas kyi nang bzang bar byas te brgyan la/ spos mchog tu dri zhim pa tsan+dan dang /
508a6(mdo sde): phye ma dag gi byug pa dang / spos rnam pa mang po bsregs nas phyag 'tshal te nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du de lta bur nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du chos kyi
508a7(mdo sde): gzhung 'di klog cing 'don te sems dang yid mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yel zhing gcig tu brtan pa dang / bsam pa drang ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag cing 'gro ba dang len cing 'dzin
508b1(mdo sde): pa ma 'khrul ba dang / spyod lam brtan pa dang / 'don cing zlos pa phyin ci ma log pa de lta bu'i tshul du mdo sde 'di las bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang /
508b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bklags la mos shing gus pas de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing 'chad ba ni/ mdo sde 'di las bshad pa bzhin du sdig lce ba thams cad yang
508b3(mdo sde): dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi gzhung 'di ni/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang spyad cing sbyangs la byin
508b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs nas yongs su bzung ba ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni/ yum mo/ /mdo sde rnams kyi ni/ rgyal po'o/ /mchog gi gzhung gi ni/ mdzod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni/
508b5(mdo sde): lam mo| |rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa 'di mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi gzhung gi snying po'o/ /gcig tu dper na/ 'jig rten na chen po bzhi la sogs pa rnam pa drug dang mtshungs
508b6(mdo sde): shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ drug gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / ma chen po dang / rlung chen po ste/ chen po bzhi dang / nyi ma dang / stong pa ste/ drug go /de la mdo sde 'di ni/
508b7(mdo sde): dper na/ sa chen po dang 'dra bar gtsang sme dang / bzang ngan che chung thams cad theg pa yin no/ /yang mdo sde 'di ni/ dper na/ chu chen po dang 'dra bar mi gtsang ba'i ljan ljin dang / dri ma
509a1(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par 'khru ba yin no/ /yang mdo sde 'di ni/ dper na/ me chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i sbar sbur thams
509a2(mdo sde): cad sreg pa yin no/ /yang mdo sde 'di ni/ dper na/ rlung chen po dang 'dra bar las dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma mi gtsang ba'i phyag dar thams cad 'thor zhing 'bud pa yin no/ /yang mdo sde
509a3(mdo sde): 'di ni| dper na/ nyi ma dang 'dra bar ma rig pa'i mun nag thams cad kun tu snang bar byed pa yin no/ /yang mdo sde 'di ni/ dper na/ nam mkha' stong pa dang 'dra bar dngos po ma lus
509a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad go 'byed cing shong bar byed do/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rtogs pa chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di rgya che ba ni/ zla med pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' man chad
509a5(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la thug pa thams cad shong bar byed do/ /de bas na khyed kyis mdo sde 'di longs la yongs su bzung ba dang / rgya cher
509a6(mdo sde): spel zhing khyab par gyis shig / mdo sde 'di la mos shing gus par gyis te/ khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rtag par sangs rgyas kyi ye
509a7(mdo sde): shes khong du chud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid mthong bar gyis shig/ khyed lha'i rgyal po dag mdos de 'di len cing yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyis rtag tu ba dang ma byon pa'i
509b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ste chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba mthong bar gyis shig / de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mos
509b2(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan zhes bya ba stan las langs te gos legs par bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
509b3(mdo sde): 'das| bdag cag la sogs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du gsol zhing zhu na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
509b4(mdo sde): mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ mos pa'i mtshan/ khyod kyis skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ci dang ci zhus pa nyon cig dang
509b5(mdo sde): ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /khyod kyis zhus pa'ang dpag tu med pa'i skye bo la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan gyis
509b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan gcig thos pa tsam
509b7(mdo sde): gyis kyang lhar skye ba thob bo/ /slad kyis yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba'i yul khams dgon pa'i nang zhig la lu ma chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab bskams
510a1(mdo sde): te de'i nang na chab nya stong phrag bcu zhig gdugs kyis gdungs nas 'gum du nye ba zhig mchis pa la/ tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bgyi ba zhig gis chab
510a2(mdo sde): nya de dag mthong ba dang / snying rje ba'i sems skyes te chab dang zas kyi sbyin pa stsal nas dgung mang po mi thub cing 'tsho ba yun mi ring bar 'tshal te/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu
510a3(mdo sde): ' bebs kyis bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pas nya de rnams kyis thos pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar
510a4(mdo sde): skyes so/ /de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di dag dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bsgrag par

510a6(mdo sde): spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi gter rnyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i

510b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i mtshan la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan rdzogs par bstan na/ bskal
510b2(mdo sde): pa khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du bstan kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med do/ /chu thams cad kyi thigs pa'i grangs ni/ bgrang zhing shes par rung gi /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ bgrang
510b3(mdo sde): zhing shes par mi nus so/ /ri rab rgyun po rnams kyang srang la gzhal zhing bgrang bar rung gi /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mtshan ni/ bgrang zhing shes par mi nus so/ /

511a1(mdo sde): zag de dus zad na'ang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yid la smon pa bzhin du skye ste/ da'ang mthong la ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas

511a4(mdo sde): rab mar me'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal ba la gus par phyag

511b1(mdo sde): pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos mu med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam dpag dka' ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs kyi stobs la gnas pa'i stobs la gus
511b2(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum na btsun pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad kyi lam ston pa chen po la gus
511b3(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcod par mkhas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gyi mthar phyin pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten rnams
511b4(mdo sde): las thar cing grol ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'chi pho ba'i lam dang yongs su bral ba la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par grol ba mngon du brnyes pa la gus
511b5(mdo sde): par phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' ltar ci la'ang mi gnas pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi'i tshogs
511b6(mdo sde): bcom pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bu gcig pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe rabs gar byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing de
511b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mngon par rtogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po nyid du phyin par smon to/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus can thams cad gang la'ang de bzhin gshegs
512a1(mdo sde): pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mos byar te sems rtse gcig tu gus par mchod cing legs par nyon mongs la yid la
512a2(mdo sde): zungs shig / ngas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan brjod pas/ mtshams med lnga po'i sdig las kyang / /rnam par grol bar sems skyed cig/ dge ba'i
512a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba med pa yi/ /mi de'i phyir yang ngas bshad de/ /de yis rtogs par ma nus kyang / /sa bon tshig par rang 'byung ngo / /yang dag bden pa 'ba' zhig yod/ /theg pa chung ngu'i mtshan
512a4(mdo sde): bsal na/ /theg pa chen po de nyid yod/ /theg pa rnam gnyis bsal bas na/ /theg pa gcig pu kho na yod/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa'i mis/ /tshig 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs
512a5(mdo sde): rgyas grangs med sngon mchod pas/ /da ltar bcom ldan 'das mtshan thos so/ /len cing 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni/ /phyogs tsam las ni rnam grol te/ /rnam dag sa la'ang bde bar gnas//
512a6(mdo sde): da ltar nga yi chos 'di la/ /lan 'dzin klog cing 'don pa dang / /bcom ldan mtshan la phyag byas shing / /sangs rgyas mdzad la bsgrubs pa yis/ /bdud tshogs las dang bral bar
512a7(mdo sde): 'gyur| |phas pham bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/ /'dod chen po yang byang gyur nas/ /ma 'ongs dus na mi de dag /byang chub 'tshang rgya gdon mi za/ /gang zhig mos par mi byed na/ /ngan
512b1(mdo sde): song gsum du nges par ltung / /phyag 'tshal brtson zhing mos bskyed na/ /sangs rgyas grangs med mthong 'gyur bas/ /rtse gcig sems kyis phyag 'tshal rigs/ /sdig pa thams cad byang
512b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /de bas gus shing mos par gyis/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te lus dang sems nan tan du bsdus shing bzung nas mi g.yo zhing mi 'gyur bar lus kyi yan
512b3(mdo sde): lag lnga sa la gtugs nas sems rtse gcig gis shin tu legs par nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod de bka' stsal pa/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
512b4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla mar me snang stong phrag nyi shu la gus par phyag
512b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad stong phrag sum cu la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtogs chen ye shes rgyal ba la gus par phyag 'tshal
512b6(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bu bcu drug la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang
512b7(mdo sde): la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbyangs kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbang mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
513a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od grangs med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
513a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa sbrul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan nyi zla ltar dang zhing snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo rnam dag
513a3(mdo sde): yongs su mkhyen pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzang mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag
513a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra sprin dbyangs sngon gyi rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal
513a5(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shing sA la'i rgya po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mchog rin
513a6(mdo sde): chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i 'od 'bum phrag brgya la phyag
513a7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
513b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lha'i dbu rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad ri rab lhun mnyam la phyag
513b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal
513b3(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
513b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba'i sa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+ya pad+ma mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
513b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

513b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam grol pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rgya mtsho mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag
514a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma dang
514a2(mdo sde): bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyo yid spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug
514a3(mdo sde): mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
514a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+ya'i 'od bla na med
514a5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa snang zla
514a6(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mdog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chu zla'i
514a7(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa the tshom rmugs pa sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal spyod 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
514b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mos pa rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
514b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ka la ping+ka'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal
514b3(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal
514b4(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
514b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
514b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
514b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od mi gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
515a1(mdo sde): pa nyi zla 'od las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan bzang gser mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ring du snang la phyag
515a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi bro la
515a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
515a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
515a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bla med pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag
515a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug rgyal
515a7(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal la
515b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang mdog tsan+dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan bsung 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal
515b2(mdo sde): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs rab dga'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
515b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya
515b4(mdo sde): mtsho'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od kun tu 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
515b5(mdo sde): rgyal dka'i brtson 'grus che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rtsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
515b6(mdo sde): pa thugs rje'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i snying po rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan dpung rgyan rgyal ba la phyag
515b7(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i blo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag
516a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser ri rin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma 'bar mtshan la phyag 'tshal
516a2(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang sgron chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mkhas snang mnga' mdzad stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
516a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' rin chen pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+ya
516a4(mdo sde): bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog kun tu ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od mi g.yo ba la
516a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi rgyal po rnams btul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
516a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa byams pa shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten rnam dag
516a7(mdo sde): 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
516b1(mdo sde): pa mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bla bre mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i gdung bla ma'i ye
516b2(mdo sde): shes gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
516b3(mdo sde): pa shes rab ba dan bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri med snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtshan la phyag 'tshal
516b4(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od 'phro snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
516b5(mdo sde): seng+ge'i sgra dbyangs dbang phyug sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i gsung mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rtag
516b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs rgyal thabs brnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal thabs brnyes pa'i
516b7(mdo sde): na bza' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mtshan nyid kyis dgongs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
517a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sum ban da'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog ut+pala'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
517a2(mdo sde): pa brtson pas rgyal ba stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab dga' 'khrugs
517a3(mdo sde): med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs tshad med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
517a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab ri dbang rgya mtsho thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
517a5(mdo sde): pa 'od chen thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thogs med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rtag tu
517a6(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rmongs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sprul ba'i sku thams cad
517a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la
517b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag btsal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa tshun chad kyi
517b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bcu la phyag
517b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag
517b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag
517b5(mdo sde): btsal na/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba ma lus pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gang zag la las snga ma 'das pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba
517b6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo / /de bas na
517b7(mdo sde): de gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la/ /gang zhig gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /sdig 'byang sems kyi rang bzhin thob/ /mi dge bcu dang mtshams
518a1(mdo sde): med lnga| |phyin chad 'di dag mi spyod de/ /yang dag chos thos rgyun mi 'chad/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul khrims rdzogs/ /de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /
518a2(mdo sde): gang zag gnyis ni ma gtogs te/ /gcig ni phyogs snyoms chos la skur/ /gnyis po de ni 'dod chen po/ /gal te la la sems dag na/ /de ni 'dod chen ma yin te/ /sangs
518a3(mdo sde): rgyas grangs med rtag tu mthong / /la las rtsa ba bzhi nyams shing / /mtshams med lnga por bcas pa dag /mos pa rnam dag bya nus na/ /des kyang chos bzhin gnas pa rung / /
518a4(mdo sde): kun gyis gus par phyag byas pas/ /mi dge bcu yi las rnams bsal/ /kun gyis theg chen khrims thob ste/ /de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas
518a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa so sor thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad brgyas kyang theg pa
518a6(mdo sde): chen po'i sems cung zad bskyed do/ /dge slong lnga stong gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /lha dang mi 'bum ni/ chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /da ltar byung ba'i
518a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal po snang 'bum phrag bcu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
518b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri med gser phye mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'khor lo 'od snang rgyal po la phyag
518b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge mthong ga'i mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i nga
518b3(mdo sde): ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od yon tan ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dge gnas yon tan rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
518b4(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mas brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan
518b5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab gnon pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
518b6(mdo sde): rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
518b7(mdo sde): seng+ge'i nga ro la rgyal bar dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
519a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhing gi bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa la
519a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla bre la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyal po la
519a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
519a4(mdo sde): skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
519a5(mdo sde): srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snying po nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
519a6(mdo sde): 'phrul stobs chos chen mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan lo ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
519a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa yid dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi lnga pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
519b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'di las lhag med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
519b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od snang gsal bsod nams kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
519b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa seng+ge'i sgras bdud bzhi bcom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUR+ya'i 'od la phyag
519b4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rnam dag rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i
519b5(mdo sde): yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
519b6(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jug pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
519b7(mdo sde): pa legs par gzigs pa'i bsam gtan dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
520a1(mdo sde): bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mnga' mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi mtshan ma med pa la phyag
520a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma'i spros pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i
520a3(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ro'i mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa reg gi mtshan ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin
520a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jug pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin shes rab dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
520a5(mdo sde): pa rin chen mtshan nyid mnga' mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal
520a6(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel la phyag

520b1(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pha rol pa'i sgra brnyan snyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrugs med la phyag
520b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo//
520b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
520b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i 'jig
520b5(mdo sde): rten thams cad sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zangs mdog tsan+dan dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
520b6(mdo sde): pa dbang phyug sprin gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jigs pa spangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'bum
520b7(mdo sde): phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgya la
521a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal ni/ bskal pa dpag
521a2(mdo sde): tu med pa'i dus na 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba byas pa'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
521a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
521a4(mdo sde): pa 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
521a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gal te gang zag la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan thos na/ gang zag de bskal pa khri khrag drug cu'i
521a6(mdo sde): bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo / /de bas na/ da lta gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis da ltar phyogs bcu yi/ /bcom ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ /
521a7(mdo sde): mi dge'i lam las rnam grol zhing / /mtshams med lnga la sogs pa 'byung / /rnam dgas la rtag gnas shing / /shAkya'i chos la bde bar gnas/ /ngan song gsum ni yongs
521b1(mdo sde): su spangs/ /sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas stong yang mthong gyur te/ /de phyir da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun mthong ste/ /rtag tu rnam
521b2(mdo sde): dag zhing du skye/ /dam pa'i chos kyang thos pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag yin te/ /phyogs bcu na da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi mtshan bstan pa'i
521b3(mdo sde): tshe gang+gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpas gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pa thob bo/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skyes so//
521b4(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dag
521b5(mdo sde): pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kun tu snang ba
521b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ming dang mi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam gling gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos
521b7(mdo sde): snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas
522a1(mdo sde): mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
522a2(mdo sde): pa shes rab ri'i rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med mnga' dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin po ches brgyan pa la phyag
522a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya mnga' mdzad pa'i rgyal thabs brnyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
522a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtshan khri phrag gnyis kyis
522a5(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khri phrag gsum mtshan mthun kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rin chen rgyal
522a6(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi khri brgyad stong 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de
522a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mdog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang dam pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal
522b1(mdo sde): lo| |de bzhin gshegs pa bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sgra'i tshogs la

522b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pad+mas brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gtso bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gser
522b4(mdo sde): gyi mdog 'od snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa lnga brgya pad+ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che mi 'jigs pa la phyag
