523a1(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho'i sdig lci ba kun bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag
523a2(mdo sde): bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
523a3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
523a4(mdo sde): gang zag la la zhig gis da dung ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa'i mtshan 'di thos na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems
523a5(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ngo / /de bas na/ da lta gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyi ma'i dus kyi sangs rgyas la/ /la las gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /sgrib pa gsum
523a6(mdo sde): dang mtshams med lnga/ /'dod mang dag ni ma gtogs par/ /kun kyang bsal cing byang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos la'ang bde bar gnas/ /sangs rgyas tshad med kun kyang mthong //
523a7(mdo sde): yang dag chos kyang rtag tu thos/ /de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /la las phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal na/ /'das pa'i kha na ma tho bsal/ /
523b1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /mi dge bcu yi las byas pa'ang / /da ltar sngon du bsal cing 'byang / /ma 'ongs pa na chos nyid mthong / /de bas yang dag mos par bya/ /'bri klog kha ton phyag
523b2(mdo sde): 'tshal na/ /de dag tshe rabs gar skyes kyang / /mi dge log pa mthong ma 'gyur/ /rtag tu yang dag rnam grol 'thog /mtha' 'khob yul du yong mi skye/ /rgyal po ngan pa yong mi mthong / /bskal
523b3(mdo sde): pa 'bum phrag bzhi khrir yang / /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi ltung ngo / /de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /mi dge bcu yi las byas bsal/ /gzungs su 'dzin pa chen po 'thob/ /da dung ma
523b4(mdo sde): byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan de bsgrags pa na byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag lnga bcus phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/ /dge slong ma bdun brgyas
523b5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rnyed do/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /mdo sde gzungs su 'dzin pa chen po gsung rab yan lag
523b6(mdo sde): bcu gnyis la mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
523b7(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar dang 'das pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa
524a1(mdo sde): rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la
524a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdzod chen po bzhugs so 'tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gang la las mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang / pha rol tu
524a3(mdo sde): phyin pa rnams thos nas klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kha ton du 'don cing phyag 'tshal ba dang / dad cing mos pa dang / len cing 'dzin par byed na/ mi de bskal pa khri phrag nyi
524a4(mdo sde): shu'i bar du sems tson dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung la/ tshe snga ma dran pa shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na/ da lta gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdo sde
524a5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis kyi mtshan de bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong gis rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /nyan thos 'bum phrag brgyad cus theg pa chen po'i
524a6(mdo sde): sems cung zad skyes so/ /dge slong pha dang dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /tshad med pa'i lha dang mis chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
524a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
524b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
524b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
524b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mthu chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
524b4(mdo sde): dpa' zla rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
524b5(mdo sde): khams gsum 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon
524b6(mdo sde): mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bshad
524b7(mdo sde): par mos pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo// //bam po gnyis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen tsan+dan pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
525a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bla ma'i spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mu med spyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spyod la
525a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa rnam par dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje stobs po che
525a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi smod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par mi smod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
525a4(mdo sde): rgyal po ye shes pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
525a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtson 'grus yon tan stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bshad par mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la
525a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun
525a7(mdo sde): tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
525b1(mdo sde): bsam pa rnam par dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
525b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od rlabs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
525b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
525b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dkon mchog rlabs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbu mar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bkag la phyag
525b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sde snod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzigs
525b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi mnyam gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
525b7(mdo sde): dpa' ting nge 'dzin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po
526a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
526a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos brtsegs la phyag
526a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag
526a4(mdo sde): par phyag bteg la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par phyag phab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
526a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i dbyangs la
526a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i sgron ma 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
526a7(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
526b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' snang ba'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
526b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud bcom la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
526b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' glog gi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis
526b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri btang
526b5(mdo sde): bzung bskyod pa'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dkar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
526b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
526b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag dkar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi bkod pa la phyag
527a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
527a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od rgyan gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag
527a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang shar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal
527a4(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' rin chen tsan+dan pad+mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos gtsang dang ba la
527a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan mi
527a6(mdo sde): 'dzum pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug gi yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
527a7(mdo sde): dpa' dge ba'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge bar spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
527b1(mdo sde): dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen
527b2(mdo sde): pa rnam par nges pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
527b3(mdo sde): mngon sum gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
527b4(mdo sde): mthong na dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo
527b5(mdo sde): gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
527b6(mdo sde): dpa' thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
527b7(mdo sde): dpa' pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
528a1(mdo sde): dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phyag rgya'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu'i rgyal
528a2(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mar me'i
528a3(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
528a4(mdo sde): mdog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs par 'dri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs par lan ldon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
528a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du chud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan la
528a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtsegs par nges la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde
528a7(mdo sde): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
528b1(mdo sde): skyabs grol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mar me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bar sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
528b2(mdo sde): ye shes ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhis sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
528b3(mdo sde): ston pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos lam
528b4(mdo sde): khyad par can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub phyogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i
528b5(mdo sde): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
528b6(mdo sde): gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan+dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i
528b7(mdo sde): gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdog dam pa'i dbyibs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
529a1(mdo sde): shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug nas byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag
529a2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsung brtsegs la phyag 'tshal
529a3(mdo sde): lo| |byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi sku kun tu bstan
529a4(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku
529a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri med
529a6(mdo sde): snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
529a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bai DU R+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa'i rgyal po la phyag
529b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa chen 'dzin la
529b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa chen po la phyag
529b3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po la
529b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rten la
529b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'od la
529b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
529b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
530a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od 'phro rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lam ston pa la phyag

530a5(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bla med chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos

530a7(mdo sde): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi gzungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i zom la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal thabs
530b1(mdo sde): can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri rab rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la

530b4(mdo sde): chen mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

530b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bstan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

531a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
531a7(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang
531b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yon tan 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
531b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang ba'i shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
531b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'od 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
531b4(mdo sde): dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
531b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
531b6(mdo sde): dpa' shes rab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang
531b7(mdo sde): bston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur la
532a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
532a2(mdo sde): dpa' bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri la phyag
532a3(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag nyis
532a4(mdo sde): brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bzhi brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
532a5(mdo sde): khri phrag lnga brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag drug brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag bdun brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
532a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' khri phrag brgyad brgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag dgu brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag stong gi byang chub sems dpa'
532a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la phyag btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /
532b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgya
532b2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag 'bum la
532b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
532b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag gcig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag brgya la
532b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag
532b6(mdo sde): 'bum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la phyag btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba'ang bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /
532b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
533a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
533a2(mdo sde): gang+gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
533a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang+gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag
533a4(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA khri'i bye ma
533a5(mdo sde): snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA 'bum phrag brjod kyis mi lang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag
533a6(mdo sde): btsal na/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba yang dag par bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zag la las 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
533a7(mdo sde): chen po de rnams kyi mtshan thos na/ mi de bskal ba 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing khams gsum gyi 'khor ba lam gtogs te/
533b1(mdo sde): rtag tu rnam par thar pa'i rgyal po'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' 'khob yul du yong mi skye/ /dge med yul du'ang de bzhin te/ /lus ngan len par mi 'gyur zhing / /log par lta
533b2(mdo sde): bar mi skye'o/ /ma rabs rigs su mi skye ste/ /mu stegs can du'ang mi skye zhing / /lus kyi yan lag kun dang ldan/ /dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/ /dka' thub sdom pa ma blangs kyang / /'di dag
533b3(mdo sde): rtag tu ldan 'gyur te/ /theg pa chen po'i spyod lam mdzes/ /rtag par sangs rgyas bdag nyid mthong / /de phyir gus par phyag btsal te/ /bcom ldan 'das chos la bde bar gnas/ /ma 'ongs dus na
533b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'grub/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis lan gcig phyir
533b5(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu brtsa dgus phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /sems stor ba'i dge slong 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis sems kyi
533b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag bcus gzungs chen po rnyed nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying
533b7(mdo sde): por mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan
534a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar na theg pa'ang gcig tu bas te/ gnyis dang / gsum du ma mchis so/ /rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo
534a2(mdo sde): 'di ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi yum/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni/ lam chen po/ /rnal 'byor ba thams cad kyi ni/ mig /lta ba log
534a3(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyi ni/ sdud pa/ sems nyams pa rnams kyi ni/ spyod pa/ ngan 'gro gsum gyi sgo ni/ gcod pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub pa'i sgo ni/ 'byed pa/ nyan thos rnams ni/ rim
534a4(mdo sde): gyis theg pa chen po la gzhol bar 'gyur ba lags te/ da bdag gis kyang gzungs sngags chen po 'di gzung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gang zag la las tshul khrims kyi sdom pa
534a5(mdo sde): dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing klog par 'byed na/ de la'ang de bzhin du bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gror byed pa dang / zhag bdun
534a6(mdo sde): gyi bar du spyod cing sgom par byed pa la bdud sde to can dkrug pa'i skabs tshol ba mchis na'ang bdud des kyang 'khrug pa'i skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
534a7(mdo sde): gis mdo sde 'di yun du gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ mdo sde
534b1(mdo sde): 'di srung ba ni/ dkon mchog gsum srung ba yin no/ /yang nga'i bstan pa'ang srung ba yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags
534b2(mdo sde): smras pa| na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maH sang+g+ha ya/ a dan+te d+ha ra ni/ tad+ya thA/ A kA sha ni/ swa b+hA ba/ sarba d+harmA ni swa b+hA ba/ i shaM da/ pi ba sha na/ bi ma la su ba ri/ d+harma a ti ka na
534b3(mdo sde): pa la ni sh+tsa/ ya tha ma le/ tsA le tsA le/ hu lu hu lu/ bi sha de bi sha de/ man+t+ra man+t+ra swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mchod rten la lan bdun
534b4(mdo sde): bdun bskor ba dang / de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i 'gyod tshangs kyi mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bya'i/ gzhan
534b5(mdo sde): du mi g.yeng par bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang bshad do/ /gal te la las gzungs 'di la skur cing smod par bgyid na/
534b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de snyed la skur cing smad pa lags so/ /gzungs sngags 'di la skur ba'i gang zag ni/ tshe rabs su'ang sgrub pa'i 'bras bu mi 'grub par 'gyur te/ khams gsum
534b7(mdo sde): las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du gzungs sngags 'di ni/ sems stong pa las slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs sngags 'di la rna gcig tsam thos pa'am/ thos nas yi ger
535a1(mdo sde): 'bri zhing sha dang / chang bcad de za gcig par bgyid cing / khrims srung ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i rtsed mo g.yeng ba mi bgyid pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi
535a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / rtag tu byams pa la sgom zhing bsam gtan la dam par lta ba'i gang zag de ni/ bskal ba dpag tu med pa mchis pa nas gsog gsog pa'i sgrib pa gsum dang /
535a3(mdo sde): sdig lci ba la sogs pa'ang gzungs sngags 'di thos te sems thag pa nas zlos shing 'dzin pa dang / nyin gcig bzhin klog cing kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi brjed
535a4(mdo sde): par bgyid na/ gang zag de mngon par byang chub ba'i bar du ngan song du mi ltung ngo / /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng+ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ khyod
535a5(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum skyob pa dang / skye bo mang po la phan par sems shing / srid pa gsum las bsgral zhing gdon pa dang / slob pa grangs med pa la phan pa chen po byed pa dang
535a6(mdo sde): log par lta ba thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gzungs sngags phye zhing bstan pa legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi ming dang / gzungs sngags kyi sgra 'di sems can
535a7(mdo sde): la las thos nas mos pa dag gus pa bskyed de ma skur ba'i mi de ni/ tshe 'di la'ang bde ba nas shi 'phos nas kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong zhing nga'ang mthong la/ khyod dang byang
535b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po so sor rang gis rig pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba the tshom mi za bar 'gyur ro/ /kun
535b2(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing dge ba thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam sgrub pa ni/ kun kyang mos pa dang / dad pa'i dbang gis so/ /nga 'das pa'i phyi na
535b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ skad cig la phyogs bcu na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
535b4(mdo sde): rgyas dang / gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal nus shing / theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa ji
535b5(mdo sde): bzhin bar yid la byed pa'i gang zag de ni/ thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
535b6(mdo sde): las thams cad kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge tshul pha'am/ dge tshul mas ngo bo nyid kyi sems
535b7(mdo sde): stor bas rang gi rtsa ba bzhi gzhig pa dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / lci ba drug dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur ba'ang phyogs
536a1(mdo sde): bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan la mos ba bskyed de phyag 'tshal na/ de lta bu'i las mi dge ba kun
536a2(mdo sde): ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas 'od nges pa zhes bya ba de'i drug nas de'i tshe rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po rnams
536a3(mdo sde): glo bur du skad cig dus der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi ba'o stugs te phyag btsal nas mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
536a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa ni/ brjod kyis kyang mi rdzogs te/ la las ni/ mi dge
536a5(mdo sde): ba bcu bgyis/ la las ni/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis/ la las ni/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la skur ba la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sdig pa
536a6(mdo sde): bgyis ba de dag dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mdo sde la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i mdun du mthol
536a7(mdo sde): zhing bshegs par 'tshal na/ de gnang bar gsol lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jigs ba'i sems bskyed dka' ba dang / dge ba'i sems bskyed
536b1(mdo sde): dka' ba las bskyed pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis mi dge ba bcu bshegs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga bshags pa dang / 'dod chen la sogs pa bshags nas de
536b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de mthong bar 'dod pa de legs kyi/ yid la sems pa bzhin mthol cig /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi byams pa'i
536b3(mdo sde): gsung thos nas chos gos tshul bzhin du bgos nas thal mi sbyar te spyi bos btud nas phrag pa g.yas pa chos bzhin du phyung / bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan
536b4(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i chos la phyag
536b5(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrug mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing
536b6(mdo sde): skyabs su gsal lo/ /yang lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha'
536b7(mdo sde): yas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang steng gi phyogs kyi
537a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang 'gog gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal
537a2(mdo sde): zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /shar phyogs na 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /lho phyogs na 'phags pa 'jig rten gzungs la'ang phyag

537a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /steng gi phyogs na 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og gi phyogs na 'phags pa yon tan
537a5(mdo sde): bstan pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /thog ma'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol
537a6(mdo sde): lo| |ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na sprul ba'i sku sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
537a7(mdo sde): rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dri
537b1(mdo sde): ma med par grugs pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /kun dga' bo dang 'od srung la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /
537b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lam bzhis mngon du byung ba rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sems bskyed pa dad po pa rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /mdzod chen
537b3(mdo sde): po gsung rab mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / yang dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /chos kyi mdo sde gzhan ji snyed bzhugs pa la'ang phyag 'tshal
537b4(mdo sde): zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sku gdung brgyad du bgos pa'i gzugs rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi don la'ang
537b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs ba dang / bar snang gi lha dang / gnam gyi
537b6(mdo sde): steng dang / sa'i steng dang / sa'i 'og dang / ri'i lha dang / tshal gyi lha dang / shing drug gi lha dang / rigs sngags 'chang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i mig dang
537b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / lha'i rna ba dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyis gzigs shing gsan te kun gyis dbang mdzad par gsol lo/ /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad la ma
538a1(mdo sde): mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na'ang sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig / bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i khams tshun char
538a2(mdo sde): nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar du rmongs shing bslad pa'i sems kyis log par mthong ba dpag tu ma mchis pas las dang nyon mongs pa dang / mi dge ba'i las bgyis
538a3(mdo sde): pa ni| brjod kyis mi rdzogs te/ sdig pa mang po ci bgyis pa rnams bdag nyid kyis ma tshor ma rig pas mi dge ba'i sems rab tu rgyas pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten pha rol ma mthong
538a4(mdo sde): z hing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong ba la gnas te nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing mi dge ba'i las kyis bar chad du gyur cing bsgribs
538a5(mdo sde): pa'am| sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pas dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ pha dang ma la mi rigs shing tshul ma lags
538a6(mdo sde): pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ yang rang nyams kyi dbang gis phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor dang / yo byad la sogs pa spyod pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la'ang mi rigs shing tshul ma
538a7(mdo sde): lags pa'i las bgyis pa'am/ 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa snyed bshad pa dang / byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems can la'ang ngan du
538b1(mdo sde): smad pa dang / chos kyi mkhan po la skur ba'am/ dam pa'i chos ni/ chos ma lags par bshad pa'am/ chos ma lags pa ni/ chos lags par bshad pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa
538b2(mdo sde): mi rtag go / zhes bgyis pa'am/ dam pa'i chos kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis pa'am/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go /zhes bgyis pa'am/ phan pa'i sbyin pa la ma dad pa'am/ chos
538b3(mdo sde): log pa la dad cing 'dzin pa de lta bu'i slad du da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni/ dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnod pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol
538b4(mdo sde): lo| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs rje dang byams pa'i sems mnga' ba kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes
538b5(mdo sde): gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad 'gyod cing bshags pas tshangs pa
538b6(mdo sde): gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis
538b7(mdo sde): pa'am| 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sdom pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa'am/ 'dod chen pa'i las spyad pa'am/ mi
539a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i tshig rtsub po smras nas dge ba'i chos la skur ba'i sdig lci ba'i las bgyis pa'ang slar 'gyod cing bshags ma myong ba dang / yid la 'dzem pa dang /
539a2(mdo sde): ngo tsha ba ma mchis pas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i dngos po sdig lci ba la sogs pa bgyis pa'am/ thog ma nas yid la 'jigs shing 'dzem pa ma mchis
539a3(mdo sde): pas de lta bu'i sdig lci ba bgyis pa bdag nyid kyis nges par 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs shing dad pas byin pa blangs pa mthol zhing bshags ma myong ba'am/ dam pa'i chos
539a4(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas par bgyi zhing / rim gror mchod pa'i bsam pa ma mchis te/ de la mi snyan par smad cing yang log par bltas pa'am/ ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs
539a5(mdo sde): pa'i nyes pa mang po bgyis pa'am/ yang 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gsum ma mchis zhes bgyis pa la sogs pa mi dge ba bcu
539a6(mdo sde): dang / mtshams med pa lha'i sdig lci ba de lta bu bgyis pa'i slad du da 'jigs shing skrag pa ni/ dpag tu ma mchis/ 'dzem zhing gnod pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon
539a7(mdo sde): mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thugs rje dang byams pa mnga' bas kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub
539b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags pas na bdag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tu ma
539b2(mdo sde): mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba bgyis pa rnams bsal cing slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig / yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa
539b3(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis pa nas log par mthong bas lci ba bzhi ni/ sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni/ lci ba bzhir bshad pa'am/ zhig pa ni/ ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa ni/ zhig
539b4(mdo sde): par bshad pa'am/ lci ba ni/ yang bar bshad/ yang ba ni/ lci bar bshad pa'am/ gtsang ba ni/ mi gtsang bar mthong / mi gtsang ba ni/ gtsang bar mthong ba la sogs pa log par
539b5(mdo sde): mthong ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag ni/ bshad cing bstod/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ni/ gus par ma bgyis shing mi dge ba'i don rnams la gzhung bzung zhing bsam pa
539b6(mdo sde): dang / ma brtags pa rnam pa brgyad 'chang ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ bdud kyi tshig ces bgyis/ bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
539b7(mdo sde): bka' zhes bgyis pa'am/ bar 'ga' ni/ mu stegs kyi ston pa drug gis rnam par bshad pa la mos shing bzung ba'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
540a1(mdo sde): zhugs te dkon mchog gsum la rtag pa ma mchis snyam sems la 'khrul pa byung ba la sogs pa lta ba log pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de lta bas na/ da
540a2(mdo sde): 'jigs shing dogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ kun la
540a3(mdo sde): snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags te/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing mthol bshags pas tshangs pas
540a4(mdo sde): gnang bar gsol te/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las/ gal te rtsa ba bzhi'am/ mtshams med pa lnga'am/ yang dag pa'i chos
540a5(mdo sde): la skur pa btab pa ma mthol ma bshags na nges par sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
540a6(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos rnams dang / rang rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang de la skyabs mdzad par mi spyod do/ /dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi mis kyang skyabs byed mi
540a7(mdo sde): nus so| |zhes thos pas ni/ de'i phyir 'jigs shing dogs pa dang / 'dzem zhing gnong pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /'das pa'i
540b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni/ thugs rje dang /
540b2(mdo sde): byams pa'i mnga' bdag ste/ kun la snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/ bdag cag la sogs pas 'gyod cing
540b3(mdo sde): mthol bshags pas tshangs pa gnang bar gsol te/ bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'am/ las kyi sgrib pa'am/ rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am/ lci ba
540b4(mdo sde): bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i sdig lci ba rnams bsal bar gyur cig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma
540b5(mdo sde): mchis pa nas srid pa na 'khor ba'i tshe sdig lci ba rnams bsal te slan chad mi bgyid par gyur cig / yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pas bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa
540b6(mdo sde): nas da ltar gyi tshe 'di'i bar du dge 'dun gyi spyi'i nor dang / phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi spyi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/ da ltar gyi dge 'dun gyi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/
540b7(mdo sde): dag 'dun sde lnga'i nor dang / dge slong ngo cog gi nor la thugs thub tu spyad pa'am/ yon bdag thams cad kyi rdzas la thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / bdag gis yang dag pa'i chos dang /
541a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi dang / 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo/ /zhes smras pa de lta bu'i las ngan pa'i rgyu des kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ khyim nas rab tu byung
541a2(mdo sde): nas rtsa ba bzhi'i sdom pa zhig pa dang / lci ba'i chos brgyad dang / sdom pa drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung byed
541a3(mdo sde): sum cu dang / ltung byed dgu bcu rtsa gcig dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams dang / shin tu lci ba'i chos bdun rnams dang / nongs pa bgyis
541a4(mdo sde): nas phas pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams med pa lnga la thug gi bar du re re nas bgyis pa'am/ yang dag pa'i chos nyid dang / mdo sde zab mo la skur pa'am/ 'dod chen pa'i las
541a5(mdo sde): b gyis pa'ang bcabs shing gsang nas nyin zhag re re zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ba de la sogs pa de ring skye bo mang po la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs
541a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'gyod cing bshags par 'tshal lo/ /so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas sangs rgyas dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud cing rnam
541a7(mdo sde): par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal bas mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs bgyis pa'am/ bdag gi rigs snyems pas dar cing rgyags pa'i tshe mi dge ba'i las rnams bsam pa bzhin du
541b1(mdo sde): bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mthong bas byis pa lta bu'i blun pa'i sug las bgyis pa'am/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du nye bar mchis shing nyon mongs pas sems dkrugs pas
541b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus pa'am/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mdud pas
541b3(mdo sde): sems dkrugs shing bskyod pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid la sogs pas rnam par bsdus pa'i sdig pa mang po de rnams 'gyod de/ da ma lus par bshags so/ /yang sangs rgyas
541b4(mdo sde): dang / dam pa'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /
541b5(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la gus pa'i tshul gyis rim gro ma bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po de dag kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /gti
541b6(mdo sde): mug pas rmongs shing bsgribs te dregs shing le lo dang / rang nyams kyis mi dge ba rnams bgyis pa de lta bu'i sdig mang po kun 'gyod de mthol zhing so sor bshags so/ /phyogs
541b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad da bdag gis mchod nas sems can ma lus pa thams cad sa bcu la gnas par bgyis te/ kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa nyid thugs
542a1(mdo sde): su chud pa dang ldan par bgyis par gyur cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rgyal rigs dra ma chen
542a2(mdo sde): po rab tu legs so/ /rgyal rigs dra ma chen po bdag nyid kyi dge sdig gi las la rtog pa mkhas te 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos 'gyod nas sdig pa'i las rnams mngon par
542a3(mdo sde): bshags kyi steng du sems can thams cad kyi phyir yang mthol zhing so sor bshags pa de bas na/ khyod ni/ rgyal rigs dra ma chen po nyid yin te/ bdag sdig pa mi dge ba dang bral gyi
542a4(mdo sde): steng du sems can thams cad kyang sdig pa dang bral bar byas pa dang / bdag nyid kyi phyir smon lam ma btab pas sngar sems can thams cad kyi don du smon lam btab ste/ de bzhin
542a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa nyid thugs su chud pa dang ldan par bsngos pas na/ khyod ni/ rgyal rigs dra ma chen po yang dag pa yin no/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum
542a6(mdo sde): stong gis mthol bshags zin nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ bcom ldan nyag gcig rab kyi mchog /khams gsum rgyan lags yab yum dang / /
542a7(mdo sde): thams cad snyoms pa'i ye shes lags/ /kun la snyoms pa'i dpe ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas dkon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byis pas shes rab bdag phyir spyad/ /nor rdzas byin la
542b1(mdo sde): lan 'dod phyir/ /byams chen sangs rgyas de min te/ /dgra sdang nye byams snyoms mdzad pa'i/ /brtson 'grus che la bdag skyabs mchi/ /rkang gnyis kun la sangs rgyas gtso/ /shes rab spyan ldan
542b2(mdo sde): mkhyen gzigs khyab/ /lha rnams shes rab de ma 'tshal/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /bdag cag kun gyis gus phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas bdag skyabs mchi/ /dus
542b3(mdo sde): gsum sangs rgyas mchod byas 'dra/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang / mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas chos
542b4(mdo sde): ni tshol 'dod na/ /thos pa mang po'i mi phyir 'brongs/ /dge bas mkhan po bzhin du bkur/ /sangs rgyas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam dag srung byed na/ /ming ni dge slong des pa
542b5(mdo sde): yin| |stong nyid gang gis rtogs nus na/ /de ming rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin/ /brtson 'grus la las sgrub nus na/ /de ming 'phags lam spyod pa yin/ /la las mya ngan 'das bsgrubs na/ /
542b6(mdo sde): de ming yang dag bde ba yin/ /tshul khrims sdom pa'i dge tshul dang / /rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong dag /zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong bya/ /chos gos brtags pa rnams bgos te/ /lhung
542b7(mdo sde): bzed 'khar gsil sogs bkur zhing / /dag pas bsod snyoms gtsang blang bya/ /lha rnams thams cad dga' mgu ste/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal thal sbyar nas/ /lha rnams nged kyis mi
543a1(mdo sde): 'di dag / de yi mngag gzhug bsgrub par bya/ /dper na lha dbang brgya byin la/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha gzhan rnams/ /rim gro gus pa byed bzhin bya/ /tshe 'dir
543a2(mdo sde): legs pa nyid 'thob ste/ /tshe rabs gzhan gyi'ang dpag mi khyab/ /rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims sdom/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga
543a3(mdo sde): dang byang chub ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten mi rnams thams cad kyis/ /mos pa rnam dag sems bskyed de/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag bzhugs par/ /mya ngan 'das par mngon par
543a4(mdo sde): shes| |chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /da yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/ /'jig rten mi rnams thams cad la//
543a5(mdo sde): bye brag dbye ba'i sems med par/ /theg pa gcig chos mngon shes te/ /phyogs bcur snga ma 'das pa dang / /da ltar ma 'ongs dus rnams la/ /sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu
543a6(mdo sde): las| |gnyis dang gsum zhes bya med par/ /bye brag dbye ba'i sems med de/ /de ltar mos sems bskyed nus na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin//
543a7(mdo sde): rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga ni 'das te gshegs phyin/ /mi yi nang na la la zhig /sems can rnam pa thams cad la'ang / /sangs rgyas snying po nyid yod ces/ /rtag tu mos
543b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bcom ldan bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /la las thang gcig dge spyad de/ /'bras bu srid pa mi sgrub la/ /bla med 'bras bur bsngo byed
543b2(mdo sde): na| |sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tsho ba pa yin/ /da yang rgyal bu dge mthong nyon/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /mi yi nang na la la dag /dkon mchog gsum la rim gro gus/ /skad cig mdo
543b3(mdo sde): sde 'di bklags te/ /mkhan la sri zhu yon phul na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /bde gshegs drin la lan bsgrubs yin/ /la las nor rdzas sna 'ga' dang / /gos dang kha zas bdog
543b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ /kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/ /bcom ldan bka' drin 'tsho ba pa yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong da yang nyon/ /nga yi chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/ /la las mi 'ga' gros btab cing //
543b5(mdo sde): thad gcig mdo sde 'di nyan na/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/ /yon phul bas ni 'di don che/ /theg mchog mdo sde 'di lta bu/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yum yin pas/ /
543b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub dad bsam zhing / /'di la rim gro gus bskyed la/ /gnyis med phan tshun sems snyoms na/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin lan bsgrubs yin/ /rgyal bu dge mthong
543b7(mdo sde): da yang nyon/ /la las chos 'di tha ma'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas bka' drin sgrub bsam ste/ /thang gcig sangs rgyas thun zhugs na/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /
544a1(mdo sde): srog byin bas ni 'di don che/ /dge 'dun bsam gtan dkrugs skur na/ /khams gsum gang ba'i mi rnams dang / /sems can thams cad bsad dang
544a2(mdo sde): mtshungs/ /bsam gtan dge 'dun dkrugs skur na/ /de yi sdig kyang de bzhin no/ /la las dge ba sbyod mthong nas/ /dpyas shing skur te ma mos na/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi
544a3(mdo sde): rigs kyang gcod/ /bcom ldan bka' drin bsgrubs pa min/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthon dang / mi sum stong la bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bste chos bstan zin nas dga' mgu
544a4(mdo sde): yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs spyi bos blangs so/ /'phags pa rtogs pa chen po yongs su rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag 'tshal ba'i chog dang 'gyod tshangs kyi le'u nyi tshe
544a5(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //
